Steam (ST): ......When I came to, all was silent. The room was dimly lit. And yet...it was massive.
Umineko Project (UP): ...............When I came to, all was silent.{n}The lights were dim. And yet......the room felt large.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): .........When I came to, all was silent. The lights were dim. And yet......the room felt large.
PC Japanese (JP): ……………気付けば、静寂だった。薄暗い。でも、……広大だった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ……………気付けば、静寂だった。{n}薄暗い。でも、……広大だった。
Russian (RU): .........Вокруг было тихо.{n}Горел тусклый свет. И всё равно...... помещение казалось большим.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...............Quando dei por mim, o silêncio reinava.{n}As luzes eram fracas. Mas......o local era grande.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……………回過神來時，一片寂靜。{n}雖陰暗。但又，……很寬廣。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……………回过神来时，一片寂静。{n}虽阴暗。但又，……很宽广。

Steam (ST): ...Where on earth...is this...?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......Where on Earth......is this......?
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Dove diavolo... mi trovo...?

Steam (ST): I was sitting in what seemed to be a very short sofa. It was very constricting, and looked like there were several more of them off to each side of me...
Umineko Project (UP): I was sitting in what seemed to be a very small single sofa.{n}It was very constricting, and there seemed to be several more of them off to each side of me...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I was sitting in what seemed to be a very short sofa. It was very constricting, and there seemed to be several more of them off to each side of me...
PC Japanese (JP): 気付けば自分は、狭いソファーのようなものに座っていた。とても窮屈で、同じものが横にずらりと並び、……その列がいくつもいくつも。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 気付けば自分は、狭いソファーのようなものに座っていた。{n}とても窮屈で、同じものが横にずらりと並び、……その列がいくつもいくつも。
Russian (RU): Казалось бы, я сижу на очень коротком диване.{n}Он тесный, и, похоже, по обе стороны от меня ещё много таких...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu estava no que parecia ser uma pequena poltrona.{n}Ela era bem apertada e parecia ter várias delas de ambos os lados...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 回過神來時，我發現自己坐在窄小的，好像是沙發的坐席之上。{n}位子很窄，並且還橫向排列著一大排同樣的座位，……像這種座位有著好多排好多排。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 回过神来时，我发现自己坐在窄小的，好像是沙发的坐席之上。{n}位子很窄，并且还横向排列着一大排同样的座位，……像这种座位有着好多排好多排。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Stavo sedendo su quello che sembrava essere un divano molto stretto. Era molto costrittivo, e sembravano essercene molti altri alla mia destra e alla mia sinistra...

Steam (ST): Once I noticed that, I realized that I was in a theater.
Umineko Project (UP): Once I noticed that, I realized that I was in a theater.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Once I noticed that, I realized that I was in a theater.

Steam (ST): "...Where on earth...am I...?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......Where on Earth......am I......?"

Umineko Project (UP): I don't know how long I've been here.{n}And, more importantly, I don't know where this is.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I don't know how long I've been here. And, more importantly, I don't know where this is.

Umineko Project (UP): ......Beatrice's funeral ended, everyone went back to the mansion, and......

Russian (RU): ......Похороны Беатриче закончились, все вернулись в особняк, и......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......O funeral da Beatrice terminou, todos voltaram para a mansão e......

Chinese Simplified (CN): ……结束了贝阿朵莉切的葬礼，大家一起回了大屋……。

Umineko Project (UP): ........And after that, my memory gets fuzzy, and I can't recall anything else.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): .....And after that, my memory gets fuzzy, and I can't recall anything else.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ........Depois disso, minha memória está embaçada e eu não consigo me lembrar de nada.

Chinese Simplified (CN): ………从这开始，记忆朦朦胧胧的，什么都想不起来。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... E dopo ciò, la mia memoria diventò offuscata, e non riuscii a ricordare nient'altro.

Steam (ST): Then, I was surprised to notice the presence of another person.
Umineko Project (UP): Then, I was surprised to notice the presence of another person.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Then, I was surprised to notice the presence of another person.
PC Japanese (JP): その時、人の気配がして驚く。
Russian (RU): К моему удивлению, послышался шорох.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Então, a presença de outra pessoa acabou me surpreendendo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 正在此時，有人的動靜傳來，嚇了我一跳。

Steam (ST): Apparently, I wasn't the only one sitting in the audience seating of this vast theater.
Umineko Project (UP): Apparently, I wasn't the only one sitting in the audience seating of this vast theater.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Apparently, I wasn't the only one sitting in the audience seating of this vast theater.
PC Japanese (JP): この広大な劇場の客席には、どうやら自分ひとりではなかったらしい。
Russian (RU): Видимо, в аудитории этого огромного театра сижу не только я.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Aparentemente, eu não era a única pessoa sentada na plateia deste imenso teatro.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 看來，在這廣大劇場的觀眾席中，並不是只有我一人。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 看来，在这广大剧场的观众席中，并不是只有我一人。

Umineko Project (UP): ......The sound had come from a seat to the side of mine.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……音がしたのは、自分の席の真横。

Umineko Project (UP): When I looked, I saw a girl sitting several seats off to my left.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When I looked, I saw a girl sitting several seats off to my left.

Steam (ST): It was a face I had never seen before. ...Who is she? She looked like a high-schooler or a college student, about the same age as I was.
Umineko Project (UP): It was a face I had never seen before. ......I wondered who she was.{n}She looked like a high‐schooler or a college student, about the same age as I was.

Umineko Project (UP): "Well, I wasn't even able to tell him who I was. ......And, in exchange for that short bit of time, I'm now trapped inside the witches' toy box for all eternity. ......Looks like you are too. ......What bargain did you make?"

PC Japanese (JP): 「縁寿だと名乗ることも出来なかったけどね。……そして、そのささやかな時間と引き換えに、私は今もこうして、魔女の玩具箱の中から永遠に抜け出せない。……どうやら、あんたもそのお仲間のようね。……何を契約したの？」

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Bem, eu não fui capaz de dizer a ele quem eu era. ......E, em troca daquele curto período de tempo, agora eu estou presa dentro da caixa de brinquedos da bruxa pelo resto da eternidade. ......Parece que você também está. ......Que tipo de acordo vocês fecharam?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「儘管，我連“自己是緣壽”都不能說。……並且，作為這段短暫時間的代價，我直到現在都像這樣地，永遠都逃不出魔女的玩具箱。……看來，你也跟我是同命人呢。……你是簽了什麼契約？」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "...Either way, neither of us is getting out of here. ...Okay, witches! What kind of show do you have for us this time?! Have we moved from reading aloud to theatergoing? Am I supposed to watch someone else read aloud this time, or what?! If that's it, then start it up already. I'm bored enough as it is!"
Umineko Project (UP): ".........Either way, neither of us is getting out of here. ......Okay, witches! What kind of show do you have for us this time?! Have we moved from reading aloud to theatergoing? Am I supposed to watch someone else read aloud this time, or what?! If that's it, then start it up. I'm bored enough as it is!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......Either way, neither of us is getting out of here. ......Okay, witches! What kind of show do you have for us this time?! Have we moved from reading aloud to theatergoing? Am I supposed to watch someone else read aloud this time, or what?! If that's it, then start it up. I'm bored enough as it is!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「………何れにせよ、私たちはここから逃れられない。……さぁ、魔女たち！　今度はどんな余興を見せてくれるの？！　朗読の次は観劇？　今度は私が誰かの朗読を見るって言うの？！　ならば始めてちょうだい。私はとっくに退屈しているの！」
Russian (RU): "......Так или иначе, никто из нас отсюда не выберется. ......Ладно, ведьмы! Какое шоу у вас припасено для нас на этот раз?! Мы переходим от чтения к спектаклю? Я должна послушать чтение кого‐то другого?! Тогда начинайте. Так мне слишком скучно!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Seja como for, nós não vamos conseguir sair daqui. ......Certo, bruxas! Que tipo de show vocês têm para nós dessa vez?! Passamos da leitura para o espetáculo? Agora eu devo ficar assistindo alguém ler em voz alta, é isso?! Se for, então começa de uma vez. Já estou de saco cheio!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………不管怎樣，我們都是逃不出此地的。……來，魔女們！這次是要給我看怎樣的餘興啊？！朗讀之後是觀劇？難道說，這次是要我去看誰的朗讀嗎？！那麼，開始吧。我都無聊了好一會兒了哦！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………不管怎样，我们都是逃不出此地的。……来，魔女们！这次是要给我看怎样的余兴啊？！朗读之后是观剧？难道说，这次是要我去看谁的朗读吗？！那么，开始吧。我都无聊了好一会儿了哦！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... In ogni caso, nessuno di noi due se ne andrà da qui. ... E va bene, streghe! {n}Che razza di spettacolo avete in serbo per noi questa volta?! Ci siamo spostati dalla lettura ad alta voce alla recitazione? Dovrei guardare qualcun altro leggere ad alta voce stavolta, o cosa?! Se è tutto qui, allora iniziate. Sono già abbastanza annoiata così!"

Steam (ST): Ange yelled this to the pitch-black stage. Her voice reverberated throughout the theater, but no one gave an answer...

Steam (ST): She stood all alone in the narrow beam of light in the center of the stage, and the expression on her face was lifeless.
Umineko Project (UP): She stood all alone in the narrow beam of light in the center of the stage, and the expression on her face......was lifeless.

Steam (ST): So, she'll do what it says. She'll follow her own rule.
Umineko Project (UP): So, she'll do what it says. She'll follow her own rule.

Umineko Project (UP): She'll definitely keep her promise.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Lion

Umineko Project (UP): "Yes. ......Her roulette has already made its decision. This is the end of her game."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "If it's the end, what happens next? Do they all become happy rich people and leave the family conference unharmed? Does my family get an ingot that isn't chocolate as a parting gift before coming back to me? Will it be a happy end for everyone? You think those witches would chain us to chairs to show us a naive dream like that?!"
Umineko Project (UP): "If it's the end, what happens next? They all become happy rich people and leave the family conference unharmed? My family comes back to me with a souvenir of an ingot that isn't made of chocolate? And everything ends happily? You think those witches would chain us to chairs to show us a naive dream like that?!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "If it's the end, what happens next? Do they all become happy rich people and leave the family conference unharmed? Does my family get an ingot that isn't chocolate as a parting gift before coming back to me? Will it be a happy end for everyone? You think those witches would chain us to chairs to show us a naive dream like that?!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「終了なら、どうなるっての？　めでたくみんなで大金持ちになって、無事に親族会議はおしまい？　私の家族は、中身がチョコレートじゃないインゴットをお土産に、私のところへ帰って来てくれるというの？　これで全てがハッピーエンドだと？　あの魔女どもが、そんな甘い夢を、鎖に繋ぎながら見せてくれるわけ？！」
Russian (RU): "Если конец, тогда что дальше? Все они станут счастливыми богачами и покинут семейное собрание целыми и невредимыми? Моя семья получит слиток не из шоколада в прощальный подарок перед возвращением ко мне? Для всех это будет счастливый конец? Думаешь, эти ведьмы, приковавшие нас цепями к стульям, покажут нам такую наивную сказку?!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Se é o fim, o que acontece agora? Eles vão virar ricos felizes e deixar a conferência ilesos? A minha família vai retornar com um lingote de presente que não seja um mero souvenir de chocolate? E tudo terminará de forma feliz? Você acha que aquelas bruxas iriam nos acorrentar à cadeiras para exibir um sonho tão ingênuo quanto esse?!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「既然結束了，那會怎麼樣呢？可喜可賀地，大家都成為了大富翁，親族會議平安無事地閉幕？我的家人會帶著，不是包著巧克力，而是包著金塊的紀念禮品，回到我的身邊嗎？這下一切都 HAPPY END 了？那幫魔女們在用鎖鏈綁住我，給我看這種美夢麼？！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「既然结束了，那会怎么样呢？可喜可贺地，大家都成为了大富翁，亲族会议平安无事地闭幕？我的家人会带着，不是包着巧克力，而是包着金块的纪念礼品，回到我的身边吗？这下一切都 HAPPY END 了？那帮魔女们在用锁链绑住我，给我看这种美梦么？！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Se questa è la fine, cosa accade dopo? Diventano tutti persone ricche e felici e lasciano l'isola sani e salvi? La mia famiglia si becca un lingotto non di cioccolato come regalo d'addio prima di tornare da me? Sarà un finale felice per tutti? {n}Pensi che quelle streghe si siano prese la briga di incatenarci a queste sedie per mostrarci un bel sogno del genere?!"

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Tendo desaparecido sem arrependimentos, é possível que ela tenha deixado para nós um presente de despedida, na forma de um jogo onde nenhum crime ocorre — de certa maneira, o mais pacífico de todos os jogos.

Umineko Project (UP): "Th‐there's no way you could do that all by yourself...! No matter how many guns you have, killing thirteen people...that would just be...!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Th, there's no way you could do that all by yourself...! No matter how many guns you had, killing 13 people...that would just be...!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「お、お前一人にそれが出来るわけもありません…！　い、いくら銃があっても、１３人も殺すなど、いくら何でも…！！」

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「你、你一個人沒可能做到這個…！再、再怎麼說有槍，殺死 13 人，也實在是太…！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「你、你一个人没可能做到这个…！再、再怎么说有枪，杀死 13 人，也实在是太…！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "No, non sarebbe stato possibile farlo da sola...! Non importa quanti fucili tu abbia, uccidere 13 persone... sarebbe proprio...!!"

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "...I formed my plan with great care and constructed several alternatives. I envisioned all of the actions you might take from tonight and through tomorrow... and prepared a mystery to deal with each of those. ......I'm afraid I cannot reveal those at this point, but it really was a tightly-knit set of pleasant closed room murders."
Umineko Project (UP): "......My planning was meticulous and involved many different alternatives. I envisioned all of the actions you might take from tonight and through tomorrow...and prepared a mystery to deal with each of those. .........I'm afraid I can no longer reveal them, but I had quite the number of intricate and entertaining locked‐room murders prepared."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......I formed my plan with great care and constructed several alternatives. I envisioned all of the actions you might take from tonight and through tomorrow...and prepared a mystery to deal with each of those. .........I'm afraid I cannot reveal those at this point, but it really was a tightly-knit set of pleasant closed room murders."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……計画は入念に、そして何通りにも用意していました。皆さんが今夜から明日までに取り得る、全ての可能性を想定し、その全てに対応できるミステリーをご用意する予定でした。………今となっては披露は出来ませんが、それはそれは綿密に練られた、愉快な密室殺人の数々を用意していたのです。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……計画は入念に、そして何通りにも用意していました。皆さんが今夜から明日までに取り得る、全ての可能性を想定し、その全てに対応できるミステリーをご用意する予定でした。………今となっては披露は出来ませんが、それはそれは綿密に練られた、愉快な密室殺人の数々を用意していたのです」
Russian (RU): "......Я создала свой план с большой осторожностью и построила несколько альтернатив. Я представила все действия, которые вы можете предпринять с сегодняшнего вечера до конца завтрашнего дня... и подготовила тайну для борьбы с каждым из них. .........Боюсь, на данный момент я не могу раскрыть их, но это и вправду было сплочённое множество приятных убийств в закрытых комнатах."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Meu plano era meticuloso e envolvia inúmeras alternativas diferentes. Eu previ todos os tipos de ações que vocês poderiam tomar na noite de hoje e no dia de amanhã...e preparei um mistério para lidar com cada uma delas. .........Temo que não posso mais revelá‐lo, mas eu já estava com um grande número de intrincados e divertidos assassinatos de quarto fechados preparados de antemão."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……我有仔細制定，並準備了好幾份計劃。預測了諸位今晚到明天會採取的所有的可能性，預先準備了能對應這一切的推理劇。………雖事到如今已無法公布，但我可是準備了，經過周密推敲的，為數不少的愉快的密室殺人。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……我有仔细制定，并准备了好几份计划。预测了诸位今晚到明天会采取的所有的可能性，预先准备了能对应这一切的推理剧。………虽事到如今已无法公布，但我可是准备了，经过周密推敲的，为数不少的愉快的密室杀人。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Ho elaborato il mio piano con grande attenzione e costruito diverse alternative. Ho previsto tutte le azioni che avreste potuto compiere da stanotte e lungo l'intera giornata di domani... e preparato un mistero per ognuno di queste. ... Temo di non poterli più rivelare a questo punto, ma era davvero un bel gruppo di piacevoli delitti a stanza chiusa."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Steam (ST): "If there were just a few of us, you probably could've gunned us down in our sleep. But there's no way you could've killed 13 of us...! We aren't that stupid."
Umineko Project (UP): "You could probably have gunned a few of us down in our sleep. But there's no way you'd have been able to kill thirteen of us...! We aren't that stupid."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "If there were just a few of us, you could've gunned us down in our sleep. But there's no way that would've let you kill 13 of us...! After all, we aren't that stupid."
PC Japanese (JP): 「ほんの数人なら、銃で寝首を掻くことも出来たろうよ。だが、さすがに１３人も殺せるわけがねぇ…！　俺たちはそこまで間抜けじゃねぇぜ？」
Russian (RU): "Будь нас всего несколько, ты бы могла застрелить нас во сне. Но мы бы ни за что не дали тебе убить 13 человек!.. Всё‐таки мы не так глупы."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Você poderia abater alguns de nós enquanto estivéssemos dormindo. Mas seria impossível matar treze de nós...! Nós não somos tão burros."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「只是幾人的話，那倒也是可以趁人睡覺，用槍來幹掉的吧。但是，無論如何都不可能殺得了 13 人…！我們可沒蠢到這種地步哦？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「只是几人的话，那倒也是可以趁人睡觉，用枪来干掉的吧。但是，无论如何都不可能杀得了 13 人…！我们可没蠢到这种地步哦？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Se ci fossero stati solo pochi di noi, avresti potuto spararci nel sonno. Ma non ti avremmo mai permesso di uccidere 13 di noi...! Dopotutto, non siamo così stupidi."

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "......It would seem so. At any rate, I predicted that the epitaph being solved before the first twilight was the most unlikely result."
Umineko Project (UP): ".........It would seem so. I will admit that the epitaph being solved before the first twilight was the result I considered the most unlikely."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ".........It would seem so. At any rate, I predicted that the epitaph being solved before the first twilight was the most unlikely result."
PC Japanese (JP): 「………そのようですね。少なくとも、第一の晩以前に碑文の謎を解かれるという想定は、もっとも可能性の低いものだと思っていましたから。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………そのようですね。少なくとも、第一の晩以前に碑文の謎を解かれるという想定は、もっとも可能性の低いものだと思っていましたから」
Russian (RU): ".........Видимо, да. Как бы то ни было, я считала разгадку эпитафии ещё до первых сумерек наиболее маловероятным результатом."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........É o que parece. Eu admito que, de todos os resultados que considerei, aquele onde o epitáfio é resolvido era o mais improvável de todos."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………好像是呢。至少關於“碑文之謎在第一晚之前被解開”的假定，是我本以為可能性最低的一種情況。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………好像是呢。至少关于“碑文之谜在第一晚之前被解开”的假定，是我本以为可能性最低的一种情况。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Così sembrerebbe. In ogni caso, avevo previsto che l'epigrafe risolta al primo crepuscolo fosse il risultato più inaspettato."

Steam (ST): "It would seem that us reaching this place was a miscalculation on your part."
Umineko Project (UP): "So, you never accounted for us reaching this place."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「君にとっては、私たちがここへ辿り着くのは、どうやら誤算だったようだね」

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「对你来说，我们抵达此处，好像是属于你的误算呢。」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Hideyoshi
Steam (ST): "...N-Nine hundred tons?! Th-That's unbelievable! If that exploded, the result would be unimaginable! Forget just the mansion blowin' up, ...it'd leave a massive crater!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Ni‐......nine hundred tons?! Th‐that's unbelievable! If that exploded, the result would be unimaginable! Forget just the mansion blowing up, it'd leave a massive crater!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "N, ......900 tons?! Th, that's unbelievable! If that exploded, the result would be unimaginable! Forget just the mansion blowing up...it'd leave a massive crater!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「きゅ、……９００ｔやて？！　と、とんでもない量や！　そない爆発したら、想像もつかん！　屋敷どころかクレーターが開くっちゅうもんやで！！」
Russian (RU): "Де... ......900 тоннами?! Не... немыслимо! Если все они взорвутся, результат будет невообразимым! Чего уж там взрыв особняка, останется огромный кратер!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "No‐......Novecentas toneladas?! I‐Isso é impossível! Sequer dá para imaginar o resultado de uma explosão! Esqueça a mansão indo pelos ares, isso abriria uma cratera na ilha!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「9、……900 吨？！多、多到，不得了吶！這要爆炸了，無法想像吶！豈止炸飛大屋，這可是會開個火山口的吶！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「9、……900 吨？！多、多到，不得了呐！这要爆炸了，无法想象呐！岂止炸飞大屋，这可是会开个火山口的呐！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "N... Novecento tonnellate?! È... è incredibile! Se esplodessero, il risultato sarebbe inimmaginabile! Dimenticatevi di veder saltare in aria solo la villa... rimarrebbe un cratere gigantesco!!"

Umineko Project (UP): "I believe an expert's estimate measured it as a hole several dozen meters deep and a kilometer across."

Umineko Project (UP): "...............There wouldn't be.........even a trace left......"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......There wouldn't be......even a trace left......"

Umineko Project (UP): "There is a special mechanism that controls the detonation of these explosives. ......This switch I just flipped arms the mechanism."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「この爆弾は、特別な仕掛けで爆発します。……私が今、操作した、これが起動のスイッチです」

Steam (ST): The witch toyed with a switch on the top part of the antique clock.
Umineko Project (UP): The witch toyed with a switch on the top of the antique clock.

Steam (ST): "In other words, it won't explode X hours after you flip it. ...It's a time limit bomb that only explodes at midnight.

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「つまり、残り何時間で爆発する、というのではなく。……２４時ぴったりにしか爆発しない時限爆弾というわけね」
Russian (RU): "То есть, они не взорвутся Х часов после переключения. ......Бомба с временным ограничением, которая взрывается только в полночь."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ou seja, não é uma bomba‐relógio que vai explodir quando passar um determinado número de horas após a sua ativação. ......É uma bomba que só explodirá no badalar da meia‐noite."

Steam (ST): "Indeed. ...It is almost 24:00 now. If such an explosion is what you desire, you need only leave it like this."
Umineko Project (UP): "Indeed. .........It is almost midnight now. If an explosion is what you desire, you can just leave it like this."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Indeed. ......It is almost 24:00 now. If an explosion is what you desire, you can just leave it like this."

Steam (ST): The secret base on Rokkenjima had started out as a submarine base.
Umineko Project (UP): The secret base on Rokkenjima had started out as a submarine base.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The secret base on Rokkenjima had started out as a submarine base.
PC Japanese (JP): 六軒島の秘密基地は、当初こそ潜水艦基地として作られた。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A base secreta de Rokkenjima teve início como uma base para submarinos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 六軒島的秘密基地，當初是作為潛水艇基地所建。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 六轩岛的秘密基地，当初是作为潜水艇基地所建。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La base segreta su Rokkenjima era partita come una base per sottomarini.

Steam (ST): However, when that plan reached a standstill, it was redefined as a top secret base for homeland defense.
Umineko Project (UP): However, when that plan reached a standstill, it was redefined as a top secret base for homeland defense.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, when that plan reached a standstill, it was redefined as a top secret base for homeland defense.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、その計画が頓挫した後は、本土防衛のための極秘計画の基地として再定義されていた。
Russian (RU): Но когда этот план зашёл в тупик, его пересмотрели как сверхсекретную базу для защиты родины.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Entretanto, quando o planejamento foi interrompido, ela foi redefinida para ser uma base supersecreta com o propósito de proteger a pátria.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過，在這計劃受挫之後，它被重新定義成了防衛本土的極密計劃中的基地。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不过，在这计划受挫之后，它被重新定义成了防卫本土的极密计划中的基地。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tuttavia, quando quel piano giunse ad un punto morto, venne riorganizzato come base segreta per la difesa della patria.

Steam (ST): A huge plan had been drawn up to have the army and navy perform a pincer attack on American forces if the latter decided to land on Kujuukuri Beach and press towards Tokyo.
Umineko Project (UP): A huge plan had been drawn up to have the army and navy perform a pincer attack on American forces if the latter decided to land on Kujuukuri Beach and press towards Tokyo.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): A huge plan had been drawn up to have the army and navy perform a pincer attack on American forces if the latter decided to land on Kujuukuri Beach and press towards Tokyo.
PC Japanese (JP): 九十九里浜に殺到する米軍上陸部隊を、陸軍と海軍が挟撃する机上の大作戦。
Russian (RU): Огромный план был составлен так, чтобы армия и флот клещами захватили американские войска, если те решат высадиться на берег Куджукури и надавить на Токио.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Um grande plano foi traçado para que o exército e a marinha performasse um movimento de pinça contra as forças estadunidenses, caso os mesmos decidissem aportar na Praia Kujuukuri e seguir em direção Tóquio.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 陸軍與海軍夾擊殺至九十九里濱的美軍登陸部隊的，紙上談兵的大作戰。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 陆军与海军夹击杀至九十九里滨的美军登陆部队的，纸上谈兵的大作战。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Era stato ideato un grande piano per far sì che l'esercito e la marina eseguissero un attacco a tenaglia sulle forze americane se avessero deciso di approdare sulla spiaggia di Kujuukuri e dirigersi a Tokyo.

Steam (ST): As a trump card for this massive defensive maneuver, the navy started stockpiling large quantities of explosives and fuel in absolute secrecy.
Umineko Project (UP): As a trump card for this massive defensive maneuver, the navy started stockpiling large quantities of explosives and fuel in absolute secrecy.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As a trump card for this massive defensive maneuver, the navy started stockpiling large quantities of explosives and fuel in absolute secrecy.
PC Japanese (JP): 海軍はその一大反抗作戦の切り札として、莫大な量の弾薬、燃料を極秘裏に備蓄していた。
Russian (RU): В качестве козыря для этого внушающего оборонительного манёвра, флот начал в абсолютной секретности копить большое количество взрывчатки и топлива.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Para se resguardar, como trunfo para esta maciça manobra defensiva, a marinha começou a estocar grandes quantias de explosivos e combustíveis em absoluto sigilo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 海軍以這一大反擊作戰為王牌，極端保密地暗中儲備了大量彈藥、燃料。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 海军以这一大反击作战为王牌，极端保密地暗中储备了大量弹药、燃料。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Come asso nella manica per questa assurda manovra difensiva, la marina iniziò ad accumulare grandi quantità di esplosivi e carburante in assoluto segreto.

Steam (ST): And the Rokkenjima base was the location of that top-secret stockpile.
Umineko Project (UP): And the Rokkenjima base was the location those were stockpiled at.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And Rokkenjima base was the location those were stockpiled at.
PC Japanese (JP): 六軒島基地は、その極秘の備蓄基地だったのだ。
Russian (RU): И их запасы хранились на базе Роккенджимы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E a base de Rokkenjima foi o local usado para estocá‐los.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 六軒島基地，就是這個極密儲備基地。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 六轩岛基地，就是这个极密储备基地。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E la base di Rokkenjima era la località in cui venivano accumulati.

Steam (ST): The buried explosives weighed 900 tons in total.
Umineko Project (UP): The total weight of the buried explosives was nine hundred tons.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The total weight of the buried explosives was 900 tons.
PC Japanese (JP): 地下に埋められている爆薬の総量は９００ｔ。
Russian (RU): Общая масса погребённой взрывчатки составляла 900 тонн.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O peso total dos explosivos enterrados era de novecentas toneladas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 其地下所埋著的炸藥總量為 900 吨。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 其地下所埋着的炸药总量为 900 吨。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il peso complessivo dell'esplosivo sepolto era 900 tonnellate.

Steam (ST): Also, fearing that the Americans might find out the island's secrets and seize the explosives, they set up a system for the self-destruction of the entire island...
Umineko Project (UP): Also, fearing that the Americans might find out the island's secrets and seize the explosives, they set up a system for the self‐destruction of the entire island......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Also, fearing that the Americans might find out the island's secrets and seize the explosives, they set up a system for the self-destruction of the entire island......
PC Japanese (JP): しかも、米軍に島が見破られ、接収されるかもしれないことを恐れた彼らは、万一の時、その爆薬で島ごと自決できる仕掛けを施した……。
Russian (RU): Кроме того, опасаясь, что американцы могут выведать секреты острова и завладеть взрывчаткой, они создали систему самоуничтожения всего острова......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Acima disso, temendo que o exército estadunidenses pudesse descobrir sobre o segredo da ilha e tomar posse dos explosivos, eles implantaram um sistema de autodestruição que atingiria toda a ilha......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 並且，懼怕搞不好會被美軍識破這個島的真面目，被美軍接收這個島的他們，布置了能在萬一時，可以用這炸藥跟島一起自殺的裝置……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 并且，惧怕搞不好会被美军识破这个岛的真面目，被美军接收这个岛的他们，布置了能在万一时，可以用这炸药跟岛一起自杀的装置……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Inoltre, temendo che gli americani potessero scoprire il segreto dell'isola e si appropriassero dell'esplosivo, idearono un sistema di autodistruzione dell'intera isola...

Steam (ST): Kinzo, who knew all of this, decided not to remove this device, but to tie it in with this strange clock that could trigger such an explosion any night at midnight.
Umineko Project (UP): Kinzo, who knew about all of this, decided not only to keep this self‐destruct system active, but to connect it up to this strange clock that could cause the explosion any night at midnight.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Kinzo, who knew all of this, decided not to remove this device, but to tie it in with this strange clock that could cause the explosion any night at midnight.
PC Japanese (JP): それを熟知する金蔵は、この仕掛けを解除するどころか、毎日２４時に起爆するという奇妙な時計に繋いだのだ。
Russian (RU): Кинзо, знавший обо всём, решил не убирать устройство, а связать его со странными часами, которые могут в каждую полночь вызвать взрыв.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Kinzo, quem sempre soube sobre isso, além de optar por manter este sistema de autodestruição ativo, também o conectou a este estranho relógio que poderia iniciar a explosão no badalar da meia‐noite.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 熟知此事的金藏，不僅沒去解除這個裝置，還把它跟會在每天的 24 點引爆的奇妙時鐘連接在了一起。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 熟知此事的金藏，不仅没去解除这个装置，还把它跟会在每天的 24 点引爆的奇妙时钟连接在了一起。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Kinzo, che era a conoscenza di tutto, decise di non rimuovere questo meccanismo, ma di collegarlo a quello strano orologio che poteva causare un'esplosione ogni notte a mezzanotte.

Steam (ST): ...Kinzo was famous for building up his funds using a vast store of gold, then using those funds in several sink-or-swim gambles, one after another.
Umineko Project (UP): ......Kinzo is famous for building up his funds using a vast store of gold, and then using those funds in several sink‐or‐swim gambles, one after another.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......Kinzo is famous for building up his funds using a vast store of gold, and then using those funds in several sink-or-swim gambles, one after another.
PC Japanese (JP): ……金蔵が、莫大な黄金をもとに軍資金を作り、それを元手に、乗るか反るかの大博打を何度も繰り返したことは有名だ。
Russian (RU): ......Кинзо известен за создание своих фондов за счёт огромного запаса золота и за последующее использование этих фондов в авантюрах вопроса победы или поражения.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Kinzo ficou famoso por obter seus fundos com a sua vasta quantidade de ouro, e assim usar esses fundos em diversas apostas de tudo ou nada, uma após a outra.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……金藏出名就出名在，他曾以巨額黃金為底子籌措到資金，以此為本錢，反覆進行過好多次成敗一線間的大賭博。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……金藏出名就出名在，他曾以巨额黄金为底子筹措到资金，以此为本钱，反复进行过好多次成败一线间的大赌博。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Kinzo è famoso per aver trovato fondi usando una gran quantità di oro, e in seguito aver usato questi fondi in diversi affari “o la va o la spacca”, uno dietro l'altro.

Steam (ST): Just what did his stockpile of gold...and the 900 tons of sleeping explosives mean to him?
Umineko Project (UP): Just what did his stockpile of gold......and the nine hundred tons of sleeping explosives mean to him?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Just what did his stockpile of gold......and the 900 tons of sleeping explosives mean to him?
PC Japanese (JP): その彼にとって、軍資金の黄金と、……島の地下に眠る９００ｔの爆薬は、どのような意味があったのだろう。
Russian (RU): Что его запасы золота...... и 900 тонн заложенной взрывчатки значили для него?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O que esta reserva de ouro......e as novecentas toneladas de explosivos adormecidos significavam para ele?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 對這個他來說，作為其資金的黃金，……與沉睡在島的地下的 900 吨炸藥，具有著怎樣的意義呢？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 对这个他来说，作为其资金的黄金，……与沉睡在岛的地下的 900 吨炸药，具有着怎样的意义呢？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Cosa significano per lui la catasta d'oro... e le 900 tonnellate di esplosivo sepolto?

Steam (ST): At this point, we can only guess. Perhaps the true source of Kinzo's mad power...wasn't the gold after all.
Umineko Project (UP): At this point, we can only speculate. Perhaps the true source of Kinzo's mad power......wasn't the gold after all.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): At this point, we can only guess. Perhaps the true source of Kinzo's mad power......wasn't the gold after all.
PC Japanese (JP): 今となっては、全ては憶測の域を出ない。恐らく金蔵の狂気の力の、真の源は、……黄金ではなかったのだろう。
Russian (RU): На данный момент можно только догадываться. Быть может, истинным источником безумной силы Кинзо...... всё‐таки было не золото.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Agora, só podemos especular. Talvez a verdadeira fonte do ensandecido poder de Kinzo......não fosse o seu ouro.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在現如今，這一切都跳不出臆測的範圍。恐怕金藏的瘋狂之力的，真正的源泉、……並不是黃金吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在现如今，这一切都跳不出臆测的范围。恐怕金藏的疯狂之力的，真正的源泉、……并不是黄金吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): A questo punto, possiamo solo tirare a indovinare. Forse la vera fonte del folle potere di Kinzo... non era l'oro, dopotutto.

Steam (ST): If he lost a big gamble and all that he owned, he could erase this entire island from existence with this device.
Umineko Project (UP): Perhaps it was this device, with which he could erase himself and this entire island from existence if he lost a big gamble and all that he owned.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If he lost a big gamble and all that he owned, he could erase this entire island from existence with this device.
PC Japanese (JP): 大博打に負けて全てを失ったら、いつでもこの世から島ごと消え去れる、仕掛け。
Russian (RU): Проиграв в большой авантюре всё, чем владел, он мог с помощью этого устройства стереть весь остров с лица земли.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Talvez tenha sido este dispositivo, o qual poderia apagar tanto sua existência quanto toda a ilha, caso o mesmo perdesse uma grande aposta e tudo mais que possuía.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 一旦在大賭博中賭輸，失去一切，就隨時可以連島一起，把自己從這世上抹消的，機關。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 一旦在大赌博中赌输，失去一切，就随时可以连岛一起，把自己从这世上抹消的，机关。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Se avesse perso una grossa scommessa e tutto ciò che possedeva, avrebbe potuto cancellare quest'intera isola dall'esistenza con questo macchinario.

Steam (ST): For the rest of his life, he must have put the gold and everything else he had on the line...
Umineko Project (UP): He must have been putting the gold and everything else he had on the line at every point in his life......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): His whole life, he must have put the gold and everything else he had on the line......
PC Japanese (JP): 彼は全ての人生に、黄金と自らの全てを賭けていたに違いない……。
Russian (RU): Всю его жизнь на кону стояло золото и всё, что у него было......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ele deve ter colocado o ouro e tudo mais em jogo durante todos os momentos de sua vida......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 他無疑是把黃金與自己的一切，都押進了他的全部人生……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 他无疑是把黄金与自己的一切，都押进了他的全部人生……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Per tutta la sua vita, deve aver messo in gioco l'oro e tutto il resto...

Steam (ST): Kinzo probably stared at this clock at times, ...sometimes flipping the activation switch and letting it tick down.
Umineko Project (UP): Kinzo had probably looked at this clock at times, ......maybe flipping the activation switch and letting the clock tick down.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Kinzo probably looked at this clock at times, ......maybe flipping the activation switch and letting the clock tick down.
PC Japanese (JP): 金蔵は時にこの時計を見て、……あるいは時に、起爆スイッチを入れ、時の刻みに身を任せただろう。
Russian (RU): Кинзо время от времени смотрел на эти часы...... щёлкал переключателем активации и давал часам тикать.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Kinzo provavelmente olhou para este relógio diversas vezes, ......possivelmente virando seu interruptor e deixando o relógio bater.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 金藏曾時而看著這個時鐘，……或時而，啟動起爆開關，把自身交給流逝的時間吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 金藏曾时而看着这个时钟，……或时而，启动起爆开关，把自身交给流逝的时间吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Kinzo probabilmente guardava quell'orologio di tanto in tanto... forse attivava l'interruttore e lasciava passare il tempo.

Steam (ST): Maybe, whenever he came up against a troubling problem, he would hide in here...and flip the switch...
Umineko Project (UP): Whenever things got tough and he got stuck, maybe he would hide in here and flip the switch......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Whenever things got tough and he got stuck, he would hide in here...and flip the switch......
PC Japanese (JP): 何かの苦難にぶち当たる度にここに篭り、起爆スイッチを入れ……。
Russian (RU): Всякий раз, когда становилось тяжко, и застревая, он приходил сюда... и щёлкал переключателем......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Talvez, toda vez que as coisas ficavam difíceis e ele não via saída, Kinzo se escondia aqui e virava o interruptor......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 每當撞上什麼苦難時，就把自己關在這裡，啟動起爆開關……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 每当撞上什么苦难时，就把自己关在这里，启动起爆开关……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ogni volta che si fosse trovato in difficoltà, si sarebbe nascosto qui... attivando l'interruttore...

Steam (ST): ...With the intention of blowing everything away if he didn't think of a brilliant plan before 24:00 came.
Umineko Project (UP): He might have made it a rule for himself that he would blow everything away if he couldn't think of a brilliant plan before midnight came.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Maybe he decided to blow everything away if he didn't think of a brilliant plan before 24:00 came.
PC Japanese (JP): ２４時を迎えるまでに妙案が思いつかなければ、全てを吹き飛ばしてやると決めていたのではないか。
Russian (RU): Может, решал взорвать всё, если не придумает до 24:00 гениальный план.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ele pode até ter criado uma regra e imposto a si mesmo que ele mandaria tudo pelos ares caso não fosse capaz de pensar em um plano brilhante antes que batesse meia‐noite.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 他會不會曾決定過，若沒在迎來 24 點前想出好辦法，就把一切炸飛呢？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 他会不会曾决定过，若没在迎来 24 点前想出好办法，就把一切炸飞呢？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Forse averebbe deciso di far saltare tutto in aria, se non avesse escogitato un piano geniale prima delle 24:00.

Steam (ST): He could gaze at this mountain of gold, listening to the clock tick towards his death as he searched for an idea...
Umineko Project (UP): He would gaze at the mountain of gold, listening to the clock tick towards his death as he searched for an idea......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): He would gaze at the mountain of gold, listening to the clock tick towards his death as he searched for an idea......
PC Japanese (JP): 黄金の山を眺めながら、死を刻む時計の針の音を聞き、思案を巡らす……。
Russian (RU): Ища идею, он глядел на гору золота, слушая тиканье часов, тикающих ко времени его смерти......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ele devia olhar para a sua montanha de ouro enquanto ouvia o tic‐tac do relógio, conduzindo‐o em direção à morte, enquanto procurava por uma ideia......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 邊望著金山，邊聆聽在刻畫死的時鐘指針的聲音，認真思索……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 边望着金山，边聆听在刻画死的时钟指针的声音，认真思索……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Avrebbe osservato la montagna d'oro, ascoltando le lancette che scorrevano verso la sua morte cercando un'idea...

Steam (ST): Perhaps Ushiromiya Kinzo's real study wasn't the one in the mansion, but this place instead...
Umineko Project (UP): Perhaps Ushiromiya Kinzo's real study wasn't the one in the mansion, but this place instead......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Perhaps Ushiromiya Kinzo's real study wasn't the one in the mansion, but this place instead......
PC Japanese (JP): 右代宮金蔵の本当の書斎は、屋敷の中にあるあの書斎ではなく、ここなのかもしれない……。
Russian (RU): Возможно, настоящий кабинет Кинзо был не в особняке, а здесь......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Talvez o verdadeiro estúdio de Ushiromiya Kinzo não fosse aquele cômodo no interior da mansão, mas sim, este lugar......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 右代宮金藏的真正的書房，或許不是大屋中的那間書房，而是這兒吧……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 右代宫金藏的真正的书房，或许不是大屋中的那间书房，而是这儿吧……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Probabilmente il vero studio di Kinzo Ushiromiya non era quello nella villa, bensì questo posto...

Steam (ST): "...That sort of switch sounds just like Dad. ...So, maybe each time Dad worried about something, all of us kids were put on the line as well..."
Umineko Project (UP): "......This whole setup sounds just like Dad. ......So, maybe each time Dad worried about something, all of us kids were put on the line as well..."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......That sort of switch sounds just like Dad. ......So, maybe each time Dad worried about something, all of us kids were put on the line as well..."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……親父らしい仕掛けだぜ。……俺たち子供は、親父が悩み事をする度に、道連れにされてたかもしれないってわけだ…。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……親父らしい仕掛けだぜ。……俺たち子供は、親父が悩み事をする度に、道連れにされてたかもしれないってわけだ…」
Russian (RU): "......Такие переключатели в духе отца. ......И каждый раз, когда его что‐то беспокоило, все мы, дети, тоже были поставлены на кон..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Todo esse esquema parece mesmo coisa do pai. ......Então, talvez, todas as vezes que ele ficava preocupado com algo, todos nós, crianças, também ficávamos com nossas vidas em jogo..."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……這倒是，挺有爸的風格的機關呢。……每當爸遇事煩惱時，我們這幫小孩都很有可能成墊背的，一起上路呢…」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……这倒是，挺有爸的风格的机关呢。……每当爸遇事烦恼时，我们这帮小孩都很有可能成垫背的，一起上路呢…」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Un aggeggio del genere sembra proprio degno di Papà. ... Quindi, forse ogni volta che lui ha avuto un problema, anche tutti noi ragazzi eravamo in pericolo..."

Steam (ST): "This is Father, ...so it wouldn't be unthinkable..."
Umineko Project (UP): "For our Father, ......it wouldn't be unthinkable......"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Se estamos falando do nosso pai, ......isso não me parece impossível......"

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「既然是那位爸，……那就不无可能呢……」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Per nostro Padre... non sarebbe impensabile..."

Steam (ST): "This device now belongs to all of you. ...If you desire a massive explosion, use it whenever you please."
Umineko Project (UP): "This device now belongs to all of you. ......If you want a massive explosion, use it whenever you please."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Agora, este dispositivo pertence a vocês. ......Se desejarem por uma grande explosão, à vontade para usarem quando bem desejarem."

Steam (ST): "A-Are you crazy...?! Who'd want a big explosion...?!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "A‐are you crazy...?! Who'd want a big explosion...?!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "A, are you crazy...?! Who'd want a big explosion...?!!"

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「说、说啥傻话呐…！谁会想来场大爆炸呐…！！」

Steam (ST): "...These explosives are half a century old, right? Would they really go off?"
Umineko Project (UP): "......These explosives are half a century old, right? Would they really go off?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Esses explosivos já tem meio século, né? Eles podem mesmo explodir?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……這是半個世紀前的炸彈了吧？真的會爆炸？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……这是半个世纪前的炸弹了吧？真的会爆炸？」

Umineko Project (UP): "Yes, of course. The explosives and the fuses are still working. ......I tested them myself."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss

Umineko Project (UP): "Yes, now I finally understand. So that's why the shrine disappeared without a trace..."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「そうか、やっとわかったよ。鎮守の社が跡形もなく消え去ったのは、そういうわけか…」

Steam (ST): That summer, the shrine had disappeared completely, along with the reef under it.
Umineko Project (UP): This summer, the shrine had disappeared without a trace, along with the reef under it.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): この夏、鎮守の社が、岩礁ごと、跡形もなく消え去った。
Russian (RU): Этим летом святыня бесследно исчезла вместе с рифом.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Neste verão, um santuário desapareceu sem deixar rastros, junto com o escolho onde foi erguido.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在這年夏天，鎮守之社跟岩礁一起，不留踪跡地消失了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在这年夏天，镇守之社跟岩礁一起，不留踪迹地消失了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Questa estate, il tempio è scomparso senza lasciare traccia, insieme agli scogli sotto di esso.

Steam (ST): Though people found it odd that the waves could have wiped it out so completely, no one paid it much mind.
Umineko Project (UP): It felt strange that the waves could have destroyed it without a trace like that, but no one had paid it much mind.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It felt strange that the waves could have destroyed it without a trace like that, but no one had paid it much mind.
PC Japanese (JP): 波でさらわれたくらいで、ああも跡形なく消えるだろうかと違和感を覚えたことはあったが、それ以上は何も思わなかった。
Russian (RU): Казалось странным то, что волны смыли её, не оставив следа, но никто не обратил на это особого внимания.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Foi realmente estranho imaginar que as ondas poderiam tê‐lo destruído sem deixar nenhum vestígio, mas ninguém deu muita bola para o ocorrido.

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 繪羽與霧江拿出彼此的筆記用具，把魔女所說的 8 位數字抄了下來。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 绘羽与雾江拿出彼此的笔记用具，把魔女所说的 8 位数字抄了下来。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sia Eva che Kyrie tirarono fuori una penna e un block note e iniziarono a scrivere le otto cifre pronunciate dalla strega.

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "......That is everything I have to tell you and to give you. ...I will say nothing more. All of my tasks have been completed."
Umineko Project (UP): ".........That is everything I have to tell you and give you. ......I will say nothing more. All of my tasks have been completed."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「………これで、私から皆さんへ伝えること、そして受け渡すものは全て終わりです。……もう私は、自ら何も喋りません。役目を全て、終えましたので。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………これで、私から皆さんへ伝えること、そして受け渡すものは全て終わりです。……もう私は、自ら何も喋りません。役目を全て、終えましたので」
Russian (RU): ".........Это всё, что мне нужно было сказать и дать вам. ......Больше я ничего не скажу. Все мои задачи завершены."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Isto é tudo o que eu queria dizer e dar a vocês. ......Não direi mais nada. Todas os meus deveres foram cumpridos."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………至此，我已把要告訴大家的事、要給大家的東西，全部講完、給完了。……我再也不會自己開口說任何話了。因為，我已經完成了我的所有任務。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………至此，我已把要告诉大家的事、要给大家的东西，全部讲完、给完了。……我再也不会自己开口说任何话了。因为，我已经完成了我的所有任务。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Questo è tutto ciò che ho da dirvi e da darvi. ... Non dirò altro. Tutti i miei compiti sono stati completati."

Steam (ST): After saying this, the witch spun around...and sat down on the bed.
Umineko Project (UP): After saying this, the witch spun around......and sat down on the bed.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 魔女はそう告げると、踵を返し、……ベッドに腰掛ける。
Russian (RU): Сказав это, ведьма развернулась...... и села на кровать.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Após dizer isso, a bruxa virou‐se......e sentou‐se na cama.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 魔女告知此言後，轉過腳後跟，……坐到了床上。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 魔女告知此言后，转过脚后跟，……坐到了床上。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dopo aver detto ciò, la strega si girò... e si sedette sul letto.

Steam (ST): She wasn't even looking at the others anymore.
Umineko Project (UP): She wasn't even looking at the others anymore.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She wasn't even looking at the others anymore.
PC Japanese (JP): もうこっちを見てさえいない。
Russian (RU): Она даже больше не смотрела на остальных.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela já não estava mais olhando para eles.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 都已經不再看這邊了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 都已经不再看这边了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non guardava nemmeno più gli altri.

Steam (ST): She sat there like an empty husk which had, just as she had said, finished everything it existed to do...
Umineko Project (UP): She sat there like an empty husk which had, just as she had said, finished everything it existed to do......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She sat there like an empty husk which had, just as she had said, finished everything it existed to do......
PC Japanese (JP): 彼女の言うように、もはや自身の全ての役目を終えた、まるで抜け殻のように座っていた……。
Russian (RU): Она сидела как пустая шелуха, которая, как она сказала, закончила всё, что должна была сделать......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela sentou como uma casca vazia que já tinha, bem como havia dito, concluído tudo aquilo pelo qual ela existia para realizar......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 就像她所說的一樣，已經完成了自己所有的任務，就像個空殻子般地坐著……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 就像她所说的一样，已经完成了自己所有的任务，就像个空壳子般地坐着……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sedeva lì come un guscio vuoto che, proprio come aveva detto, aveva fatto tutto ciò per cui era stato creato...

Steam (ST): For a while, everyone watched the witch to see if she would remember something else and start talking.
Umineko Project (UP): For a while, everyone watched the witch to see if she would remember something else and start talking.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): For a while, everyone watched the witch to see if she would remember something else and start talking.
PC Japanese (JP): しばらくの間、一同はそんな魔女が、また何かを思い出して、何かの話を始めてくれるのではないかと待った。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Pelo tempo seguinte, todos observaram a bruxa para ver se ela acabaria se lembrando de mais alguma coisa e começaria a falar novamente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 大家等了一會兒，看看這位魔女，會不會又想起什麼，張口開始講些什麼。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 大家等了一会儿，看看这位魔女，会不会又想起什么，张口开始讲些什么。

Steam (ST): However, she said nothing else.
Umineko Project (UP): However, she said nothing further.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, she said nothing else.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、彼女はもう、何も話しはしない。
Russian (RU): Но она больше ничего не сказала.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Contudo, nada mais a bruxa disse.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然而，她卻已再也不說任何話了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然而，她却已再也不说任何话了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tuttavia, non disse altro.

Steam (ST): The witch who had called herself one of the dead was now little more than a large French doll wearing a black dress...
Umineko Project (UP): The witch who had called herself one of the dead was now little more than a large French doll wearing a black dress......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The witch who had called herself one of the dead was now little more than a large French doll wearing a black dress......
PC Japanese (JP): 自らを亡者と称した魔女は、今やもう、黒いドレスを着た、大きなフランス人形と変わらなくなっていた……。
Russian (RU): Ведьма, назвавшая себя мёртвой, сейчас была почти что большой французской куклой, одетой в чёрное платье......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A bruxa que disse ser um dos mortos, agora não era mais do que uma grande boneca de porcelana usando um vestido preto......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 把自己稱為死者的魔女，現已無異於身著黑禮服的，巨大的法國人偶……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 把自己称为死者的魔女，现已无异于身着黑礼服的，巨大的法国人偶……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La strega che si era definita una dei morti ora era poco più che una grande bambola francese con un vestito nero...

Steam (ST): Gold is the only physical embodiment of magic that can exist in the human world. Since ancient times, even a small bit of it could control men with its magic.
Umineko Project (UP): Gold is the only physical embodiment of magic that can appear in the human world.{n}Since ancient times, even a small fragment of it could control men with its magic.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Gold is the only physical embodiment of magic that can appear in the human world. Since ancient times, even a small bit of it could control men with its magic.
PC Japanese (JP): 黄金こそは、現世に顕現する唯一の、魔力の結晶。太古の昔から、それのわずかなカケラ程度で、人は魔力に操られてきた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 黄金こそは、現世に顕現する唯一の、魔力の結晶。{n}太古の昔から、それのわずかなカケラ程度で、人は魔力に操られてきた。
Russian (RU): Золото — единственное физическое воплощение магии, которое может появиться в человеческом мире.{n}С древних времён даже небольшая часть золота благодаря своей магии могла управлять людьми.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O ouro é a única personificação física da magia que é capaz de aparecer no mundo humano.{n}Desde os tempos anciões, mesmo pequenos fragmentos de ouro podiam controlar os homens com sua magia.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 黃金即正是那，顯現於現世的，唯一的魔力結晶。{n}從遠古時起就一直如此，僅憑一點點碎粒，人就被其魔力所控制。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 黄金即正是那，显现于现世的，唯一的魔力结晶。{n}从远古时起就一直如此，仅凭一点点碎粒，人就被其魔力所控制。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): L'oro è l'unico corpo fisico che la magia può assumere nel mondo umano. {n}Sin dall'antichità, anche una piccola porzione di esso può controllare gli uomini con la sua magia.

Steam (ST): In that case, how much magic power would dwell in it... if it was piled up in a mountain so high you'd have to look up to see the top?
Umineko Project (UP): In that case, how much magic power would dwell in it...if it was piled up in a mountain so high you'd have to look up to see the top?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In that case, how much magic power would dwell in it... if it was piled up in a mountain so high you'd have to look up to see the top?
PC Japanese (JP): それが、見上げるほどに積み上げられていたなら。……この部屋には、どれほどの魔力が充満していたというのだろう。
Russian (RU): Так сколько же магической силы живёт в нём...... если оно навалено в такую высокую гору, что нужно поднять взгляд, чтобы увидеть её вершину?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Nesse caso, quanto poder mágico residiria...em uma montanha de ouro empilhado, tão alto que sequer era possível ver seu topo?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 既然，將它堆到了需要仰視的高度。……那麼這個房間，究竟充斥著多少的魔力呢？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 既然，将它堆到了需要仰视的高度。……那么这个房间，究竟充斥着多少的魔力呢？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In questo caso, quanto potere magico conteneva... se era stato accumulato in una montagna così alta da dover alzare la testa per vedere la cima?

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Steam (ST): "Don't be stupid, we'll split it evenly! Isn't that the obvious solution?!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Don't be stupid, we'll split it evenly! Isn't that the obvious solution?!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「馬鹿言わないでよ、山分けよ！　山分けに決まってんでしょ？！」
Russian (RU): "Не говори глупости, мы разделим его поровну! Разве не очевидное решение?!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Não seja idiota, nós vamos dividir igualmente! Não é o mais óbvio a se fazer?!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「別說傻話，平分喲！這不肯定得平分嘛？！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「别说傻话，平分哟！这不肯定得平分嘛？！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Non essere stupido, divideremo tutto equamente! Non è questa la soluzione più ovvia?!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Steam (ST): "Didn't we say that half of this pile would belong to me, and the other half would be split between the four of us?!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Didn't we say that half of this pile would belong to me, and the other half would be split between the four of us?!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「この山の半分がまず私のもので、さらに半分を四等分するという話だったのではないかね？！」
Russian (RU): "Мы говорили, что одна половина этой груды достанется мне, а другая будет разделена между нами четырьмя, так?!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Não tínhamos dito que metade desta pilha pertenceria a mim e a outra metade seria dividida entre nós quatro?!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「不是說好了，這金山的一半先歸我，然後再把剩下的一半平分成四份麼？！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「不是说好了，这金山的一半先归我，然后再把剩下的一半平分成四份么？！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Non avevamo detto che metà dell'oro sarebbe appartenuta a me, e l'altra metà sarebbe stata divisa tra noi quattro?!"

Steam (ST): The yells of the humans dancing around the gold reverberated throughout the underground room... In front of the pile of gold, they were arguing about how it should be split.
Umineko Project (UP): The yells of the people dancing around the gold reverberated throughout the underground room...{n}In front of the pile of gold, they were arguing about how it should be split.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The yells of the humans dancing around the gold reverberated throughout the underground room... In front of the pile of gold, they were arguing about how it should be split.
PC Japanese (JP): 黄金に踊る人間たちの叫び声が、地下室に響き渡る…。彼らは黄金の山の前で、その分け方について紛糾していた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 黄金に踊る人間たちの叫び声が、地下室に響き渡る…。{n}彼らは黄金の山の前で、その分け方について紛糾していた。
Russian (RU): По подземной комнате эхом отозвались вопли людей, скачущих возле золота...{n}Перед грудой золота они спорили о том, как разделить её.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Os gritos das pessoas dançando ao redor do ouro, reverberavam através da passagem subterrânea...{n}Em frente a pilha de ouro, eles estavam discutindo como dividiriam a mesma.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 被黃金控制住了心智的人們的喊叫聲，回響於地下室…。{n}他們在金山前，對怎麼分配起了糾紛。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 被黄金控制住了心智的人们的喊叫声，回响于地下室…。{n}他们在金山前，对怎么分配起了纠纷。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Le urla degli umani che correvano intorno all'oro risuonavano per tutta la stanza sotterranea... di fronte alla montagna d'oro, litigavano su come dovesse essere divisa.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Steam (ST): "Did you solve the riddle all by yourself, Nii-san? You didn't, right?! The four of us siblings solved it together! Of course we'll split it in four equal parts!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Could you have solved the riddle all by yourself, Nii‐san? You couldn't have, could you?! The four of us siblings solved it together! Of course we'll split it in four equal parts!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Did you solve the riddle all by yourself, Nii-san? You didn't, right?! The four of us siblings solved it together! Of course we'll split it in four equal parts!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「兄さんひとりで謎が解けた？　解けなかったでしょう？！　私たち兄弟４人で解いたのよ？！　四等分で当然でしょうが！！」
Russian (RU): "Ты разгадал загадку сам, брат? Нет, так ведь?! Мы вчетвером разгадали её вместе! Естественно, мы разделим его на четыре равные части!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Você teria conseguido resolver o enigma sozinho, nii‐san? Não teria, teria?! Nós quatro resolvemos ele juntos! É óbvio que vamos dividir em quatro partes iguais!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「哥一個人能解開謎嗎？解不開吧？！這是靠我們兄妹 4 人解開的喲？！平分成四份是理所當然的吧？！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「哥一个人能解开谜吗？解不开吧？！这是靠我们兄妹 4 人解开的哟？！平分成四份是理所当然的吧？！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Hai risolto l'epigrafe tutto da solo, Nii-san? No, giusto?! L'abbiamo risolta noi quattro insieme! Ovviamente divideremo tutto in quattro parti uguali!!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Steam (ST): "Coward! Weren't you the ones who first made that proposal about the gold's distribution?!! How can you disregard that so easily...?!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Coward! Weren't you the ones who first made that proposal about the gold's distribution?!! How can you disregard that so easily...?!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

Russian (RU): "Лицемерка! Разве не вы первыми предложили распределить золото таким образом?!! Как можно так просто это отрицать?!!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Covarde! Não foi você quem fez a primeira proposta sobre como dividir o ouro?! Como pode desprezá‐la dessa forma...?!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「卑鄙！黃金的分配方案，不就是你們自己提議的嗎？！！你們居然只顧自己地出爾反爾…！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「卑鄙！黄金的分配方案，不就是你们自己提议的吗？！！你们居然只顾自己地出尔反尔…！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Codarda! Non eravate voi i primi ad aver proposto questa distribuzione dell'oro?!! Come potete violarla così facilmente...?!!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Steam (ST): "You really think you're in a position to bargain? When you're the ones hiding Dad's death...?!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "You really think you're in a position to bargain? When you're the ones hiding Dad's death...?!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「取引できる立場だと思ってんのか？　親父が死んでることを隠してるくせに…！！」
Russian (RU): "Вы всерьёз думаете, что можете предлагать сделку? После того, как скрыли смерть отца?!!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Acham mesmo que estão em posição de barganhar? Quem foi que ficou escondendo a morte do pai...?!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「嫂子，你覺得你們站在能談條件的立場上嗎？你們明明在隱瞞爸的死訊…！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「嫂子，你觉得你们站在能谈条件的立场上吗？你们明明在隐瞒爸的死讯…！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Pensi davvero di essere in condizione di poter trattare? Quando siete voi ad aver nascosto la morte di Papà...?!!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rosa
Steam (ST): "Y-Yeah, yeah...!! You've been swindling us this whole time, treating Father's wealth as if it were your own...!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Th‐that's right, that's right...!! You've been swindling us this whole time, treating Father's wealth as if it were your own...!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Y, yeah, yeah...!! You've been swindling us this whole time, treating Father's wealth as if it were your own...!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「そ、そうよそうよ…！！　私たちをずっと欺いて、お父様の財産を私物化してきたくせに…！」
Russian (RU): "Д‐да, да!.. Вы всё это время водили нас за нос, относясь к состоянию отца так, будто оно ваше!.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "I‐Isso! Isso mesmo...!! Vocês ficou o tempo todo nos enganando, tratando a fortuna do pai como se fosse sua...!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「就、就是就是…！！你們明明一直在欺騙我們，把爸的財產據為己有…！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「就、就是就是…！！你们明明一直在欺骗我们，把爸的财产据为己有…！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "S-Sì, sì...!! Ci avete truffati per tutto questo tempo, trattando il patrimonio di nostro Padre come se fosse vostro...!"

Steam (ST): "All you need to do is split the gold evenly, and we'll drop all the rest, including that particular issue. It sounds very fair to me."
Umineko Project (UP): "All you need to do is split the gold evenly, and we'll drop all the rest. It sounds very fair to me."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

Steam (ST): "Well, if you insist, go ahead and try splitting it four ways. Let's divide this pile up right now, and you can all take your own shares home.
Umineko Project (UP): "Well, if you're going to say that, let's just try splitting it four ways. Feel free to split this pile in four and carry your own shares home."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Well, if you're going to say that, let's just try splitting it four ways. Feel free to split this pile in four and carry your own shares home.
PC Japanese (JP): 「ほう、そこまで言うなら四等分にしようじゃないか。今すぐこの山を切り分けて、自由に持って帰るがいい。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「ほう、そこまで言うなら四等分にしようじゃないか。今すぐこの山を切り分けて、自由に持って帰るがいい」

Umineko Project (UP): "Look at this ingot. As you can see, there are no official markings, just Father's crest. ......How do you intend to turn unmarked gold into cash?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Steam (ST): "Nnng, ...well..."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Steam (ST): "Have you finally figured it out? This pile of gold may be worth 20 billion yen. However, that's only if you can trade it for cash. Are any of you capable of exchanging this many unmarked, unidentified ingots for cash at the proper rates?!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Have you finally figured it out? This pile of gold may well be worth 20 billion yen. However, that's only if you can exchange it for cash. Are any of you capable of liquidating this many unmarked, unknown ingots at the proper exchange rate without word of it getting out?!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Have you finally figured it out? This pile of gold may be worth 20 billion yen. However, that's only if you can exchange it for cash. Are any of you capable of exchanging this many unmarked, unknown ingots for cash at the proper rates?!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「ようやく気付いたかね？　確かにこの黄金の山には２００億円の価値があるだろう。しかしそれは、換金を経ればの話だ。これだけの大量の、刻印のない正体不明のインゴットを、誰にも知られずに然るべきレートで換金することが、君たちに出来るのかね？！」
Russian (RU): "Поняли наконец? Да, эта груда стоит 20 миллиардов иен. Но только в том случае, если её можно обменять на деньги. Кто‐нибудь из вас способен обменять множество немаркированных, неизвестных слитков на наличные деньги при должных ставках?!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Finalmente entendeu? Esta pilha de ouro pode valer 20 bilhões de iene. Mas só se conseguir trocar ela por dinheiro. Algum de vocês é capaz de liquidar todos esses lingotes de procedência desconhecida e sem registro, utilizando de uma taxa de câmbio adequada sem levantar uma única suspeita?!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「總算發現了麼？的確，這座金山是有 200 億日元的價值吧。但是，要能換錢，才是如此。你們能做到，把如此大量的沒有刻印、來歷不明的金塊，不驚動任何人地以合適的比價換成錢麼？！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「总算发现了么？的确，这座金山是有 200 亿日元的价值吧。但是，要能换钱，才是如此。你们能做到，把如此大量的没有刻印、来历不明的金块，不惊动任何人地以合适的比价换成钱么？！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ve ne siete accorti finalmente? Questa pila d'oro può anche valere 20 miliardi di yen. Tuttavia, questo solo se può essere convertita in denaro. Qualcuno di voi è in grado di scambiare tutti questi lingotti non marchiati per contanti col giusto cambio?!"

Umineko Project (UP): Off to the side, Natsuhi started arguing with Rudolf and his wife, and the grand underground VIP room filled with a cacophony of angry outbursts......

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Fora da reta, Natsuhi começou a discutir com Rudolf e sua esposa; assim o quatro VIP subterrâneo foi preenchido pela cacofonia de estrondosos surtos de fúria......

Umineko Project (UP): Ange's face was starting to contort with pain after being forced to watch this scene for so long.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Após ser forçada a assistir a cena por tanto tempo, o rosto de Ange começou a se distorcer de dor.

Umineko Project (UP): It was only natural, after being shown this abusive argument between her parents and her other relatives.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was only natural, after being forced to watch this abusive argument between her parents and her other relatives.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Após ver aquela abusiva discussão entre seus pais e parentes, era algo natural de se acontecer.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 既然是在被迫看自己的雙親還有親族們髒話連篇地對罵的情景，那這也是難免的事。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Lion
Steam (ST): "...What on earth......?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......What on Earth....."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Che accidenti..."

Steam (ST): It was painful for Lion too. Lion would have tried to intervene and calm them, if that had been possible.
Umineko Project (UP): It was painful for Lion too.{n}Lion would have tried to intervene and calm them, if that had been possible.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was painful for Lion too. Lion would have tried to intervene and calm them, if that had been possible.
PC Japanese (JP): 理御もまた、辛かった。自分がその場にいたなら、彼らを仲裁してなだめたかった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 理御もまた、辛かった。{n}自分がその場にいたなら、彼らを仲裁してなだめたかった。
Russian (RU): Мне тоже было неприятно.{n}Будь я там, можно было бы вмешаться и успокоить их, если возможно.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Também era doloroso para Lion.{n}Se estivesse ao seu alcance, Lion tentaria intervir e acalmá‐los.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 理御心裡也很難受。{n}自己要是在場的話，那就會去出面調解，安撫他們了。
