Steam (ST): The gold isn't going anywhere, right? If you just slow down and think, you'll be able to resolve this.
Umineko Project (UP): The gold wouldn't go anywhere. If they just took their time and thought about it calmly, they would be able to resolve this.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The gold isn't going anywhere. If you just take your time and think, you'll be able to resolve this.
PC Japanese (JP): 黄金は逃げない。冷静に時間をゆっくりと掛ければ、解決できる話なのだ。
Russian (RU): Золото никуда не денется. Как следует подумав, эту проблему можно решить.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O ouro não iria fugir. Se eles simplesmente tirassem um tempo para pensar e se acalmar, chegariam a uma forma de resolver tudo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 黃金不會自己逃走。這是件只要冷靜地慢慢花點時間就能解決的事。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 黄金不会自己逃走。这是件只要冷静地慢慢花点时间就能解决的事。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): L'oro non va da nessuna parte. Se vi prendete un po' di tempo per pensare, sarete in grado di venirne a capo.

Steam (ST): Going by what Eva and the others said, it's clear that'll they need a lot of money before the end of the year.
Umineko Project (UP): Eva and the others had argued that they needed a lot of money before the end of the year, which was understandable.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): From what we've heard from Eva and the others, they need a lot of money before the end of the year.
PC Japanese (JP): 絵羽たちの言い分を聞く限り、年内に大きなお金を必要としていることはわかる。
Russian (RU): Из того, что мы слышали от Евы и остальных, им нужно много денег до конца года.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eva e os demais parentes haviam argumentaram anteriormente que eles precisavam de muito dinheiro até o final do ano, o que era compreensível.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 聽繪羽他們的意見可以知道，他們在本年內需要很大的一筆錢。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 听绘羽他们的意见可以知道，他们在本年内需要很大的一笔钱。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Da ciò che abbiamo sentito da Eva e gli altri, hanno bisogno di un sacco di soldi prima della fine dell'anno.

Steam (ST): However, the billion yen cash card should be more than enough to pay for that.
Umineko Project (UP): However, the billion yen cash card would be more than enough to pay for that.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, the billion yen cash card should be more than enough to pay for that.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、そのお金は１０億円のキャッシュカードで充分に支払える。
Russian (RU): Однако для этого должно быть более чем достаточно банковской карты на миллиард иен.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Porém, o cartão de crédito com um bilhão de iene seria mais do que suficiente para pagar tudo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但是這筆錢，10 億日元的取款卡足以付清。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是这笔钱，10 亿日元的取款卡足以付清。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tuttavia, la carta da un miliardo di yen sarebbe più che sufficiente per pagare quei debiti.

Steam (ST): That would handle their emergency expenses, so they could then convert the gold to cash at their leisure...and just split it amongst themselves.
Umineko Project (UP): With their emergency expenses taken care of, they could liquidate the gold at their leisure, then just split it amongst themselves.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Since it could handle their emergency expenses, they could convert the gold to cash at their leisure, then just split it amongst themselves.
PC Japanese (JP): 火急な支出をそれで満たした上で、ゆっくりと黄金を現金に溶かし、分配すればいいではないか。
Russian (RU): Раз её хватит на их срочные расходы, они могли бы перевести золото в наличные в удобное время и затем просто разделить их между собой.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Com suas despesas emergências liquidadas, eles poderiam gastar o restante do ouro ao poucos, dividindo‐o entre eles.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這不就只需在用取款卡填上十萬火急的支出的基礎上，再慢慢把黃金化為現金分配，不就行了嗎？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这不就只需在用取款卡填上十万火急的支出的基础上，再慢慢把黄金化为现金分配，不就行了吗？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dato che sarebbe sufficiente per coprire queste spese d'emergenza, potrebbero convertire l'oro in contanti con comodo, per poi dividerlo tra di loro tranquillamente.

Steam (ST): Sure, maybe Krauss was the only one capable of converting the gold. That might give him an advantage over the other siblings.
Umineko Project (UP): Sure, maybe Krauss was the only one capable of converting the gold. That might give him an advantage over the other siblings.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Sure, maybe Krauss was the only one capable of converting the gold. That might have given him an advantage over the other siblings.
PC Japanese (JP): 確かに、換金は蔵臼にしか出来ないかもしれない。その分、兄弟での立場は有利かもしれない。
Russian (RU): Да, Краусс был единственным, кто мог перевести золото, и это давало ему преимущество над другими родственниками.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): De fato, talvez Krauss fosse o único capaz de cambiar o ouro. Isso poderia dar a ele uma vantagem sobre os demais.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 的確，換錢或許只有藏臼做得到吧。因此，他或許是在兄妹中處於有利位置吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 的确，换钱或许只有藏臼做得到吧。因此，他或许是在兄妹中处于有利位置吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Certo, forse Krauss era l'unico in grado di poter convertire l'oro. Questo potrebbe avergli dato un vantaggio sugli altri parenti.

Steam (ST): However, this gold couldn't be dealt with by open means. In addition to attracting public attention, it would also lead to various legal problems.
Umineko Project (UP): However, this gold couldn't be dealt with by open means. In addition to attracting public attention, it would also lead to various legal problems.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, this gold couldn't be dealt with by open means. In addition to attracting public attention, it would also lead to various legal problems.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、この黄金は表沙汰に出来ないものだ。世間の好奇の目を引くだけでなく、いろいろ法律上の問題も出てくる。
Russian (RU): Но с этим золотом нельзя иметь дело открытыми методами. В дополнение к привлечению внимания общественности, возникли бы различные правовые проблемы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Entretanto, o ouro não poderia ser tratado por meios públicos. Além de acabar atraindo a atenção do público, também poderia levar a muitos problemas legais.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但是，這筆黃金是不能公開之物。不僅會引來世間好奇的目光，還會出現種種法律上的問題。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是，这笔黄金是不能公开之物。不仅会引来世间好奇的目光，还会出现种种法律上的问题。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tuttavia, non ci si poteva occupare di questo oro con metodi classici. Oltre ad attrarre l'attenzione del pubblico, porterebbe anche vari problemi legali.

Steam (ST): It was better for this secret money to remain secret.
Umineko Project (UP): It was better for this secret money to remain secret.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was better for this secret money to remain secret.
PC Japanese (JP): 裏金は裏金のままにした方がいい。
Russian (RU): Этим тайным деньгам лучше остаться тайной.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Era melhor se ele permanecesse em segredo por ora.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 上不了台面的錢最好讓它繼續不上台面。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 上不了台面的钱最好让它继续不上台面。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sarebbe meglio se questo denaro segreto rimanesse segreto.

Steam (ST): If they wanted to get the largest portions possible, then they should all agree not to tell anyone about this gold.
Umineko Project (UP): If they wanted to get the largest portions possible, then they should all agree not to tell anyone about this gold.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If they wanted to get the largest portions possible, then they should all agree not to tell anyone about this gold.
PC Japanese (JP): 最も彼らが多くの取り分を得ようと思ったら、彼ら全員が、この黄金の存在を口外すべきではないのだ。
Russian (RU): Если они хотят получить крупнейшие возможные части, им всем следует договориться никому не рассказывать о золоте.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se eles queriam obter a maior porção possível, teriam que concordar em não contar a ninguém sobre o ouro.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 一想要怎麼令他們盡可能地分得更多，他們所有人就都應當對“有這筆黃金”的事守口如瓶。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 一想要怎么令他们尽可能地分得更多，他们所有人就都应当对“有这笔黄金”的事守口如瓶。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Se vogliono averne il più possibile, dovrebbero essere tutti d'accordo a non parlare a nessuno di questo oro.

Steam (ST): In other words, to maximize their profits, they would all need to make a gentleman's agreement...to keep this secret.
Umineko Project (UP): In other words, to maximize their profits, they needed a gentleman's agreement that all of them would keep the secret.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In other words, to maximize their profits, they needed a gentleman's agreement that all of them would keep the secret.
PC Japanese (JP): 即ち、彼らが最大利益を享受するためには、全員で秘密を守るという紳士協定が必要なのだ。
Russian (RU): Иначе говоря, чтобы увеличить до предела свою прибыль, им нужно заключить джентльменское соглашение хранить тайну.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Em outras palavras, para maximizar seus lucros, eles precisariam de um acordo de cavalheiros para que todos mantivessem sigilo absoluto.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 也就是說，要享受最大利益，所有人都保守秘密的紳士協定是必不可缺的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 也就是说，要享受最大利益，所有人都保守秘密的绅士协定是必不可缺的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In altre parole, per massimizzare i loro profitti, necessitavano di un accordo tra gentiluomini che tutti loro avrebbero dovuto tenere segreto.

Steam (ST): Krauss did have a slight advantage. However, it was possible for the other relatives to refuse to cooperate and tell the world about the gold.
Umineko Project (UP): Krauss did have a slight advantage. However, it was possible for the other relatives to refuse to cooperate and tell the world about the gold.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Krauss did have a slight advantage. However, it was possible for the other relatives to refuse to cooperate and tell the world about the gold.
PC Japanese (JP): 確かに換金できる蔵臼の立場はやや有利だ。しかし、他の親族たちには、黄金の存在を公にするという非協力が可能なのだ。
Russian (RU): У Краусса имелось небольшое преимущество. Но другие родственники могли отказаться сотрудничать и рассказать миру о золоте.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Krauss tinha uma pequena vantagem. Contudo, era possível que os demais se recusassem a cooperar e contassem ao mundo sobre o ouro.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 的確，能把黃金換成錢的藏臼略佔優勢。但是，其他親族是可以不合作地，把“有這筆黃金”的事公之於眾的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 的确，能把黄金换成钱的藏臼略占优势。但是，其他亲族是可以不合作地，把“有这笔黄金”的事公之于众的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Krauss aveva un leggero vantaggio. Tuttavia, era possibile per gli altri parenti rifiutarsi di cooperare e mettere il mondo a conoscenza dell'oro.

Steam (ST): And then, ...there was also the concealment of Kinzo's death to consider.
Umineko Project (UP): And then, ......there was also the concealment of Kinzo's death to consider.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And then, ......there was also the concealment of Kinzo's death to consider.
PC Japanese (JP): それに、……金蔵の死を隠しているという負い目もある。
Russian (RU): А потом...... к рассмотрению прилагалось ещё и сокрытие смерти Кинзо.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E assim, ......teriam que considerar também o encobrimento da morte de Kinzo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 再者，……他還有隱瞞了金藏的死的一個欠賬。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 再者，……他还有隐瞒了金藏的死的一个欠账。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E poi... c'era anche la faccenda dell'occultamento della morte di Kinzo da considerare.

Steam (ST): Krauss was an investor. He needed not only financial clout, but also a certain degree of public confidence in him.
Umineko Project (UP): Krauss was an investor. He needed not only financial clout, but also a certain degree of public confidence.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Krauss was an investor. He needed not only financial clout, but also a certain degree of public confidence.
PC Japanese (JP): 蔵臼は投資家。資金力だけでなく、ある程度の社会信用も重要な立場だ。
Russian (RU): Краусс — инвестор. Ему нужно не только финансовое влияние, но и определённая степень общественного доверия.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Krauss é um investidor. Influência financeira não é tudo o que ele precisa; um certo grau de confiança pública também é necessário.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 藏臼是投資家。按他所處的立場來說，不僅僅是財力，一定的社會信用也同樣很重要。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 藏臼是投资家。按他所处的立场来说，不仅仅是财力，一定的社会信用也同样很重要。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Krauss era un investitore. Non aveva bisogno solo di abilità finanziarie, ma anche di un certo livello di legami pubblici.

Steam (ST): His advantage isn't big enough for him to act so overbearing.
Umineko Project (UP): His advantage wasn't big enough for him to act so overbearing.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): His advantage isn't big enough for him to act so overbearing.
PC Japanese (JP): 彼が居丈高になれるほど、立場はそう有利ではないはずなのだ。
Russian (RU): Его преимущество для него не настолько большое, чтобы вести себя так властно.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Sua vantagem não era grande o suficiente para que pudesse agir cheio de si.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 他所處的立場理應並未優勢到，能這麼盛氣凌人。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 他所处的立场理应并未优势到，能这么盛气凌人。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il suo vantaggio non è tanto grande da essere supremo.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Lion
Steam (ST): "...The mountain of gold...has made everyone lose their ability to think rationally. ...This isn't an argument between adults. ...It's just a fight between kids."
Umineko Project (UP): "......The mountain of gold......has made everyone lose their ability to think rationally. ......This isn't an argument between adults. ......It's just a fight between kids."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「……みんな、……あの黄金の山に、冷静さを失ってしまってる。……これは、大人の口論じゃない。……ただの子供の喧嘩だ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……みんな、……あの黄金の山に、冷静さを失ってしまってる。……これは、大人の口論じゃない。……ただの子供の喧嘩だ」
Russian (RU): "......Из‐за горы золота...... все они потеряли способность рационально мыслить. ......Это не спор между взрослыми. ......Просто детская стычка."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Essa montanha de ouro......fez todos perderem suas habilidades de pensar racionalmente. ......Isso não é uma discussão entre adultos. ......É uma briga entre crianças."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……諸位，……都因那座金山而失去了冷靜。……這不是，大人的爭論。……只不過是小孩子吵架。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……诸位，……都因那座金山而失去了冷静。……这不是，大人的争论。……只不过是小孩子吵架。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... La montagna d'oro... ha fatto perdere la ragione a tutti. ... Non è una discussione da adulti. ... È solo una lite tra bambini."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "What's so fun about showing us this...? Or is this the game of some new witch...? Are they watching us suffer from somewhere and laughing?!"
Umineko Project (UP): "What's so fun about showing this to us......? Or is this the game of some new witch...? Are they watching us suffer from somewhere and laughing?!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「こんな光景を私たちに見せて、何が楽しいってのよ……。それとも、これが新しい魔女の遊びってわけ…？　私たちが嫌そうな顔をするのをどこかで眺めてて、にやにやしてるってわけ？！」
Russian (RU): "Что такого весёлого в том, чтобы показывать нам это?.. Или это игра какой‐то новой ведьмы?.. Она откуда‐то наблюдает за тем, как мы страдаем, и смеётся?!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Steam (ST): "It's an unshakable fact that this island is still filled with explosives from the war! Then, by coincidence, tomorrow night...something will set it off by chance and the whole thing will explode!! Yes, it'll be an accident! An explosion accident!! What do you say?!! There's no way the police will find out the truth!! This way, we can pull it off!! We can hide the manner of their deaths!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "It's an unshakable fact that this island is still filled with explosives from the war! Then, by coincidence, tomorrow night...something will set it off by chance and the whole thing will explode!! Yes, it'll be an accident! An explosion accident!! What do you say?!! There's no way the police will find out the truth!! This way, we can pull it off!! We can hide the manner of their deaths!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「この島に戦争中の爆薬が未だに残ってるというのは紛れもない事実！　それが明日の夜、偶然！　何かの拍子に間違って爆発してしまうのよ！！　そう、これは事故！　爆発事故ッ！！　どう？！　絶対に警察にはわからない！！　これなら誤魔化せる！！　二人の死体を誤魔化せる！！」
Russian (RU): "Остров по‐прежнему начинён взрывчаткой с войны, и это непоколебимый факт! Завтра ночью, по стечению обстоятельств... она случайно активируется, и всё взорвётся! Да, это будет несчастный случай! Непредвиденный взрыв! Что скажете?!! Полиция ни за что не раскроет правду! Так мы выпутаемся! Мы сможем скрыть то, как они были убиты!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Esta ilha estar repleta de explosivos da época da guerra é um fato incontestável! Então, por coincidência, na noite de amanhã...algo vai se ativar por acaso e tudo vai explodir!! Sim, vai ser um acidente! Uma explosão acidental!! O que me diz?! Nunca que a polícia vai descobrir a verdade!! Assim podemos enganar eles!! Podemos ocultar a forma como foram mortos!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「這島上尚且還留著打仗時的炸藥，這是地地道道的事實！它們在明晚、偶然！因不知出了什麼錯而發生了爆炸！！對、這是場事故！爆炸事故！！如何？！警察絕對不知道！！以這個，能夠蒙混過關！！能把那兩具屍體，糊弄過去！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「这岛上尚且还留着打仗时的炸药，这是地地道道的事实！它们在明晚、偶然！因不知出了什么错而发生了爆炸！！对、这是场事故！爆炸事故！！如何？！警察绝对不知道！！以这个，能够蒙混过关！！能把那两具尸体，糊弄过去！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "È un fatto incrollabile che quest'isola sia ancora piena zeppa di esplosivi dall'epoca della guerra! Poi, per coincidenza, domani notte... qualcosa lo attiverà per caso ed esploderà tutto!! Sì, sarà un incidente! L'incidente di un'esplosione!! Che ne dite?!! È impossibile che la polizia scopra la verità!! In questo modo, ce la possiamo cavare!! Possiamo nascondere il modo in cui sono morti!!"

Steam (ST): "It's perfect, just perfect...!!! After all, it was an accident that they died anyway! We're just changing the type of accident!! Isn't that right? We can think up any story we want!! By chance, the rest of us will happen to be in the hidden mansion tomorrow night! Then, when the explosion accident occurs, we'll be lucky enough to survive!! That story should work!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "It's perfect, just perfect...!!! After all, it was an accident that they died anyway! We're just changing the type of accident!! Isn't that right? We can think up any story we want!! By chance, the rest of us will happen to be in the hidden mansion tomorrow night! Then, when the explosion accident occurs, we'll be lucky enough to survive!! That story should work!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「完璧だわ、完璧よッ…！！！　兄さんたちが死んだのだって事故だもの！　もう一つ、事故が起こるだけの話だわ！！　ね、そうでしょう、あんたたち？！　筋書きは適当に考えるわ！！　とにかく私たちはたまたま明日の夜、隠し屋敷にいた！　そこで偶然、爆発事故が起こって難を逃れた！！　そういう筋書きにすればいいのよ！！」
Russian (RU): "Идеально, просто идеально!!! Ведь они всё равно умерли в результате несчастного случая! Мы всего лишь изменим его тип! Так ведь? Мы можем придумать какую угодно историю! Остальные из нас завтра ночью случайно окажутся в скрытом особняке! И когда прогремит взрыв, нам посчастливится выжить! Эта история должна сработать!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "É perfeito, simplesmente perfeito...!!! No fim, eles morreram mesmo em um acidente! Só vamos mudar o acidente!! Não é isso? Podemos pensar na história que quisermos!! Por pura coincidência, o resto de nós vai estar na mansão secreta amanhã à noite! Então, quando essa explosão acidental acontecer, seremos os sortudos que sobreviveram!! Essa história deve funcionar!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「完美、完美無缺喲…！！！哥他們的死，是因為事故！還有一點，也就只是發生了事故而已哦！！瞧、是這樣吧，諸位？！前後邏輯，就隨便想！！總之，我們正巧在明天晚上，待在了秘密宅邸！在那我們偶然地逃過了，發生的爆炸事故！！用這種前後邏輯就行了喲！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「完美、完美无缺哟…！！！哥他们的死，是因为事故！还有一点，也就只是发生了事故而已哦！！瞧、是这样吧，诸位？！前后逻辑，就随便想！！总之，我们正巧在明天晚上，待在了秘密宅邸！在那我们偶然地逃过了，发生的爆炸事故！！用这种前后逻辑就行了哟！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "È perfetto, semplicemente perfetto...!!! Dopotutto, sono comunque morti per un incidente! Stiamo solo cambiando il tipo di incidente!! Non è così? Possiamo escogitare tutte le storie che vogliamo!! Per caso, il resto di noi sarà nella residenza nascosta domani notte! Poi, quando accadrà l'incidente, saremo abbastanza fortunati da sopravvivere!! Questa storia dovrebbe funzionare!!"

PC Japanese (JP): しかし、絵羽は警察に捕まりたくなどない。
Russian (RU): Но Ева не хотела садиться в тюрьму.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas Eva não queria ser presa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然而，繪羽可不想被警察抓走。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然而，绘羽可不想被警察抓走。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tuttavia, Eva non voleva essere arrestata.

Steam (ST): She didn't like having her share shrink from 5 billion to 300 million, but even that was more than enough to cover the amount she had been trying to wring out of Krauss in the first place.
Umineko Project (UP): She didn't like having her share shrink from 5 billion to 300 million, but even that was more than enough to cover the amount she had been trying to wring out of Krauss in the first place.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She didn't like having her share shrink from 5 billion to 300 million, but even that was more than enough to cover the amount she had been trying to wring out of Krauss in the first place.
PC Japanese (JP): ５０億の分け前が、３億程度に減るのは悔しいが、彼女が蔵臼からせしめようとしていた当初の金額からすれば、それは充分過ぎるものだ。
Russian (RU): Она не хотела, чтобы её доля сократилась с пяти миллиардов до 300 миллионов, но даже этого было бы более чем достаточно, чтобы покрыть сумму, которую она пыталась выжать из Краусса.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela não queria que seu lucro de 5 bilhões encolhesse para 300 milhões, mesmo que isso fosse mais do que suficiente para cobrir a quantia que ela estava tentando arrancar de Krauss no início.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然 50 億減少到 3 億，很叫她不甘心，但從她當初想從藏臼那詐取的金額上想，這就已經綽綽有餘了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然 50 亿减少到 3 亿，很叫她不甘心，但从她当初想从藏臼那诈取的金额上想，这就已经绰绰有余了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non le piaceva che la sua parte diminuisse da 5 miliardi a 300 milioni, ma, in primo luogo, persino quella era più che sufficiente per coprire la somma che stava cercando di spremere da Krauss.

Steam (ST): She wanted to hide what had happened here, even if it meant blowing away 4.7 billion yen.
Umineko Project (UP): She wanted to hide what had happened here, even if it meant blowing away 4.7 billion yen.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She wanted to hide what had happened here, even if it meant blowing away 4.7 billion yen.
PC Japanese (JP): ４７億を吹き飛ばすことになっても、この場を誤魔化したいのだ。
Russian (RU): Она хотела скрыть произошедшее здесь даже если придётся взорвать 4.7 миллиардов иен.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela queria esconder o que aconteceu aqui, mesmo que isso significasse explodir 4,7 bilhões de iene junto.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 哪怕要炸飛 47 億，她也想把這事給瞞住。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 哪怕要炸飞 47 亿，她也想把这事给瞒住。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Voleva nascondere ciò che era successo qui, anche se avrebbe significato far saltare in aria 4. 7 miliardi.

Steam (ST): What would happen if they were arrested?
Umineko Project (UP): What would happen if they were arrested?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): What would happen if they were arrested?
PC Japanese (JP): 自分たちが捕まればどうなる？
Russian (RU): Что будет, если их арестуют?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O que aconteceria se eles fossem presos?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 要是被抓走了，那都會變成什麼樣啊？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 要是被抓走了，那都会变成什么样啊？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Cosa succederebbe se venissero arrestati?

Steam (ST): The life, the company and the trust that Eva had worked so long to build...were things that couldn't be bought back with money.
Umineko Project (UP): The life, the company, and the trust that Eva and her husband had worked so long to build...... Those were things that couldn't be bought back with money.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The life, the company and the trust that Eva had worked so long to build...... Those were things that couldn't be bought back with money.
PC Japanese (JP): 絵羽にとって、今日まで積み上げてきた生活と会社、そして信用は、一度失えばお金では買い戻せないものだ。
Russian (RU): Жизнь, компания и доверие, которое Ева так долго строила...... Всё это нельзя выкупить за деньги.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Suas vidas, a empresa e a confiança que Eva e seu marido construíram ao longo dos anos...... Essas eram coisas que não poderiam ser recuperadas com dinheiro.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 對繪羽來說，積累至今日的生活與公司，還有信用，均是一旦失去就無法用錢買回來的東西。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 对绘羽来说，积累至今日的生活与公司，还有信用，均是一旦失去就无法用钱买回来的东西。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La vita, la compagnia e la fiducia per cui Eva aveva lavorato così tanto per costruire... queste erano le cose che non potevano essere ricomprate con i soldi.

Steam (ST): So, she wanted to hide Krauss and Natsuhi's deaths, even if it meant blowing up all 4.7 billion yen worth of her gold...!
Umineko Project (UP): So, she wanted to hide Krauss and Natsuhi's deaths, even if it meant blowing up all 4.7 billion yen worth of her gold...!
Original Witch Hunt (OG): So, she wanted to hide Krauss and Natsuhi's deaths, even if it meant blowing up all 4.7 billion yen worth of her gold...!
PC Japanese (JP): だから、４７億ごと全てを吹き飛ばしてでも、蔵臼たちの死をなかったことにしたい…！
Russian (RU): Поэтому она хотела скрыть смерти Краусса и Нацухи даже если придётся взорвать все 4.7 миллиардов её золота!..
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por isso, ela queria ocultar as mortes de Krauss e Natsuhi, mesmo que isso significasse explodir sua parte de 4.7 bilhões em ouro...!
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，哪怕要搭上 47 億把一切都炸飛，她也希望把藏臼他們的死，化為烏有…！
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，哪怕要搭上 47 亿把一切都炸飞，她也希望把藏臼他们的死，化为乌有…！
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Perciò voleva nascondere le morti di Krauss e Natsuhi, anche se avrebbe significato far saltare in aria l'equivalente di 4. 7 miliardi del suo oro...!

Steam (ST): But from Rosa's perspective, that was just irrational nonsense.
Umineko Project (UP): But from Rosa's perspective, that was just irrational nonsense.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): しかしそれは、楼座から見れば、まるっきり冷静を欠いた世迷言なのだ。
Russian (RU): Но с точки зрения Розы это была не более чем иррациональная ерунда.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas, do ponto de vista de Rosa, isso não passava de uma loucura sem sentido.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 可是，這在樓座眼中看來，就完全是欠缺冷靜的胡話了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 可是，这在楼座眼中看来，就完全是欠缺冷静的胡话了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ma dalla prospettiva di Rosa, ciò era un'irrazionale assurdità.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Steam (ST): "R-Rosaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "R, Rosaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「ろ、楼座ぁあああぁあぁああああああぁッ！！」
Russian (RU): "Ро... Роза‐а‐а‐а‐а‐а‐а‐а!!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「樓、樓座啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「楼、楼座啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "R-Rosaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rosa
Steam (ST): "What do you think you're doing with that gun, Nee-san? ...Are you going to have me die in the explosion too? That'll make finding an excuse even harder. In fact, it'll make it harder to explain away the other two deaths as accidents too..."
Umineko Project (UP): "What do you think you're doing with that gun, Nee‐san? ......Are you going to "misfire" and kill me too? That'll make finding an excuse even harder. In fact, it'll also make it harder to explain away the other two deaths as accidents too..."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "What do you think you're doing with that gun, Nee-san? ......Are you going to have me die in the explosion too? That'll make finding an excuse even harder. In fact, it'll also make it harder to explain away the other two deaths as accidents too..."
PC Japanese (JP): 「なぁに、姉さん。その銃は。……私も暴発ということで殺すの？　言い訳がますます難しくなるわよ。それどころか、蔵臼兄さんたちのことも、事故とは言い難くなるんじゃないかしら…？」
Russian (RU): "Зачем тебе ружьё, сестра?......Собираешься сделать так, чтобы и я умерла при взрыве? Это ещё больше усложнит поиск оправдания. Хотя объяснить случайностями две другие смерти тоже станет сложнее..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "O que acha que está fazendo com essa arma, nee‐san? ......Vai "atirar sem querer" e me matar também? Só vai dificultar ainda mais a mentira. Na verdade, vai fazer com que seja ainda mais difícil explicar as outras duas mortes acidentais..."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「怎麼，姐姐？你這把槍是什麼意思？……要把我也通過“走火”來殺了嗎？你的借口，會越來越難講哦。豈止如此，會不會就連藏臼哥他們，都會難以說成是意外呀…？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「怎么，姐姐？你这把枪是什么意思？……要把我也通过“走火”来杀了吗？你的借口，会越来越难讲哦。岂止如此，会不会就连藏臼哥他们，都会难以说成是意外呀…？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Che cosa pensi di fare con quell'arma, Nee-san? ... Hai intenzione di far uccidere anche me dall'esplosione? Ciò renderà ancora più difficile trovare una scusa. Anzi, renderà più difficile spiegare anche le altre due morti come incidenti..."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rosa
Steam (ST): "Three whole deaths means it'll be quite a large-scale crime. ...It would probably get you the death penalty. Or life in prison, if you're lucky. Even in the best case, you'll probably be put away for more than a decade, right?"
Umineko Project (UP): "If you end up linked to three deaths, that's a fairly huge crime. .........They'll seek the death penalty, most likely. And settle for a life sentence. At the very least, you'll be put away for a good ten‐plus years."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "If three people are killed together, that would become a fairly huge crime. ......It would probably lead to the death penalty. If you're lucky, it'll be life in prison. Even in the best case, you'll be put away for more than a decade, right?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「３人もの死に関わったら、かなりの大事件だわ。………恐らく、求刑は死刑。妥当なところで無期懲役。軽くても１０年以上は食らい込みそうね？」
Russian (RU): "Если будут убиты трое, выйдет весьма обширное преступление. ......Возможно, даже приведёт к смертной казни. Если повезёт, тебе дадут пожизненное. Даже в лучшем случае тебя засадят более чем на десять лет."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Se somar as três mortes, vai virar um crime bem grande. .........É possível pegar pena de morte. No mínimo, uma sentença pra toda vida. No melhor dos casos, vai pegar uma década."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「牽連到 3 人的死，那就是個相當大的大案子了。………恐怕，會被請求判死刑。比較妥當的，就是無期徒刑。就算判輕了，也差不多得坐個 10 多年牢哦？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「牵连到 3 人的死，那就是个相当大的大案子了。………恐怕，会被请求判死刑。比较妥当的，就是无期徒刑。就算判轻了，也差不多得坐个 10 多年牢哦？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Se venissero uccise tre persone insieme, diventerebbe un crimine piuttosto grande. ... Probabilmente porterà alla pena di morte. Se sei fortunata, sarà un ergastolo. Persino nel migliore dei casi, ti metteranno dentro per più di un decennio, no?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rosa
Steam (ST): "Turn yourself in. If you do, this will be no more than a pair of unfortunate accidents. Of course, your jail term won't be too terrible either. ...Don't worry about George-kun. We'll take good care of him. And we'll make sure that your entire share of 5 billion yen is waiting for you when you get back."
Umineko Project (UP): "Give up and turn yourself in. If you do, this'll be no more than a pair of unfortunate accidents. Of course, your prison term won't be too terrible either. ......Don't worry about George‐kun. We'll take good care of him. And we'll make sure that all 5 billion of your share will be waiting for you when you get back."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Give yourself up. If you do, this'll be no more than a pair of unfortunate accidents. Of course, your jail term won't be too terrible either. ......Don't worry about George-kun. We'll take good care of him. And we'll make sure that all 5 billion of your share will be waiting for you when you get back."
PC Japanese (JP): 「大人しく自首しなさいよ。そうすれば、不幸な事故がたまたま重なったことで済ませられるわ。無論、刑期だって大したことはない。……譲治くんのことは安心して。私たちでちゃんと面倒を見ておくわ。姉さんの取り分の５０億はきっちり、手付かずで残しておいてあげるから安心して。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「大人しく自首しなさいよ。そうすれば、不幸な事故がたまたま重なったことで済ませられるわ。無論、刑期だって大したことはない。……譲治くんのことは安心して。私たちでちゃんと面倒を見ておくわ。姉さんの取り分の５０億はきっちり、手付かずで残しておいてあげるから安心して」
Russian (RU): "Сдай себя. Так это будет не более чем пара неудачных несчастных случаев. И твой тюремный срок будет не так велик. ......Не беспокойся о Джордже. Мы о нём позаботимся. И проследим, чтобы все пять миллиардов твоей доли ждали твоего возвращения."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Desista e pense em si mesma. Se fizer como eu disse, não passará de um infeliz acidente. É claro, seu tempo em cana não será tão ruim. ......Não se preocupe com o George‐kun. Nós vamos cuidar bem dele. E vamos ter certeza que seus 5 bilhões ainda vão estar esperando por você quando for solta."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「去老老實實地自首吧。這麼做了，這就能以“不幸的意外偶然撞在一起”了事了哦。都不用說，刑期不會很長。……讓治君的事，放心。我們會好好照料他的。姐姐那份 50 億，我們會好好給姐姐留著不去動的，所以放心。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「去老老实实地自首吧。这么做了，这就能以“不幸的意外偶然撞在一起”了事了哦。都不用说，刑期不会很长。……让治君的事，放心。我们会好好照料他的。姐姐那份 50 亿，我们会好好给姐姐留着不去动的，所以放心。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Consegnati alla polizia. Se lo farai, questi non saranno altro che un paio di sfortunati incidenti. Ovviamente, nemmeno il periodo da scontare sarà troppo terribile. ... Non preoccuparti per George-kun. Ci prenderemo noi cura di lui. {n}E ci assicureremo che tutti i 5 miliardi della tua parte ti aspetteranno quanto tornerai."

Steam (ST): Eva ground her teeth and glared.
Umineko Project (UP): Eva ground her teeth and glared.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 絵羽はギリギリと歯噛みしながら睨みつける。
Russian (RU): Ева стиснула зубы и свирепо глянула на неё.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eva rangiu os dentes e a encarou.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 繪羽幾近極限地咬牙切齒，瞪著樓座。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 绘羽几近极限地咬牙切齿，瞪着楼座。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Eva digrignò i denti e le lanciò uno sguardo truce.

Steam (ST): The Rosa she knew should've been shaking and obeying her commands. And yet, ...Rosa wasn't scared.
Umineko Project (UP): The Rosa she knew should have been shaking and obeying her commands. And yet, ......Rosa wasn't scared.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The Rosa she knew should have been shaking and obeying her commands. And yet, ......Rosa wasn't scared.
PC Japanese (JP): 彼女のよく知る楼座なら、それで震え上がって従順になるはずだった。しかし、……楼座は怯えない。
Russian (RU): Роза, которую она знала, должна дрожать и подчиняться её командам. И всё же...... та не была напугана.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A Rosa que ela conhecia deveria estar tremendo e obedecendo suas ordens. Apesar disso, ......Rosa não estava apavorada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 如若是她所熟知的樓座，那就理應會被此嚇得發起抖來，而變聽話了。可是，……樓座毫不畏懼。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 如若是她所熟知的楼座，那就理应会被此吓得发起抖来，而变听话了。可是，……楼座毫不畏惧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La Rosa che conosceva avrebbe dovuto tremare e obbedire ai suoi ordini. Ciononostante... Rosa non era spaventata.

Steam (ST): Her blank expression... no, that faint smile...was one that Eva had never seen before.
Umineko Project (UP): Her blank expression—no, that slight smile—was one that Eva had never seen before.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Her blank expression... no, that slight smile...was one that Eva had never seen before.
PC Japanese (JP): 絵羽が一度も見たことがないような表情で、淡々と、……いや、薄い笑みさえ浮かべているのだ。
Russian (RU): Её пустое выражение... нет, лёгкую улыбку... Ева никогда раньше не видела.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Sua face inexpressiva — não, seu leve sorriso — era algo que Eva nunca tinha visto antes.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 她以一副繪羽從未見過的表情，冷漠地、……不，她臉上甚至都浮現出了淡淡的笑容。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 她以一副绘羽从未见过的表情，冷漠地、……不，她脸上甚至都浮现出了淡淡的笑容。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La sua espressione vacua... no, quel leggero sorriso... Eva non l'aveva mai visto prima.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rosa
Steam (ST): "Put the gun down, Nee-san. Once you calm down, you'll see that my plan is the best one. ...Jail isn't so bad, right? Think of it as a financial strategy."
Umineko Project (UP): "Put the gun down, Nee‐san. If you calm down, you'll see that my plan is the best one. ......Prison isn't so bad, right? Think of it as a financial strategy."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Put the gun down, Nee-san. If you calm down, you'll see that my plan is the best one. ......Jail isn't so bad, right? Think of it as a financial strategy."
PC Japanese (JP): 「銃を下ろしなさい、姉さん。頭を冷やせば、私の提案が最善だとわかるはず。……いいじゃない、刑務所。経済行為で考えてみて？」
Russian (RU): "Опусти ружьё, сестра. Успокойся, и тогда ты поймёшь, что мой план лучший. ......Тюрьма не так уж и ужасна. Считай это финансовой стратегией."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Abaixa essa arma, nee‐san. Se você se acalmar, vai ver que o meu plano é a melhor opção. ......A prisão não é tão ruim, sabia? Pense nisso como sendo uma estratégia financeira."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「把槍放下，姐姐。等你頭腦冷靜下來，就理應會明白，我的提議是最好的辦法。……有什麼不好的，監獄？就當這是賺錢地想一下吧？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「把枪放下，姐姐。等你头脑冷静下来，就理应会明白，我的提议是最好的办法。……有什么不好的，监狱？就当这是赚钱地想一下吧？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Metti giù il fucile, Nee-san. Se ti calmi, vedrai che il mio piano è il migliore. {n}La prigione non è così male, no? Vedila come una strategia finanziaria."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rosa
Steam (ST): "Even if they put you in for ten years, there will be 5 billion waiting for you when you get out. That's like working for a 500 million yen salary, right? If you think of it that way, won't you enjoy your job more?"
Umineko Project (UP): "Even if they put you in for ten years, there will be 5 billion waiting for you when you get out. That's like working for a 500 million yen salary, right? If you think of it that way, you might even enjoy your job."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Even if they put you in for ten years, there will be 5 billion waiting for you when you get out. That's like working for a 500 million yen salary, right? If you think of it that way, won't you enjoy your job more?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「仮に１０年食らうとしても、釈放されれば５０億が待ってる。それって、年収５億のお仕事ってことでしょう？　そう思えば、お勤めも楽しくなるんじゃない？」
Russian (RU): "Даже если тебя засадят лет на десять, тебя будут ждать пять миллиардов. Это то же самое, что работать за зарплату в 500 миллионов иен, верно? Разве так твоя работа не будет нравиться тебе больше?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Mesmo que fique presa por dez anos, ainda vão ter cinco bilhões esperando por você quando sair. É como se trabalhasse por um salário de 500 milhões de iene ao ano, sabia? Se pensar dessa forma, é capaz de aproveitar ainda mais o seu trabalho."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「哪怕坐了 10 年牢，只要被釋放，你就有 50 億。這可是，年收入 5 億的工作吧？像這麼一想，不也就能開開心心地在牢裡上班了嘛？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「哪怕坐了 10 年牢，只要被释放，你就有 50 亿。这可是，年收入 5 亿的工作吧？像这么一想，不也就能开开心心地在牢里上班了嘛？」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie

Expecting that to go unnoticed is what's really unbelievable. ...We don't want to get the police involved. We'll blow up this island and destroy all the evidence. If it's tough parting with the gold, feel free to grab as much as you can hold. The billion yen on the cash card is more than enough. ...In other words, Eva nee-san was right."

If it's tough parting with the gold, feel free to grab a few ingots. The billion yen on the cash card is more than enough. ......In other words, Eva nee‐san, you're right."

If it's tough parting with the gold, feel free to grab a few ingots. The billion yen on the cash card is more than enough. ......In other words, Eva nee-san was right."

Se é difícil se despedir do ouro, fique à vontade para pegar alguns lingotes. O cartão com um bilhão de iene é mais do que suficiente. ......Ou seja, você estava certa, Eva nee‐san."

Faremo saltare in aria quest'isola e distruggeremo ogni prova. {n}Se è dura dire addio all'oro, sentiti libera di prendere qualche lingotto. {n}Il miliardo di yen sulla carta di credito è più che sufficiente. ... In altre parole, Eva Nee-san ha ragione."

Umineko Project (UP): Oh, how foolish we were... Why didn't we realize sooner?

Chinese Simplified (CN): 啊啊，这是多么愚蠢的傻事啊，为什么没能凭直觉察觉啊？

Umineko Project (UP): Eva and Hideyoshi hurried to pick up the guns that lay at their feet.

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 霧江の銃は、慣れた手つきで再装填を終えている。{n}その構えはまるで、子供が水鉄砲を構えるように無邪気で、そして遊び慣れたものだった。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Kyrie recarregou sua arma com um movimento fluído.{n}A forma como ela a segurava era suave, e certamente lembrava uma criança brincando com uma pistola d'água.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Steam (ST): "So, this flimsy little card is worth a billion yen... ...Sticking with the company would be a waste of time. So, do we close up shop and spend the rest of our lives in some southern country?"
Umineko Project (UP): "So, this thin, little card is worth a billion yen... ......Keeping the company going feels ridiculous now. Shall we close up shop and spend the rest of our lives in some southern country?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "So, this thin, little card is worth a billion yen... ......It'd be pointless to keep the company going. Shall we close up shop and spend the rest of our lives in some southern country?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「この薄っぺらいの１枚で１０億か…。……もう会社も馬鹿らしいぜ。畳んじまって、余生はのんびり、南国で過ごすか？」
Russian (RU): "И эта тонкая, маленькая карта стоит миллиард иен......... Было бы бессмысленно держать компанию. Может, нам свернуть лавочку и провести остаток своих дней на юге?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Então, um cartãozinho desses vale um bilhão de iene...? ......Seria ridículo continuar com a empresa agora. Será que devo fechar as portas e passar o resto das nossas vidas em algum país do sul?"

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「这薄薄的一张，就值 10 亿么…？……连开公司都觉得傻了啊。要不，关门不干，余生就悠然自得地在南国过吧？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Quindi, questa sottile, piccola carta vale un miliardo di yen... sarebbe inutile mantenere ancora la compagnia. Dovremmo chiudere i battenti e passare il resto delle nostre vite in qualche paese del sud?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Steam (ST): "I'm sure you'd get bored right away. Besides, I like seeing you get all worried about some problem, then leap around like a little kid when you finally overcome it."
Umineko Project (UP): "That would just get boring. Besides, I like seeing you get all worried about some problem, then play around like a little kid when you finally overcome it."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "That would just get boring. Also, I like seeing you get all worried about some problem, then play around like a little kid when you finally overcome it."
PC Japanese (JP): 「どうせすぐ飽きるわよ。それに私、トラブルで苦悩したり、それを乗り越えて無邪気に喜んだりしてるあなたが、好きなんだもの。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「どうせすぐ飽きるわよ。それに私、トラブルで苦悩したり、それを乗り越えて無邪気に喜んだりしてるあなたが、好きなんだもの」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Eles foram mesmo todos cabeça‐dura...... ......No momento em que ela explicou sobre a bomba, toda noção de agir amigavelmente desapareceu desta ilha, mas eles falharam em perceber isso."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Steam (ST): "Sorry 'bout this, Aniki, Aneki, Rosa. ...Well, that's life for you. Give me a break, okay? Aniki and Aneki get into a fight, Rosa gets dragged in, and I'm the one who picks up the pieces. ...Just like it's always been, right?"
Umineko Project (UP): "Sorry 'bout this, Aniki, Aneki, Rosa. ......What can I say, that's just how the cookie crumbles. Cut me a break, okay? Aniki and Aneki get into a fight, Rosa gets dragged in, and I run away with the bone. ......Just the same way it's always been, right?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Sorry 'bout this, Aniki, Aneki, Rosa. ......Well, that's just how the cookie crumbles. Give me a break, okay? Aniki and Aneki get into a fight, Rosa gets dragged in, and I'm the one who picks up the pieces. ......Just the same way it's always been, right?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「悪ぃな、兄貴、姉貴、楼座。……まぁ、こいつはたまたまの成り行きだ。勘弁してくれよな。兄貴と姉貴が喧嘩をして、楼座がそれに巻き込まれ。俺がひょいっと漁夫の利をさらう。……昔っからのお約束じゃねぇか、なぁ？」
Russian (RU): "Ничего личного, брат, сестра, Роза. ......О, прямо как раскрошенное печенье. Сколько можно. Брат и сестра затеяли драку, втянули Розу, а я подобрал ошмётки. ......Всё как всегда."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Foi mal, aniki, aneki, Rosa. ......Bem, às vezes isso acontece. Me poupem, tá ok? O aniki e a aneki brigaram, a Rosa se meteu no meio, e quem saiu ganhando fui eu. ......Assim como sempre aconteceu, certo?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「不好意思，大哥、大姐、樓座。……不過，這也純屬偶然。請見諒。大哥和大姐幹起架來，樓座也被拉下水。我不動聲色地坐收漁人之利。……這不就是，咱們從很久以前起就這樣的老一套嘛，是吧？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「不好意思，大哥、大姐、楼座。……不过，这也纯属偶然。请见谅。大哥和大姐干起架来，楼座也被拉下水。我不动声色地坐收渔人之利。……这不就是，咱们从很久以前起就这样的老一套嘛，是吧？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Mi dispiace, Aniki, Aneki, Rosa. ... Beh, così va la vita. Niente di personale, ok? Aniki e Aneki litigano, Rosa si immischia, e io sono quello che raccoglie i pezzi. ... Proprio come è sempre stato, no?"

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): No começo, Rudolf e Kyrie não planejavam matar todo mundo e ficar com a fortuna para eles.

Umineko Project (UP): Kyrie had quickly realized by the size of the gun in her hands that it would probably hold five rounds at a time.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Kyrie had quickly realized by the size of the gun in her hands that it would probably hold five rounds at a time.

Umineko Project (UP): .........Yes. Both Kyrie and Rudolf knew a lot about these guns.

Original Witch Hunt (OG): Rudolf, who had gotten his interest in guns from western movies from his Father, owned a shotgun of a similar design.
PC Japanese (JP): 父親の影響で、西部劇の銃に興味を持っていた留弗夫は、同型の散弾銃を所持していたのだ。

Umineko Project (UP): Since Kyrie had the same skill at handling firearms, they both knew enough about these guns to enjoy shooting together...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Since Kyrie had the same skill at handling firearms, they both knew enough about these guns......to enjoy shooting together...
PC Japanese (JP): そして霧江も同じ銃を扱う資格を持ち、二人で射撃を楽しむほどに、……この銃には精通していた…。
Russian (RU): Поскольку Кирие тоже умело обращалась с огнестрельным оружием, они оба знали об этих ружьях достаточно...... чтобы вместе наслаждаться стрельбой...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Como Kyrie tinha as mesmas habilidades que ele para manusear armas, ambos sabiam o bastante sobre essas armas para se divertirem atirando juntos...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 並且霧江也有使用同樣槍支的執照，兩人精通此槍到了，……能一齊去打靶取樂的地步…。

Umineko Project (UP): Each gun held five rounds. ......That was one short. They didn't have enough to kill everyone.

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quell'incidente fortuito... aveva causato il proiettile mancante.

Steam (ST): It wasn't the second shot. The very first shot, which had accidentally killed Natsuhi, had guaranteed that this massacre would happen...
Umineko Project (UP): It wasn't the second shot. The very first shot, which had accidentally killed Natsuhi, had guaranteed the result of this massacre...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It wasn't the second shot. The very first shot, which had accidentally killed Natsuhi, had guaranteed the result of this massacre...
PC Japanese (JP): 二度目の銃声ではない。最初の、夏妃の暴発事故の時点で、この虐殺劇は約束されていたのだ…。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 二度目の銃声ではない。最初の、夏妃の暴発事故の時点で、この惨劇は約束されていたのだ…。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Não foi o segundo disparo. Foi o disparo inicial, que acidentalmente matou Natsuhi, aquele quem garantiu o resultado deste massacre...

Steam (ST): In this smoke and corpse-filled room of gold, the two of them wore easygoing smiles, hardly any different from those they usually wore...
Umineko Project (UP): In this smoke and corpse‐filled room of gold, the two of them wore easygoing smiles, hardly any different from the ones they usually wore...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In this smoke and corpse-filled room of gold, the two of them wore easygoing smiles, hardly any different from the ones they usually wore...
PC Japanese (JP): 累々と屍の転がる、硝煙の香る黄金の部屋で、二人はあまりにいつもと変わらぬ飄々とした笑顔を浮かべ合う…。
Russian (RU): В забитой трупами золотой комнате, в этом дыму, они вдвоём спокойно улыбались почти так же, как обычно...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Neste quarto de ouro, cercado por fumaça e cadáveres, os dois exibiam sorrisos indolentes, praticamente indiferentes àqueles que costumavam demonstrar...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在倒著好多具屍體，充滿硝煙味的黃金的房間，兩人朝彼此露出了，簡直跟平常毫無區別的灑脫笑容…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在倒着好多具尸体，充满硝烟味的黄金的房间，两人朝彼此露出了，简直跟平常毫无区别的洒脱笑容…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In questa stanza dell'oro, piena di fumo e di cadaveri, loro due avevano sorrisi bonari, assolutamente non diversi da quelli che facevano di solito...

Steam (ST): Rudolf picked up Rosa's gun. Then, he fired a test shot at the wall and ejected the old shell with a smooth motion like Kyrie's.
Umineko Project (UP): Rudolf picked up Rosa's gun. Then, he fired a test shot at the wall and ejected the old shell with a smooth motion like Kyrie's.

PC Japanese (JP): 留弗夫は楼座の銃を拾い上げる。そして、壁に向けて試し撃ちをし、霧江同様の手馴れた仕草で排莢をして見せた。
Russian (RU): Рудольф поднял ружьё Розы, а затем пустил пробную пулю в стену и плавным движением, как Кирие, извлёк старую гильзу.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 留弗夫捡起楼座的枪。接着，他朝墙壁试开了一枪，以跟雾江同样的熟练的动作，弹出了弹壳。

Steam (ST): Kyrie went to the box of bullets on the table, casually picked up a few, and loaded them one after another into her gun.
Umineko Project (UP): Kyrie went to the box of bullets on the table, casually picked up a few, and loaded them one after another into her gun.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Kyrie went to the box of bullets on the table, casually picked up a few, and loaded them one after another into her gun.
PC Japanese (JP): 霧江はテーブルの上に置かれた銃弾の箱から、弾を無造作に掴み、次々に自分の銃に装填している。
Russian (RU): Кирие подошла к коробке с пулями на столе, беспечно подняла несколько и по очереди зарядила ими ружьё.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Kyrie seguiu até a caixa de munição que estava sobre a mesa, casualmente pegando algumas delas e carregando sua arma com as balas, uma após a outra.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 雾江从摆在桌上的子弹盒中胡乱抓起一把子弹，一颗接一颗地装进自己的枪。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Steam (ST): "Set the bomb switch to "on". Then, we just need to wait 24 hours."
Umineko Project (UP): "Set the bomb switch to "on". Then, we just need to wait twenty‐four hours."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Set the bomb switch to 'on'. Then, we just need to wait 24 hours."
PC Japanese (JP): 「爆弾のスイッチをオンに。そしたらあとは２４時間を待つだけよ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「爆弾のスイッチをオンに。そしたらあとは２４時間を待つだけよ」
Russian (RU): "Включи бомбу. Так нам просто нужно будет подождать 24 часа."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Coloque a bomba no "on". Depois é só esperarmos vinte e quatro horas."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「把炸彈開關打開。然後，就只差等到 24 點了。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「把炸弹开关打开。然后，就只差等到 24 点了。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Imposta l'interruttore della bomba su ‘on’. Poi, dobbiamo solamente aspettare 24 ore."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Steam (ST): "Everyone's gonna run wild when morning comes and they can't find us."
Umineko Project (UP): "The others'll make a lot of noise when they realize everyone's missing in the morning."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "The others'll get worried when they realize everyone's missing in the morning."
PC Japanese (JP): 「朝になれば、姿が見えないと騒ぎになるぜ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「朝になれば、姿が見えないと騒ぎになるぜ」
Russian (RU): "Остальные забеспокоятся, когда утром поймут, что все пропали."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Os outros vão fazer um alarde de manhã, quando perceberem que todo mundo sumiu."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「到了早上，他們是會吵著“人不見了”地大鬧起來的啊。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「到了早上，他们是会吵着“人不见了”地大闹起来的啊。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Gli altri si preoccuperanno quando capiranno che tutti quanti mancheranno, questa mattina."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Steam (ST): "Then we just need to make sure they don't."
Umineko Project (UP): "Then we just need to shut them up."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Then we just need to make sure no one gets worried."
PC Japanese (JP): 「騒がせなければいい。」

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Aí é só silenciarmos eles."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「別讓他們鬧就行了哦。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「别让他们闹就行了哦。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Allora dobbiamo assicurarci che nessuno si preoccupi."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf

Umineko Project (UP): "Guess so. ......What about Battler?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

Russian (RU): "Да, наверное. ......А Баттлер?"

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「說的也是。……戰人要怎麼辦？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「说的也是。……战人要怎么办？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Immaginavo. ... E Battler?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Steam (ST): "He's your son. Not mine."
Umineko Project (UP): "He's your son. Not mine."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「あなたの子供よ。私の子供じゃないわ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「あなたの子供よ。私の子供じゃないわ」
Russian (RU): "Он твой сын. Не мой."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ele é seu filho. Não meu."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「那是你的小孩喲。不是我的孩子。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「那是你的小孩哟。不是我的孩子。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "È figlio tuo. Non mio."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Steam (ST): "Don't say that. Look how attached he is to you. He really respects you."
Umineko Project (UP): "Don't say that. He really took a shine to you. He respects you, you know."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Don't say that. Look how attached he is to you. He really respects you."
PC Japanese (JP): 「そういうこと言うなよ。あんなに懐いてたじゃねぇか。あいつ、お前のこと、尊敬してるんだぜ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「そういうこと言うなよ。あんなに懐いてたじゃねぇか。あいつ、お前のこと、尊敬してるんだぜ」

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「別這麼說嘛。他不是跟你挺親的嘛。那小子，可是很尊敬你的哦。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「别这么说嘛。他不是跟你挺亲的嘛。那小子，可是很尊敬你的哦。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Non dire così. Guarda quanto è affezionato a te. Lui ti rispetta davvero."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Steam (ST): "Then think of a clever way to trick him. I'll worry about Ange. You worry about Battler-kun. Fair enough?"
Umineko Project (UP): "Then think of something clever that'll convince him. I'll worry about Ange. You worry about Battler‐kun. Fair enough?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Then think of a clever way to trick him. I'll worry about Ange. You worry about Battler-kun. Fair enough?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「じゃあ、うまいこと言い包める言い訳を考えてね。私は縁寿のことを考える。あなたは戦人くんのことを考える。公平でしょ？」
Russian (RU): "Тогда придумай умный способ обмануть его. Я беспокоюсь об Энджи. Ты — о Баттлере. Достаточно честно?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Então pense em uma boa desculpa para convencê‐lo. Eu me preocuparei com a Ange. Você se preocupa com o Battler‐kun. Justo?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「那麼，你就去想個，能巧妙蒙暈他的藉口。我來想緣壽的事。你來想戰人君的事。挺公平吧？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「那么，你就去想个，能巧妙蒙晕他的借口。我来想缘寿的事。你来想战人君的事。挺公平吧？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Allora pensa ad un modo intelligente di ingannarlo. Io mi preoccupo di Ange. Tu di Battler-kun. Siamo d'accordo?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Steam (ST): "Nng, ...sure."
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Nn... sì."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Steam (ST): "I'm kind to my own children, ...but it's a real pain to be nice to Asumu-san's kid. You understand, I hope?"
Umineko Project (UP): "I may be kind to my own child, ......but it's quite a struggle for me to treat Asumu‐san's kid the same way. You understand, I hope?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "I'm kind to my own children, ......but it's a real pain to be nice to Asumu-san's kid. You understand, I hope?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「私、自分の子供にはやさしいけれど。……明日夢さんの子供にまでやさしくするの、結構、大変なの。わかってるでしょ？」
Russian (RU): "Я добра к своему ребёнку...... но хорошо относиться к ребёнку Асуму настоящее мучение. Ты же понимаешь, я надеюсь?"

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「雖然，我對我自己的孩子很好。……但要對明日夢的孩子也很好，可是十分不容易的哦。你是明白的吧？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「虽然，我对我自己的孩子很好。……但要对明日梦的孩子也很好，可是十分不容易的哦。你是明白的吧？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Io sono gentile con mia figlia... ma è davvero un fastidio esserlo con il figlio di Asumu-san. Tu capisci, spero?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf

Chinese Simplified (CN): [=JPC]

Steam (ST): Kyrie's voice had grown cold.
Umineko Project (UP): Kyrie's voice had grown cold.

Russian (RU): Голос Кирие похолодел.

Umineko Project (UP): Kyrie had acted warmly towards Battler because that had been the adult thing to do.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Kyrie had acted warmly towards Battler because that had been the adult thing to do.

Steam (ST): He was Rudolf's son, so she tried to avoid being hostile, nothing more.
Umineko Project (UP): He was Rudolf's son, so she just tried to avoid being unkind.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): He was Rudolf's son, so she just tried to avoid being unkind.
PC Japanese (JP): 留弗夫にとっての子供でもあるから、邪険にしないだけのこと。
Russian (RU): Он сын Рудольфа, поэтому она старалась избегать грубостей.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ele era filho de Rudolf, por isso ela só precisa evitar ser grosseira.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 由於他還算是留弗夫的小孩，所以才沒去刻薄冷落他罷了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 由于他还算是留弗夫的小孩，所以才没去刻薄冷落他罢了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Era il figlio di Rudolf, quindi aveva solamente provato ad evitare di essere scortese.

Steam (ST): But underneath, he was the son of Asumu, a woman Kyrie still hated even though she was dead.
Umineko Project (UP): But underneath, he was the son of Asumu, the woman whose death had done nothing to quell the hate Kyrie harbored towards her.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): But underneath, he was the son of Asumu, the woman she hated even after the other's death.
PC Japanese (JP): 一皮を向けば、死してなお憎い明日夢の子供なのだ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 一皮を剥けば、死してなお憎い明日夢の子供なのだ。
Russian (RU): Но в душе он был для неё сыном той, кого она ненавидела даже после её смерти.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas não passava de uma fachada, afinal ele era filho de Asumu, a mulher na qual Kyrie ainda nutria ódio, mesmo após a morte da mesma.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 撕去表面上的那張皮，那這就只是，人死了還在恨的明日夢的小孩。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 撕去表面上的那张皮，那这就只是，人死了还在恨的明日梦的小孩。

Steam (ST): Now that she had given birth to Ange and finally built up a new family, ......was Battler's return really such a happy thing for her...?
Umineko Project (UP): Now that she had given birth to Ange and finally built up a new family, .........was Battler's return really such a happy thing for her......?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Now that she had given birth to Ange and finally built up a new family, .........was Battler's return really such a happy thing for her......?
PC Japanese (JP): 縁寿を生み、新しい家族をようやく築けた彼女にとって、………戦人が帰ってきたのは、本当に喜ばしいことだったのだろうか……。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 縁寿を産み、新しい家族をようやく築けた彼女にとって、………戦人が帰ってきたのは、本当に喜ばしいことだったのだろうか……。
Russian (RU): После того как она родила Энджи и наконец создала новую семью......... правда ли возвращение Баттлера было для неё таким счастьем?..
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Agora que ela finalmente deu à luz a Ange e construiu uma nova família, .........o retorno de Battler realmente teria sido algo a se comemorar por parte dela......?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 對生下緣壽，築起新家庭的她來說，………戰人的歸來，真的能算是一件喜事麼……？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 对生下缘寿，筑起新家庭的她来说，………战人的归来，真的能算是一件喜事么……？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ora che aveva dato alla luce Ange e si era finalmente creata una nuova famiglia... il ritorno di Battler era davvero una cosa felice, per lei...?

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Steam (ST): "Get yourself ready. Now that we've come this far, ...we can only go for the billion yen or die trying. If you can't convince Battler-kun, I'm sorry, but I won't be taking any chances."
Umineko Project (UP): "Brace yourself. Now that we've come this far, ......we can only go for the billion yen or die trying. If Battler‐kun is unconvinced, I'm sorry, but I won't be taking any chances."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Get yourself ready. Now that we've come this far, ......we can only go for the billion yen or die trying. If you can't convince Battler-kun, I'm sorry, but I won't be taking any chances."
PC Japanese (JP): 「腹を括って。ここまで来たら。……１０億を掴むか、死ぬかだけよ。戦人くんが、納得しなかったら、悪いけれど、それまでよ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「腹を括って。ここまで来たら。……１０億を掴むか、死ぬかだけよ。戦人くんが、納得しなかったら、悪いけれど、それまでよ」
Russian (RU): "Готовься. Зайдя так далеко...... мы либо получим миллиард иен, либо умрём пытаясь. Если не убедишь Баттлера, уж извини, я не буду рисковать."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "É bom se preparar. Agora que viemos até aqui, ......é ficar com o bilhão ou morrer tentando. Se não convencer o Battler‐kun, sinto muito, mas não abro mão."

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「做好最坏的打算。走到这一步。……接着就只剩，要么抓住 10 亿，要么去死了哦。战人君假如不能接受，那就不好意思，没二话了。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Tieniti pronto. Ora che siamo arrivati a questo punto... possiamo solo puntare al miliardo di yen o morire provandoci. Se non riesci a convincere Battler-kun, mi dispiace ma non correrò alcun rischio."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Steam (ST): "...No need to threaten me. I'll take care of it. I'll find a good story to tell him."
Umineko Project (UP): ".........No need to threaten me. I'll take care of it. I'll find a good story to tell him."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......No need to threaten me. I'll take care of it. I'll find a good story to tell him."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………脅かすなよ。任せろって。うまいこと丸め込んでやるから」

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「我会这么做的。…………听好了？假如战人君对你很重要的话，那就不能在礼拜堂前干掉让治君哟？要是被看到尸体，就麻烦了吧。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Lo farò. ... Abbi cura di te, ora. Se hai davvero a cuore Battler-kun, non uccidere George-kun di fronte alla cappella, ok? Sarebbe un fastidio se ne trovasse il corpo."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Steam (ST): "...Yeah, I know. ...I'll lure him away somehow. We'll be outside, and it's raining. Should be some way to do it."
Umineko Project (UP): "......Yeah, I know. ......I'll lure him away somehow. It's raining outside. Should be some way to do it."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「……あぁ、わかってる。……その辺にうまく誘い出すさ。雨の屋外だ。どうとでもなるさ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……あぁ、わかってる。……その辺にうまく誘い出すさ。雨の屋外だ。どうとでもなるさ」
Russian (RU): "......Да, знаю. ......Заманю его подальше. Снаружи льёт дождь. Должен быть способ."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Sim, eu sei. ......Vou atraí‐lo para longe. Está chovendo lá fora. Devo conseguir fazer isso."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……嗯，明白。……我會把他巧妙引到附近別處去的。下著雨的屋外。總能糊弄過去的。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……嗯，明白。……我会把他巧妙引到附近别处去的。下着雨的屋外。总能糊弄过去的。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Sì, lo so. ... Lo attirerò via da qualche parte. Fuori sta piovendo. Dovrebbe esserci il modo."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Steam (ST): "And you aren't a villain in some old western, got it? Don't grant any last requests or take down any final messages, okay?"
Umineko Project (UP): "And you aren't a villain in some old western, got it? Don't grant any last requests or ask for any last words, okay?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "And you aren't a villain in some old western, got it? Don't grant any last requests or take down any final messages, okay?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「西部劇の悪役じゃないんだからね？　冥土の土産とか、最期に言い残すことはとか、そんなことやっちゃ駄目よ？」
Russian (RU): "И ты не злодей из старого вестерна. Не выполняй никаких последних просьб и не записывай последние слова."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Você não é um vilão do velho oeste, entendeu? Não garanta nenhum último desejo nem peça pelas últimas palavras, ouviu?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「你可不是西部片裡的反派哦？“就當是送你上路的餞別之禮，最後有什麼要說的嗎？”，你可別幹這些哦？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「你可不是西部片里的反派哦？“就当是送你上路的饯别之礼，最后有什么要说的吗？”，你可别干这些哦？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "E tu non sei il cattivo in qualche vecchio film western, ok? Non avverare alcun ultimo desiderio e non portare alcun messaggio d'addio, va bene?"

Steam (ST): Kyrie lifted up her gun again and ran the lever... ...To eject the casing from the round she had killed Gohda with.
Umineko Project (UP): Kyrie lifted up her gun again and pulled on the lever.{n}......To eject the casing from the bullet she had killed Gohda with.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Kyrie lifted up her gun again and pulled on the lever.......To eject the casing from the bullet she had killed Gohda with.
PC Japanese (JP): 霧江は銃を構え直し、レバーハンドルに手を掛ける。……郷田を射殺した弾丸の薬莢を、排莢するために。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 霧江は銃を構え直し、レバーハンドルに手を掛ける。{n}……郷田を射殺した弾丸の薬莢を、排莢するために。
Russian (RU): Кирие ещё раз подняла ружьё и надавила на затвор.{n}......Чтобы извлечь гильзу от пули, которой она убила Году.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Kyrie levantou sua arma e puxou a alavanca.{n}......Para ejetar a cápsula da bala que ela havia usado para matar Gohda.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 霧江拿正槍，用手搗鼓壓彈杆。{n}……而這是為了，彈出射殺鄉田的那顆子彈的彈殻。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 雾江拿正枪，用手捣鼓压弹杆。{n}……而这是为了，弹出射杀乡田的那颗子弹的弹壳。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Kyrie sollevò ancora il suo fucile e tirò il meccanismo a leva. ... Per espellere il bossolo del proiettile con cui lei aveva ucciso Gohda.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Steam (ST): "......Dear... ...Deeeeeeeeear... Waaaaaaahhhhh..."
Umineko Project (UP): ".........Honey...... ......Honeyyyy... Uuuughhhuu{0}u{0}uuu......"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ".........Dear...... ......Deeeeeeeeear... Waaaaaaahhhhh......"
PC Japanese (JP): 「………あなた……。………あなたぁあぁあぁ…。ううぅぅうぅぅぅ…ぅ…。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………あなた……。………あなたぁあぁあぁ…。ううぅぅうぅぅぅ…ぅ…」
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Querido...... ......Queridooo... Uuuughhhuu{0}u{0}uuu......"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………老公……。………老公啊啊啊啊啊…。嗚嗚嗚嗚嗚嗚嗚嗚…嗚…」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………老公……。………老公啊啊啊啊啊…。呜呜呜呜呜呜呜呜…呜…」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Caro... caaaaaarooooo... waaaaaaahhhhh..."

Steam (ST): Eva was holding Hideyoshi's body and crying.
Umineko Project (UP): Eva was holding Hideyoshi's body and crying.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 絵羽は秀吉の亡骸を抱いて泣く。
Russian (RU): Ева держала тело Хидэёши и плакала.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eva estava segurando o corpo de Hideyoshi enquanto chorava.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 繪羽抱著秀吉亡骸痛哭。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 绘羽抱着秀吉亡骸痛哭。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Eva stava stringendo il corpo di Hideyoshi e piangendo.

Steam (ST): She hadn't been shot at all. The bullet had grazed her head...and missed.
Umineko Project (UP): She hadn't been shot at all. The bullet had grazed the side of her head......and missed.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She hadn't been shot at all. The bullet had scraped against the side of her head......and missed.
PC Japanese (JP): 彼女は、撃たれてはいなかった。弾は頭部をぎりぎりかすめ、……外れていたのだ。
Russian (RU): Её вовсе не застрелили. Пуля оцарапала ей голову...... и промахнулась.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela não havia sido baleada. A bala arranhou a lateral de sua cabeça......e passou rente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 她沒有被打中。子彈差之毫釐地擦過其頭部，……打偏了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 她没有被打中。子弹差之毫厘地擦过其头部，……打偏了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non l'avevano affatto colpita. Il proiettile le aveva graffiato la testa di fianco... e aveva mancato.

Steam (ST): She hadn't been playing dead. She really thought that she'd been shot.
Umineko Project (UP): She hadn't been playing dead. She really thought that she had been shot.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She hadn't been playing dead. She really thought that she had been shot.
PC Japanese (JP): 死んだふりをしていたのではない。彼女自身、本当に撃たれたと思ったのだ。
Russian (RU): Она не притворялась мёртвой. Она и вправду подумала, что в неё выстрелили.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela também não estava se fingindo de morta. Eva realmente pensou que havia sido atingida.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這並不是在裝死。她自己都以為，真的被打中了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这并不是在装死。她自己都以为，真的被打中了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non stava facendo finta di essere morta. Pensava davvero di essere stata colpita.

Steam (ST): When Kyrie's gun spat fire, Eva felt something fierce skim past her head... before feeling light-headed and fainting.
Umineko Project (UP): When Kyrie's gun spat fire, Eva felt something swift and fierce scrape past her head...before feeling light‐headed and fainting.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When Kyrie's gun spat fire, Eva felt something swift and fierce scrape past her head... before feeling light-headed and fainting.
PC Japanese (JP): 霧江の銃口が火を噴き、激しい衝撃が頭をかすめた時、貧血のように気が遠退き、彼女は気絶してしまっていたのだ。
Russian (RU): Когда ружьё Кирие пальнуло, Еве почувствовала, как что‐то быстро и яростно оцарапало ей голову и пролетело мимо, а потом у неё закружилась голова, и она потеряла сознание.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando a arma de Kyrie disparou seco, Eva sentiu algo veloz passando raspando violentamente por sua cabeça...antes de sentir uma espécie de anemia e começar a perder a consciência.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在霧江的槍口噴出火舌，激烈衝擊，擦過她的腦袋時，她恰似貧血般地意識遠去，然後昏過去了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在雾江的枪口喷出火舌，激烈冲击，擦过她的脑袋时，她恰似贫血般地意识远去，然后昏过去了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quando il fucile di Kyrie fece fuoco, Eva sentì qualcosa di veloce e ardente raschiare la sua testa... prima di sentirsi la testa leggera e svenire.

Steam (ST): Then, she had awoken in the now silent room of the gold.
Umineko Project (UP): Then, later on, she woke up in the now silent room of the gold.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Then, later on, she woke up in the now silent room of the gold.
PC Japanese (JP): そして彼女は、静寂に包まれた黄金の部屋で、目を覚ます。
Russian (RU): Позже она очнулась в теперь уже безмолвной золотой комнате.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E, tempos depois, ela acordou no, agora silenciado, quarto do ouro.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 接著，她在被靜寂籠罩的黃金的房間中，醒了過來。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 接着，她在被静寂笼罩的黄金的房间中，醒了过来。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Poi, più tardi, si svegliò in quella che ora era la silenziosa stanza dell'oro.

Steam (ST): The remains of her beloved husband lay beside her. As well as Krauss, Natsuhi, and Rosa's corpses.
Umineko Project (UP): The corpse of her beloved husband lay beside her. Along with the corpses of Krauss, Natsuhi, and Rosa.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The remains of her beloved husband lay beside her. And Krauss, Natsuhi, and Rosa's corpses.
PC Japanese (JP): 傍らには愛する夫の屍。蔵臼夫婦の屍に、楼座の屍。
Russian (RU): Рядом с ней лежало тело её любимого мужа, а также трупы Краусса, Нацухи и Розы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O corpo de seu amado marido estava deitado ao lado dela. Junto aos cadáveres de Krauss, Natsuhi e Rosa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在其旁邊是，她所愛著的丈夫的屍體。藏臼夫婦的屍體，樓座的屍體。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在其旁边是，她所爱着的丈夫的尸体。藏臼夫妇的尸体，楼座的尸体。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Le spoglie del suo amato marito giacevano di fianco a lei. E i cadaveri di Krauss, Natsuhi e Rosa.

Steam (ST): It was a room of death and piled up bodies...
Umineko Project (UP): It was a room of death and piled up bodies......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was a room of death and piled up bodies......
PC Japanese (JP): 死屍が累々と横たわる死の部屋だった……。
Russian (RU): Комната смерти и сваленных тел......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Era um quarto da morte, com cadáveres empilhados......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這裡是一個，死屍累累的死之房間……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这里是一个，死尸累累的死之房间……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Era una stanza di morte e di corpi impilati...

Steam (ST): When she had cried all she could over Hideyoshi's body, ...she realized that she still had something she needed to do.
Umineko Project (UP): When she had cried all she could over Hideyoshi's body, ............she realized that she still had something she needed to do.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When she had cried all she could over Hideyoshi's body, ......she realized that she still had something she needed to do.
PC Japanese (JP): 秀吉の亡骸に涙を零していた彼女は、…………その涙を絞り尽くし、自分にはまだやるべきことがあることに気付く。
Russian (RU): Выплакавшись над телом Хидэёши...... она поняла, что ещё должна кое‐что сделать.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando gritou com todas as suas forças sobre o corpo de Hideyoshi, ............ela percebeu que ainda precisava fazer uma coisa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 把淚水滴在秀吉屍骸上的她，…………將這淚水擰盡，意識到了，自己還有應當去做的事。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 把泪水滴在秀吉尸骸上的她，…………将这泪水拧尽，意识到了，自己还有应当去做的事。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quando ebbe finito di piangere più che poteva sul corpo di Hideyoshi... lei capì che aveva ancora qualcosa da fare.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Steam (ST): "...George is in danger... ...George, ...George...!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......George is in danger...... ......George......George......!"
Russian (RU): "......Джордж в опасности...... ......Джордж...... Джордж!.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......O George está correndo perigo......... ......George, ..........George.........!"
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... George è in pericolo... George... George...!"

Steam (ST): They're trying to use the bomb to blow up everything, to bury this whole island with an "explosion accident".
Umineko Project (UP): They're trying to use the bomb to blow up everything, to bury this whole island with an "explosion accident".
Original Witch Hunt (OG): They're trying to use the bomb to blow up everything, to bury this whole island with an 'explosion accident'.
PC Japanese (JP): 彼らは爆弾で全てを吹き飛ばし、この島の全てを爆発事故で葬り去ろうとしている。
Russian (RU): Они хотят взорвать всё и предать весь остров забвению в 'непреднамеренном взрыве'.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eles estão tentando usar a bomba para explodir tudo e afundar esta ilha com uma "explosão acidental".
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 他們意圖用炸彈炸飛一切，想以爆炸事故來埋葬這個島的一切。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 他们意图用炸弹炸飞一切，想以爆炸事故来埋葬这个岛的一切。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Stanno provando ad usare la bomba per far esplodere tutto, per seppellire quest'intera isola con un ‘incidente dell'esplosione’.

Steam (ST): ...Of course.
Umineko Project (UP): ......Eva checked the clock, and was proven right.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......Of course.
PC Japanese (JP): ……やはり。
Russian (RU): ......Конечно.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Eva conferiu o relógio e comprovou sua hipótese.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……果然。
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ovvio.

Steam (ST): As Eva had expected, the switch on the clock was set to the right, which meant that it was active.
Umineko Project (UP): As expected, the switch was set to the right, which meant that it was active.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As Eva had expected, the switch on the clock was set to the right, which meant that it was active.
PC Japanese (JP): 案の定、仕掛け時計のスイッチは、起爆を意味する右側に入れられていた。
Russian (RU): Как Ева и ожидала, переключатель на часах был сдвинут вправо, что означало его активность.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Com já era esperado, o interruptor estava virado para a direita, o que indicava que a bomba estava ativa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不出所料，機關鐘的開關，被撥向了代表起爆的右側。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不出所料，机关钟的开关，被拨向了代表起爆的右侧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Come Eva si era aspettata, l'interruttore sull'orologio era posizionato sulla destra, ciò significava che era attivo.

Steam (ST): Eva moved to flip it to the left...and stopped.
Umineko Project (UP): Eva moved to flip it to the left......and stopped.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Eva moved to flip it to the left......and stopped.
PC Japanese (JP): そのスイッチを左に戻そうとして、……絵羽は手を止める。
Russian (RU): Ева сдвинула переключатель влево...... и остановилась.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eva o moveu, virando para a esquerda......e a desarmou.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 繪羽伸手想去把這開關撥回左邊，……但是，中途停手了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 绘羽伸手想去把这开关拨回左边，……但是，中途停手了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Eva si sbrigò a spostarlo sulla sinistra... e si fermò.

Steam (ST): That's right. As long as this switch points to the right, ...everything that happens will disappear in this night of illusions.
Umineko Project (UP): That's right. As long as this switch points to the right, ............everything that happens on this island will disappear into a night of illusion.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): That's right. As long as this switch points to the right, ......everything that happens will disappear in this night of illusions.
PC Japanese (JP): そう。このスイッチが右にある限り、…………この島の全ては、一夜の幻に消える。
Russian (RU): Точно. Пока он указывает вправо...... всё происходящее в эту иллюзорную ночь исчезнет.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Isso mesmo. Enquanto isto estiver apontando para a direita, ............tudo o que aconteceu nesta ilha desaparecerá em uma noite de ilusões.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 對。只要這開關還朝右，…………這個島的一切，就全將消失為一夜的虛幻。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 对。只要这开关还朝右，…………这个岛的一切，就全将消失为一夜的虚幻。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Esatto. Fin quando questo interruttore punterà verso destra... tutto ciò che succederà scomparirà in questa notte di illusioni.

Steam (ST): Yes, this is an illusion.
Umineko Project (UP): Yes, this is an illusion.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Yes, this is an illusion.
PC Japanese (JP): そう、これは幻。
Russian (RU): Да, это иллюзия.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Sim, é uma ilusão.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 對，這全是虛幻。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 对，这全是虚幻。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sì, questa è un illusione.

Steam (ST): No matter what happens tonight, everything will become muddled and hidden away.
Umineko Project (UP): No matter what happens tonight, everything will become muddled and hidden away.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): No matter what happens tonight, everything will become muddled and hidden away.
PC Japanese (JP): これから何が起ころうとも、全ては有耶無耶となる、幻の一夜。
Russian (RU): Что бы ни произошло этой ночью, всё запутается и скроется.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Não importa o que aconteça esta noite, tudo será embaçado e ocultado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這是，接下來不管發生什麼，都會變成霧里觀花的，幻之一夜。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这是，接下来不管发生什么，都会变成雾里观花的，幻之一夜。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non importa ciò che succede stanotte, tutto diventerà confuso e nascosto.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Steam (ST): "They're probably going to kill everyone else. That has to be it... I'm sure of it...!"
Umineko Project (UP): "They're going to kill everyone else. That has to be it... I'm sure of it...!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "They're probably going to kill everyone else. That has to be it... I'm sure of it...!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「あいつらはきっと、残りのみんなを殺すわ。そうに違いない、絶対に…！」
Russian (RU): "Они, вероятно, собираются убить и всех остальных. Наверняка... Я в этом уверена!.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eles pretendem matar todo mundo. Só pode ser isso... Eu tenho certeza...!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「那幫傢伙，一定會去把剩下的人全殺光的。這點是不會錯的，絕對不會錯…！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「那帮家伙，一定会去把剩下的人全杀光的。这点是不会错的，绝对不会错…！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Probabilmente uccideranno tutti gli altri. Dev'essere così... ne sono sicura...!"

Steam (ST): When she looked at the table with the box of bullets, she saw signs that they had roughly grabbed a bunch of bullets before leaving.
Umineko Project (UP): When she looked at the table with the box of bullets, she saw signs that they had grabbed several large handfuls of bullets from the box.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When she looked at the table with the box of bullets, she saw signs that they had roughly removed the bullets from the box.
PC Japanese (JP): 銃弾の入った箱の置いてあるテーブルを見ると、箱の中の銃弾は、彼らが乱暴に掴み取りをしていった痕跡が残されていた。
Russian (RU): Посмотрев на стол с коробкой пуль, она увидела признаки того, что они достаточно вытащили из коробки.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando ela olhou para a mesa onde estavam as munições, Eva percebeu sinais que indicavam que um punhado de balas havia sido tirada de dentro da caixa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 瞧了眼擺著子彈盒的桌子，發現了，盒中的子彈留有著，曾遭他們粗暴抓走不少的痕跡。

Umineko Project (UP): It clearly showed......that they planned to use that many bullets.

Umineko Project (UP): ......If only to protect just the life of my precious son......

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Mesmo que seja para proteger apenas a vida do meu precioso filho......

Umineko Project (UP): The gun that I dropped when I was shot is stuck with the lever handle open.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The gun that I dropped when I was shot is stuck with the lever handle open.
PC Japanese (JP): 撃たれた時、落とした自分の銃は、レバーハンドルが開いたままの状態で固まってしまっている。
Russian (RU): Ружьё, которое я уронила, когда в меня стрельнули, застряло с открытым затвором.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A arma que eu deixei cair após o tiro estava emperrada com a alavanca levantada.

Umineko Project (UP): No matter how hard I pull, it won't open any further, and it won't close again.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): No matter how hard I pull, it won't open any further, and it won't close again.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Não importava o quanto ela puxasse, ela não abria mais do que aquilo e não iria fechar novamente.

Umineko Project (UP): ......A bullet must have gotten jammed and broken it.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......Apparently, a bullet has gotten jammed, breaking it.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Uma bala deve ter ficado presa e quebrou.

Umineko Project (UP): ......It's just as Kyrie said. Loading a bullet is tough if you aren't used to it.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Exatamente como Kyrie disse. Carregar uma bala é difícil se não estiver acostumada.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Steam (ST): "Please, dear... Lend me your strength... ...Lend me your strength, so that I can protect George..."
Umineko Project (UP): "Please, honey...... Lend me your strength...... .........Help me protect George... ......Lend me your strength......"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Please, dear...... Lend me your strength...... ......Lend me your strength... so that I can protect George......"
PC Japanese (JP): 「お願い、あなた……。力を貸して……。………譲治を守るために、……力を貸して……。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「お願い、あなた……。力を貸して……。………譲治を守るために、……力を貸して……」

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Por favor, querido...... Me dê forças...... .........Me ajude a proteger o George... ......Me empreste sua força......"

Umineko Project (UP): In Hideyoshi's hand was Krauss's gun, which he had been trying to pick up.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Nas mãos de Hideyoshi estava a arma de Krauss, a qual ela estava tentando pegar.

Umineko Project (UP): Eva took it, ......prayed to her husband one more time, and tugged on the lever handle.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Eva took it, ......prayed to her husband one more time, and tugged on the lever handle.

Umineko Project (UP): .........With a light metallic sound, ......the golden casing spun through the air...and bounced off the ground.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......With a light metallic sound, ......the golden casing spun through the air... and bounced off the ground.
