Umineko Project (UP): When she timidly tried to push the lever back, ......this time it returned to its original place without any resistance.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When she timidly tried to push the lever back, ......this time it returned to its original place without any resistance.

Umineko Project (UP): It was the sound of a new bullet being loaded......

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "...Hmph. I figured it'd be something like this. ...Someone's scheming to show me the game that'd disgust me most, just to mock me..."
Umineko Project (UP): "......Hmph. I figured it'd be something like this. ......Someone's scheming to show me the game that'd disgust me the most, so they can laugh at me...."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......Hmph. I figured it'd be something like this. ......Someone's scheming to show me the game that'd disgust me most, so they can laugh at me...."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……ふん。そんなことだろうと思ったわ。……私にとって、一番胸糞の悪いゲームを見せて嘲笑ってやろうって魂胆ね…。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……ふん。そんなことだろうと思ったわ。……私にとって、一番胸糞の悪いゲームを見せて嘲笑ってやろうって魂胆ね…」
Russian (RU): "......Хмф. Я так и знала. ......Кто‐то задумал показать мне самую отвратительную для меня игру и посмеяться надо мной..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Hmph. Imaginei que fosse ser assim. ......Alguém esquematizando exibir um jogo que iria me deixar enjoada, para que assim pudesse ficar rindo de mim...."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……哼。就知道，多半會是這樣。……這是盤算著，給我看對我來說最叫人胸中不快的遊戲，想以此來嘲笑我吧…」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……哼。就知道，多半会是这样。……这是盘算着，给我看对我来说最叫人胸中不快的游戏，想以此来嘲笑我吧…」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Hmph. Immaginavo fosse qualcosa del genere. ... Qualcuno ha intenzione di mostrarmi il gioco che mi disgusta di più, così che possa ridere di me..."

Steam (ST): In the games so far, various people have been suspected of being the culprit or an accomplice.
Umineko Project (UP): In the games so far, various people have been suspected of being the culprit or an accomplice.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Nos jogos até então, várias pessoas já foram suspeitas de serem o culpado ou cúmplice do mesmo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在之前的形形色色的棋局中，一直都有形形色色的人被懷疑為了凶手或共犯。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在之前的形形色色的棋局中，一直都有形形色色的人被怀疑为了凶手或共犯。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Nei giochi finora, molte persone sono state sospettate di essere i colpevoli o dei complici.

Steam (ST): The only difference now was that Rudolf and Kyrie were those suspects...
Umineko Project (UP): The only difference now was that Rudolf and Kyrie were those suspects...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The only difference now was that Rudolf and Kyrie were those suspects...
PC Japanese (JP): そして今度はそれが、留弗夫夫妻になったというだけの話……。
Russian (RU): Сейчас единственная разница в том, что этими подозреваемыми были Рудольф и Кирие...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A única diferença dessa vez é que Rudolf e Kyrie são os suspeitos...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 而本次也就只是，嫌犯成了留弗夫夫妻罷了……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 而本次也就只是，嫌犯成了留弗夫夫妻罢了……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ora l'unica differenza era che quei sospettati erano Rudolf e Kyrie...

Steam (ST): However, to Ange, that was the most infuriating plot twist possible.
Umineko Project (UP): However, that was the most aggravating development possible for Ange.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, that was the most aggravating development possible for Ange.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、縁寿にとっては、腹立たしいことこの上ない展開だった。
Russian (RU): Но для Энджи это худший вариант развития событий.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Contudo, esse era o desenvolvimento mais agravante que poderia existir para Ange.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過，對緣壽來說，這是再也沒有比這更叫她上火了的情節展開。

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tuttavia, quello era il peggior sviluppo possibile per Ange.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Lion
Russian (RU): [=OG]
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): [=UP]
Chinese Traditional (CHT): [=JPC]
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=JPC]

Steam (ST): Even Lion was full of painful thoughts.
Umineko Project (UP): Even Lion was full of painful thoughts.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 理御とて、辛い気持ちでいっぱいだった。
Russian (RU): Даже меня одолели тяжёлые мысли.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Até mesmo Lion estava com a cabeça repleta de pensamentos sofridos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 理御也是，心裡難受得要命。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 理御也是，心里难受得要命。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Persino Lion ebbe la mente piena di pensieri dolorosi.

Steam (ST): Solving the epitaph was supposed to be the only miracle that could lead to a game without a single victim, ...but ironically, the tragedy hadn't been averted even so.
Umineko Project (UP): They had been lucky enough to solve the epitaph, which was the only miracle that could lead to a game with no victims. ......How ironic that they were unable to prevent the tragedy.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Though the solving of the epitaph, which was supposedly the only miracle that could lead to a game with no victims, had occurred, ......how ironic that the tragedy was not averted.
PC Japanese (JP): 碑文を解くという、このゲームから犠牲者を一切出さずに済む唯一の奇跡を得たはずなのに、……惨劇が回避できないなんて、何という皮肉だろう。
Russian (RU): Хотя эпитафию разгадали и поэтому случилось вроде как единственное чудо, способное привести к игре без жертв...... как ни парадоксально, трагедия не была предотвращена.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eles tiveram sorte o suficiente para resolver o epitáfio, o que seria o único milagre capaz prosseguir o jogo sem vítimas. ......É mesmo irônico eles terem sido incapazes de prevenir a tragédia.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 明明理應得到了“解開了碑文，能不讓這局遊戲出現任何犧牲者”的唯一的奇跡，……但慘劇卻竟然無可回避，這真是多麼的諷刺啊。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 明明理应得到了“解开了碑文，能不让这局游戏出现任何牺牲者”的唯一的奇迹，……但惨剧却竟然无可回避，这真是多么的讽刺啊。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Nonostante la risoluzione dell'epigrafe, che si supponeva essere l'unico miracolo che poteva portare ad un gioco senza vittime, fosse avvenuta... era ironico che la tragedia non fosse stata evitata.

Steam (ST): Does this mean we aren't allowed to have a future where we all happily return from this island alive, ...even if the epitaph is miraculously solved before the crime occurs...?
Umineko Project (UP): Does this mean that we aren't allowed to have a future where we all happily return from this island alive, ......even if the epitaph is miraculously solved before the crime occurs...?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Does this mean that we aren't allowed to have a future where we all happily return from this island alive, ......even if the epitaph is miraculously solved before the crime occurs...?
PC Japanese (JP): 私たちには、事件が起こる前に碑文を解くという奇跡に至ってすら、……この島から仲良くみんなで生還するという未来が許されていないのだろうか…？
Russian (RU): Неужели нам не позволено встретить будущее, где все мы счастливо возвращаемся с острова живыми...... даже если эпитафию чудом разгадали до преступлений?..
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Isso significa que não temos permissão para ter nenhum futuro no qual todos retornem feliz e vivos da ilha, ......mesmo que o epitáfio tenha sido milagrosamente resolvido antes do crime acontecer...?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我們哪怕抵達了“在案發前就解開了碑文”的奇跡，……也還是得不到，大家一起親密無間地從這島生還的未來嗎…？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我们哪怕抵达了“在案发前就解开了碑文”的奇迹，……也还是得不到，大家一起亲密无间地从这岛生还的未来吗…？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Questo significa che non ci è permesso avere un futuro in cui tutti quanti ritorniamo vivi felicemente da quest'isola... persino se l'epigrafe viene miracolosamente risolta prima che il crimine avviene...?

Steam (ST): A miracle certainly will not occur.
Umineko Project (UP): There will be...absolutely...no miracles.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): A miracle certainly will not occur.
PC Japanese (JP): 奇跡は、絶対に、起きない。
Russian (RU): Чудо ни за что не случится.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Não haverá...absolutamente...nenhum milagre.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 奇跡，絕對不會發生。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 奇迹，绝对不会发生。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Un miracolo certamente non accadrà.

Steam (ST): ...Those words, which I had heard in one of the Fragments {f:5:Bernkastel} had shown me, raced through my mind...

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Atrás dele, Rudolf demonstrava‐se perfeitamente calmo enquanto mexia com sua arma, inspecionando sua mira.

Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]

Umineko Project (UP): He leaned against the trunk of a tree.

Umineko Project (UP): After he crouched down, trying to cover his wound, ......he was no longer able to stand back up.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): After he crouched down, trying to cover his wound, ......he was no longer able to stand back up.

Steam (ST): George didn't have a clue what was going on. However, he had felt as though something was wrong this whole time.

Original Witch Hunt (OG): George didn't have a clue what was going on. However, he had thought it strange the whole time.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 让治完全搞不懂怎么回事。不过，一直都认为不对劲。

Steam (ST): Of course it was strange that he'd be called out alone to a place like this, at a time like this.
Umineko Project (UP): Of course it was strange that he should be called out to a place like this at a time like this.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Of course it was strange that he should be called out to a place like this at a time like this.

Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......And yet, ......how could he have guessed that something was wrong...?

Umineko Project (UP): After all, ......his own uncle...had told him that his grandfather was calling for him from the family conference. ......How could he have gotten suspicious......?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): After all, ......his own uncle... had told him that his grandfather was calling for him from the family conference. ......How could he have gotten suspicious......?

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Afinal, ......seu próprio tio...havia dito a ele que seu avô estava chamando para a conferência familiar. ......Como ele poderia suspeitar disso......?

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Steam (ST): "...Sorry 'bout this, George-kun. It hurts, doesn't it? If I knew it'd come to this, it would've been kinder to blow out your brains from behind. I thought it'd be too cruel to finish you off before you knew what hit you, but it looks like I got it backwards."
Umineko Project (UP): "......Sorry 'bout this, George‐kun. It hurts, doesn't it? If I knew it'd be like this, it'd have been more merciful to blow your brains out from behind. I thought it'd be too cruel to finish you off before you knew what hit you, but it looks like I got it backwards."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......Sorry 'bout this, George-kun. It hurts, doesn't it? If I knew it'd be like this, it'd have been more merciful to blow your brains out from behind. I thought it'd be too cruel to finish you off before you knew what hit you, but it looks like I got it backwards."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……悪ぃな、譲治くん。痛ぇか？　これなら、背後から脳天をズドンとやった方が慈悲があったよな。何もわからねぇ内にズドンじゃあまりに無慈悲かと思ったんだが、どうやら逆だったらしい。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……悪ぃな、譲治くん。痛ぇか？　これなら、背後から脳天をズドンとやった方が慈悲があったよな。何もわからねぇ内にズドンじゃあまりに無慈悲かと思ったんだが、どうやら逆だったらしい」
Russian (RU): "......Извини, Джордж. Это ведь больно? Если бы я знал, что так будет, взорвать твои мозги сзади было бы более милостиво. Я посчитал, что слишком жестоко кончать с тобой до того, как ты узнаешь, что тебя ударило, но, похоже, ошибся."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Foi mal, George‐kun. Isso dói, né? Se soubesse que seria assim, eu teria feito um disparo mais impiedoso, explodindo seus miolos pelas costas. Eu achei que seria cruel demais acabar com você sem nem saber o que te atingiu, mas parece que o tiro saiu pela culatra."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……不好意思啊，讓治君。很痛麼？這麼來說，還是從背後轟穿你的天靈蓋要更加仁慈呢。雖然我本以為，在你還一無所知時斃了你就實在太冷酷無情了吧，但看來好像是反了呢。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……不好意思啊，让治君。很痛么？这么来说，还是从背后轰穿你的天灵盖要更加仁慈呢。虽然我本以为，在你还一无所知时毙了你就实在太冷酷无情了吧，但看来好像是反了呢。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Mi dispiace, George-kun. Fa male, vero? Se avessi saputo che fosse andata così, sarebbe stato più clemente farti saltare le cervella da dietro. Pensai che sarebbe stato troppo crudele finirti prima che tu sapessi cosa ti aveva colpito, ma sembra che sia andata in modo opposto."

Original Witch Hunt (OG): ".........Wh, ......why, Rudolf oji-san......? Why would......my kind uncle... do... this.........?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「………ど、……どうして……、留弗夫叔父さん……。……あんなに、……やさしかった叔父さんが、……どう……して……………。」

Russian (RU): ".........По... ......почему, дядя Рудольф?.. Зачем...... моему доброму дяде... делать... такое?.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Por‐......Por que, tio Rudolf......? ......Por que o meu......gentil tio......faria......isso............?"

Umineko Project (UP): "Just forget about all this. By tomorrow night, none of it will have happened."

Umineko Project (UP): The casing of the bullet that had pierced George's side fell heartlessly in front of him...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Steam (ST): "Everyone's gonna die in a sudden, unfortunate accident. Until that moment, we'll all be a big, happy family. ...That's how it's gonna be. So don't worry about this. Forget it all."
Umineko Project (UP): "Everyone's gonna die in a sudden, unfortunate accident. Until that moment, we'll all have been a big, happy family. ......That's how it's gonna be. So don't worry about this. Forget it all."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Everyone's gonna die in a sudden, unfortunate accident. Until that moment, we'll all be a big, happy family. ......That's how it's gonna be. So don't worry about this. Forget it all."
PC Japanese (JP): 「突然の不幸な事故で、みぃんな死んじまうのさ。その瞬間まで、俺たち親族は仲良くやってたのさ。……そうなるんだ。だからこいつは、気にするな。忘れろ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「突然の不幸な事故で、みぃんな死んじまうのさ。その瞬間まで、俺たち親族は仲良くやってたのさ。……そうなるんだ。だからこいつは、気にするな。忘れろ」
Russian (RU): "Все умрут в результате неожиданного несчастного случая. А до того момента мы будем большой, счастливой семьёй. ......Вот как всё будет. Поэтому не беспокойся. Забудь обо всём."

Original Witch Hunt (OG): George's hands, which had been covering his wound, dropped lifelessly......
PC Japanese (JP): 譲治の傷口を庇っていた両腕は、だらりと力なく転がる……。
Russian (RU): Прикрывающие рану руки Джорджа безжизненно упали......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): As mãos de George, que estavam sendo usadas para cobrir sua ferida, caíram já sem vida......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 讓治護住傷口的雙臂，無力地垂到地上……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 让治护住伤口的双臂，无力地垂到地上……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Le mani di George, che stavano coprendo la sua ferita, caddero senza vita...

Steam (ST): When Rudolf saw the last glimmer of life leave him, he sighed deeply and looked tired.
Umineko Project (UP): After Rudolf saw the last glimmer of life leave him, he let out a deeply exhausted sigh he'd been holding back for some time.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When Rudolf saw the last glimmer of life leave him, he sighed deeply and looked tired.
PC Japanese (JP): 完全なる死を見届け、留弗夫は大きく脱力しながら、腹の底でずっと溜めていた息を深く吐き出す。
Russian (RU): Увидев, как его покинул последний проблеск жизни, Рудольф глубоко вздохнул с усталым видом.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Assim que Rudolf viu o último brilho da vida o deixando, ele suspirou, exausto, exalando tudo aquilo que estava segurando.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 看到他徹底地死了後，留弗夫頓時渾身沒了力氣，狠狠吐出了，一直積在腹底的那口氣。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 看到他彻底地死了后，留弗夫顿时浑身没了力气，狠狠吐出了，一直积在腹底的那口气。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quando Rudolf vide l'ultimo barlume di vita che lo lasciava, sospirò profondamente e sembrava stanco.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Steam (ST): "Heh, ...hahahahahahahahahaha. ......That was easier than I'd thought."
Umineko Project (UP): "Hahh. ......Ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}haha. .........I expected worse."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Heh, ......hahahahahahahahahaha. .........That was easier than I'd thought."
PC Japanese (JP): 「へ、……はっはははははははは。………案外、こんなもんなんだな。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「へ、……はっはははははははは。………案外、こんなもんなんだな」
Russian (RU): "Хех...... ха‐ха‐ха‐ха‐ха‐ха‐ха. .........Это оказалось проще, чем я думал."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Hahh. ......Ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}haha. .........Achei que seria pior."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「嘿，……哈、哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈。………出乎意料，也就這麼回事呢。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「嘿，……哈、哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈。………出乎意料，也就这么回事呢。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Heh... hahahahahahahahahaha. ... Era più facile di quanto pensassi."

Steam (ST): Rudolf looked up into the dark, rainy sky, the rain drops hitting him full in the face, ...and laughed with an indescribable expression, his tongue hanging out.
Umineko Project (UP): Rudolf looked up into the dark, rainy sky, the rain drops hitting him full in the face, ......and laughed with an indescribable expression, his tongue hanging out.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 留弗夫は闇夜の雨天を見上げ、顔一杯に雨雫を受けながら、……舌をだらりと垂らした、形容できない形相で笑う。
Russian (RU): Рудольф посмотрел в тёмное, дождливое небо — дождевые капли били ему по лицу — и, высунув язык, засмеялся с непередаваемым выражением.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Rudolf olhou para o sombrio céu chuvoso e gotas de chuva atingiram sua face, ......rindo com uma expressão indescritível, ele estalou a língua.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 留弗夫仰望黑夜雨空，邊以整張臉接住落下的雨滴，……邊耷拉下舌頭，以一副無法形容的樣子笑著。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 留弗夫仰望黑夜雨空，边以整张脸接住落下的雨滴，……边耷拉下舌头，以一副无法形容的样子笑着。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Rudolf alzò lo sguardo verso lo scuro, piovoso cielo, con le gocce di pioggia che lo colpivano sul volto... e rise con un'espressione indescrivibile, con la lingua di fuori.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Steam (ST): "I thought my conscience would bug me more. ...Now that it's over, it was pretty easy."
Umineko Project (UP): "I figured my conscience would be giving me a harder time. ......Now that it's over, ...I'm surprised how little I feel."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "I figured there'd be more pangs of conscience than that. ......Now that it's over, it was pretty easy."
PC Japanese (JP): 「もっと、良心が痛むと思ってたぜ。……終わってみりゃ、案外、こんなもんだ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「もっと、良心が痛むと思ってたぜ。……終わってみりゃ、案外、こんなもんだ」
Russian (RU): "Я полагал, что угрызений совести будет больше. ......Было просто."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Pensei que minha consciência iria doer mais do que isso. ......Agora que acabou, ...estou surpreso como nem senti."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「我還以為，會更加良心不安呢。……等幹完了，出乎意料，也就這麼回事。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「我还以为，会更加良心不安呢。……等干完了，出乎意料，也就这么回事。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Immaginavo che ci sarebbero stati più rimorsi di coscienza di così. ... Ora che è finito, è stato piuttosto facile."

Steam (ST): *giggle*giggle*, gahahahahahaha. Rudolf laughed. This was probably just the thing Kyrie had hoped for.
Umineko Project (UP): *chuckle*chuckle*, gahahahahahaha.{n}Rudolf started laughing.{n}This was probably just the thing Kyrie had hoped for.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): *giggle*giggle*, gahahahahahaha. Rudolf laughed. This was probably just the thing Kyrie had hoped for.
PC Japanese (JP): くすくすくす、げらげらげらげら。留弗夫は笑い出す。それはきっと、霧江の目論見通りだったろう。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): くすくすくす、げらげらげらげら。留弗夫は笑い出す。{n}それはきっと、霧江の目論見通りだったろう。
Russian (RU): *хи‐хи*хи‐хи*, га‐ха‐ха‐ха‐ха. Рудольф засмеялся.{n}Наверное, на такое Кирие и рассчитывала.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): *risos*risos*, gahahahahahaha.{n}Rudolf começou a rir.{n}Provavelmente era isso que Kyrie estava esperando.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 呵呵呵，哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈。留弗夫大笑了起來。{n}這一定與霧江所計劃的一樣吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 呵呵呵，哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈。留弗夫大笑了起来。{n}这一定与雾江所计划的一样吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): *giggle*giggle*, gahahahahahaha. Rudolf rise. Questa probabilmente era la cosa in cui Kyrie sperava.

Steam (ST): It had taken considerable effort to kill George.
Umineko Project (UP): It had taken some effort to kill George.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It had taken some effort to kill George.
PC Japanese (JP): 譲治を殺すのに、少なからずの手間を掛けた。
Russian (RU): Чтобы убить Джорджа, потребовалось приложить усилия.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Foi necessário certo esforço para matar George.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在殺讓治一事上，花費了一番不小的工夫。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在杀让治一事上，花费了一番不小的工夫。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ci vollero degli sforzi per uccidere George.

Steam (ST): ...He may have been merciless, but the last traces of a conscience in Rudolf's heart had probably slowed him down.
Umineko Project (UP): ......Though he had been merciless, the last traces of conscience in Rudolf's heart had probably slowed him down.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……無慈悲だったとはいえ、留弗夫の中にわずかにあった良心の呵責が、引き金を鈍らせたのだろう。
Russian (RU): ......Несмотря на его беспощадность, последние остатки совести, вероятно, замедлили Рудольфа.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Embora ele tenha sido impiedoso, os últimos vestígios de consciência no coração de Rudolf provavelmente o atrasaram.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……雖說下手無情，但留弗夫心中那只有一點點的良心的斥責，還是放慢了他扣下扳機的速度吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……虽说下手无情，但留弗夫心中那只有一点点的良心的斥责，还是放慢了他扣下扳机的速度吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Anche se era stato spietato, le ultime tracce di coscienza nel cuore di Rudolf probabilmente lo avevano rallentato.

Steam (ST): However, now that he had killed someone with his own hands, a turning point that few people ever reach, ...Rudolf had finally awakened.
Umineko Project (UP): However, now that he had killed someone with his own hands, a turning point that few people ever reach, ......Rudolf had finally awakened.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, now that he had killed someone with his own hands, a turning point that few people ever reach, ......Rudolf had finally awakened.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、こうして自分の手で命を奪うという、生涯において、あるかないかという転機を経て、……留弗夫はようやく覚醒する。
Russian (RU): Но теперь, когда он своими руками убил человека и достиг поворотного момента, которого мало кто достигает...... Рудольф наконец пробудился.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Contudo, agora que ele matou alguém com as próprias mãos, ultrapassando uma linha que poucos cruzariam, ......Rudolf finalmente despertou.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過，經歷了像這樣以自己的手奪走人命的，一生中都不知能否撞上一次的人生轉折點，……留弗夫終於是覺醒了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不过，经历了像这样以自己的手夺走人命的，一生中都不知能否撞上一次的人生转折点，……留弗夫终于是觉醒了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tuttavia, ora che aveva ucciso qualcuno con le sue stesse mani, un punto di svolta che avevano raggiunto poche persone ... Rudolf si era finalmente risvegliato.

Steam (ST): ...No, he finally understood.
Umineko Project (UP): ...No, he finally understood.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): …いや、理解する。
Russian (RU): ...Нет, он наконец понял.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Não, ele finalmente entendeu.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …不，是明白了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... No, aveva finalmente capito.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Steam (ST): "...It's just like squeezing dough out of a bunch of morons. ...The same old game of musical chairs. If there's a pile of money in front of you, the first one to reach it wins. The slow ones just get kicked down to hell."
Umineko Project (UP): ".........It's exactly the same as screwing suckers out of their money. .........The same old game of musical chairs. When there's a pile of money up for grabs, there's no prize for taking your time. The slow ones just get kicked down to hell."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......It's no different from squeezing dough out of a group of morons. ......The same old game of musical chairs. If there's a pile of money in front of you, the first one to reach it wins. The slow ones just get kicked down to hell."
PC Japanese (JP): 「………馬鹿からカネを搾り取るのと、まったく同じことさ。………いつもの椅子取りゲームじゃねぇか。目の前にカネの山があったら、早い者勝ち。遅いヤツは蹴落とされて地獄行きってわけさ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………馬鹿からカネを搾り取るのと、まったく同じことさ。………いつもの椅子取りゲームじゃねぇか。目の前にカネの山があったら、早い者勝ち。遅いヤツは蹴落とされて地獄行きってわけさ」
Russian (RU): "......Всё равно что раскатывать тесто из группы болванов. ......Всё та же старая игра в музыкальные стулья. Если перед тобой груда денег, побеждает первый, кто её схватит. Медлительные просто падают в ад."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Era exatamente igual a extorquir dinheiro de imbecis. .........A mesma dança das cadeiras de sempre. Quando você se depara com uma montanha de dinheiro, o mais rápido leva tudo. Os lerdos são chutados para o inferno."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………這跟從笨蛋那榨取錢財，完全一樣啊。………這不就是，一如既往的搶椅子遊戲嘛。既然在眼前有金山，那就先下手為強。後下手者被一腳踢下地獄。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………这跟从笨蛋那榨取钱财，完全一样啊。………这不就是，一如既往的抢椅子游戏嘛。既然在眼前有金山，那就先下手为强。后下手者被一脚踢下地狱。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Non è diverso dallo strappare quattrini a un gruppo di idioti. ... Come il vecchio gioco delle sedie. Se c'è una pila di soldi davanti a te, il primo a raggiungerla vince. Quelli lenti vengono solo gettati a calci all'inferno."

Steam (ST): Haven't I driven dozens of poor fools into debt with my earlier swindles?
Umineko Project (UP): I've scammed dozens of unfortunate saps and buried them in debt.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=ST]
PC Japanese (JP): 俺のペテンで、がっつり負債漬けにされた気の毒なマヌケが何人もいたじゃねぇか。
Russian (RU): Благодаря моим предыдущим аферам десятки дураков влезали в долги.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Minhas fraudes já enganaram um monte de idiotas desafortunados e os enterrou em dívidas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我的詐騙，不也造就了好多欠了一屁股債的可怜的傻瓜嘛。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我的诈骗，不也造就了好多欠了一屁股债的可怜的傻瓜嘛。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non ho portato dozzine di poveri sciocchi al debito con le mie precedenti truffe?

Steam (ST): Several of those probably ended up bankrupt, and some of those might've hanged themselves. And I always laughed like it was none of my business.
Umineko Project (UP): Several of them probably ended up bankrupt, and some of those might've hanged themselves. And I always laughed, saying that wasn't my problem.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Several of those probably ended up bankrupt, and some of those might've hanged themselves. And I always laughed, saying that was none of my business.
PC Japanese (JP): そいつらの何人かは破産しただろうし、その中の何人かは、首を括ったかもしれねぇ。そして俺は、そんなこと知ったことじゃねぇと嘲笑ってた。
Russian (RU): Некоторые из них обанкротились, а некоторые могли и повеситься. А я всегда смеялся, говоря, что меня это не касается.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A maioria provavelmente faliu e alguns devem ter se enforcado. Tudo isso enquanto eu ficava rindo, dizendo que não era problema meu.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這之中是有好幾個破產了吧，這之中說不定還有好幾人上吊自殺了。而我則想著“不關我事”地嘲笑他們。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这之中是有好几个破产了吧，这之中说不定还有好几人上吊自杀了。而我则想着“不关我事”地嘲笑他们。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Diversi di loro probabilmente sono finiti in bancarotta, e alcuni potrebbero essersi impiccati. E io ho sempre riso, dicendo che non era un mio problema.

Steam (ST): And that's all there is to it.
Umineko Project (UP): That's all there is to it.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And that's all there is to it.
PC Japanese (JP): つまりはそういうことだ。
Russian (RU): Только и всего.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): É basicamente assim que funciona.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這也就代表著這麼一回事。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这也就代表着这么一回事。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In poche parole, le cose stanno così.

Steam (ST): The only difference now is that, for the first time, ...I've dealt the final blow with my own hands.
Umineko Project (UP): The only difference now is that, for the first time, .........I've dealt the final blow with my own hands.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The only difference now is that, for the first time, ......I've dealt the final blow with my own hands.
PC Japanese (JP): 俺は今ようやく、きっちり自分の手で最後まで初めて、………息の根を止めたってだけの話じゃねぇか。
Russian (RU): Сейчас разница лишь в том...... что я впервые нанёс решающий удар своими руками.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A única diferença é que dessa vez, pela primeira vez, .........eu lidei com o golpe final com as minhas próprias mãos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這不就只是，我在此刻終於第一次，………親手做到最後地，讓他斷了氣嘛。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这不就只是，我在此刻终于第一次，………亲手做到最后地，让他断了气嘛。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): L'unica differenza ora è che, per la prima volta... ho inflitto il colpo finale con le mie mani.

Steam (ST): Rudolf's evil laugh rang out.
Umineko Project (UP): Rudolf's evil laugh rang out.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 留弗夫の邪悪な笑いが響き渡る。
Russian (RU): Рудольф дьявольски засмеялся.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A maléfica risada de Rudolf ecoou.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 留弗夫邪惡的笑聲響徹四周。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 留弗夫邪恶的笑声响彻四周。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La malvagia risata di Rudolf risuonò.

Steam (ST): The laugh was so purely evil, it was almost soothing. Hypocritical evil that still contains some pangs of conscience is far more repulsive to behold.
Umineko Project (UP): The laugh was so purely evil, it was almost refreshing.{n}Evil that still has a conscience and thinks itself good is far more repulsive to behold.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The laugh was so purely evil it was almost reassuring. The fake evil that covers up pangs of conscience is far more repulsive to behold.
PC Japanese (JP): それは、胸がすくくらいに、邪悪な笑い。良心の呵責を残した、偽善な悪が一番、胸糞が悪い。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): それは、胸がすくくらいに、邪悪な笑い。{n}良心の呵責を残した、偽善な悪が一番、胸糞が悪い。
Russian (RU): Смех был таким чисто злым, что почти обнадёживал.{n}Ложное зло, скрывающее угрызения совести, куда более отталкивающее зрелище.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A risada — puramente nefasta — era quase refrescante.{n}Um mal ainda consciente, capaz de acreditar ser o bem, é ainda mais repulsivo de se testemunhar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這是，叫人直呼痛快的，邪惡的笑聲。{n}留著良心責備的偽善之惡，最叫人胸中不爽。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这是，叫人直呼痛快的，邪恶的笑声。{n}留着良心责备的伪善之恶，最叫人胸中不爽。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La risata era così genuinamente maligna da essere quasi rassicurante. {n}Il falso demone che sopprime i rimorsi della coscienza è molto più orribile a vedersi.

Steam (ST): If a man's committed to doing great evil anyway, how much more pleasant and gallant it is when he's wholly devoted to his goal.
Umineko Project (UP): If a man commits himself to an evil act, how much more pleasant and graceful it is when he is honest about his intentions.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If a man commits himself to an evil act, how much more pleasant and graceful it is when the man is wholly devoted to his goal.
PC Japanese (JP): 同じ悪事を極めるならば、それに素直な方がどれほど潔く、気持ちが良いものか。
Russian (RU): Если человек обязуется совершить злой поступок, гораздо приятнее и изящнее, когда он полностью предан своей цели.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se um homem comete ele próprio um ato nefasto, o quão mais agradável e gracioso deve ser quando ele é honesto com suas intenções.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 同樣是壞事做絕，還是這種對此毫不掩飾的，多麼爽快，多麼叫人心裡舒服啊。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 同样是坏事做绝，还是这种对此毫不掩饰的，多么爽快，多么叫人心里舒服啊。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Se un uomo commette da solo un atto malvagio, è molto più piacevole ed elegante quando l'uomo è totalmente devoto al suo obiettivo.

Steam (ST): In that sense, Rudolf's evil smile and laugh... were pleasant and gallant indeed...
Umineko Project (UP): In that sense, Rudolf's evil smile and laugh............truly were pleasant and graceful......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In that sense, Rudolf's evil smile and laugh truly were pleasant and graceful......
PC Japanese (JP): 留弗夫の邪悪な笑みと笑いは、その意味において、………あまりに潔く、気持ちが良いものだった……。
Russian (RU): В этом смысле дьявольская улыбка Рудольфа и смех и вправду были приятными и изящными......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Nesse sentido, o sorriso e a risada nefasta de Rudolf............eram verdadeiramente agradáveis e graciosos......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 留弗夫邪惡的笑容與笑聲，從這意義上講，………實在是痛快，叫人心情舒暢……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 留弗夫邪恶的笑容与笑声，从这意义上讲，………实在是痛快，叫人心情舒畅……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In quel senso, il malvagio sorriso e la risata di Rudolf erano veramente piacevoli ed eleganti...

Steam (ST): Which means...
Umineko Project (UP): ......And so.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……だから。
Russian (RU): ......И поэтому.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……所以。
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... E così.

Steam (ST): The brutal, bloody stage of the dining hall...must have been soothing as well.
Umineko Project (UP): Surely the brutal, bloody stage of the dining hall......was also refreshing.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Surely the brutal, bloody stage of the dining hall......was also reassuring.
PC Japanese (JP): 食堂における凄惨な血飛沫劇も、……胸がすくものだったに違いない。
Russian (RU): Жестокая, кровавая сцена в столовой...... тоже обнадёживала.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Certamente o brutal palco da sala de jantar......também era refrescante.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在餐廳發生的淒慘的血沫亂飛劇，……也一定叫人直呼痛快。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在餐厅发生的凄惨的血沫乱飞剧，……也一定叫人直呼痛快。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sicuramente il brutale, sanguinoso scenario della sala da pranzo... era anch'esso piacevole.

Steam (ST): A clang. A thud. A crack, a squish. ...A strange mixture of these sounds kept repeating over and over at the same tempo.
Umineko Project (UP): A clang. A thud. A crack, a squish. ......A strange mixture of these sounds kept repeating over and over at the same tempo.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): A clang. A thud. A crack, a squish. ......A strange mixture of these sounds kept repeating over and over at the same tempo.
PC Japanese (JP): 金属音。打撲音。破砕音、粉砕音。……そんなものを混ぜこぜにした音が、何度も何度も、同じテンポで繰り返される。
Russian (RU): Лязг. Стук. Треск, плеск. ......Странная смесь этих звуков повторялась снова и снова в одном и том же темпе.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Um som metálico. Um som de baque. Um som de estalo; um som de esguicho. ......Uma estranha mistura de sons continuaram a se repetirem sobrepostos no mesmo andamento.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 金屬聲。毆打聲。破碎聲、粉碎聲。……將這些混雜在一起的聲音，一次又一次、一次又一次，以同樣的節奏反覆響起。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 金属声。殴打声。破碎声、粉碎声。……将这些混杂在一起的声音，一次又一次、一次又一次，以同样的节奏反复响起。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Un suono metallico. Un colpo. Uno scricchiolio, un suono viscido. ... Una strana miscela di questi suoni continuava a ripetersi con lo stesso ritmo.

Steam (ST): ...Each time, a red splash landed on the tablecloth dangling nearby.
Umineko Project (UP): ......Each time, a red splash landed on the nearby dangling tablecloth.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……その度に、すぐ近くに垂れるテーブルクロスに、真っ赤な飛沫が飛び散った。
Russian (RU): ......И каждый раз на ближайший кусок скатерти падал красный всплеск.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......A cada tempo, um spray vermelho pingando próximo à toalha de mesa pendente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……每一聲都會伴隨著，鮮紅的飛沫飛濺到近在咫尺的垂下的桌布上。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……每一声都会伴随着，鲜红的飞沫飞溅到近在咫尺的垂下的桌布上。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ogni volta, uno schizzo rosso finiva sulla vicina tovaglia che pendeva.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Steam (ST): "Jessica-chan, ......can you hear me...?"
Umineko Project (UP): "Jessica‐chan, .........are you listening......?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Jessica-chan, .........are you listening......?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「朱志香ちゃん、………聞こえてる……？」
Russian (RU): "Джессика......... ты слушаешь?.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Jessica‐chan, .........está me ouvindo......?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「朱志香，………聽得到不……？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「朱志香，………听得到不……？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Jessica-chan... stai ascoltando...?"

Steam (ST): Kyrie asked this with the sort of smile any aunt might make to her niece. However, Jessica didn't answer.
Umineko Project (UP): Kyrie asked this with the sort of smile any aunt might make to her niece.{n}However, Jessica didn't answer.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Kyrie asked this with the sort of smile any aunt might make to her niece. However, Jessica didn't answer.
PC Japanese (JP): 霧江は、姪に話し掛ける叔母の微笑みで、そう問い掛ける。しかし、朱志香は応えない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 霧江は、姪に話し掛ける叔母の微笑みで、そう問い掛ける。{n}しかし、朱志香は応えない。
Russian (RU): Спросила Кирие с такой улыбкой, как могла улыбнуться любая тётя своей племяннице.{n}Но Джессика не ответила.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Kyrie perguntou com o mesmo sorriso no rosto que qualquer tia exibiria diante de sua sobrinha.{n}Entretanto, Jessica não respondeu.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 霧江以一副跟侄女說話的叔母的微笑，如此問道。{n}然而，朱志香卻毫無反應。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 雾江以一副跟侄女说话的叔母的微笑，如此问道。{n}然而，朱志香却毫无反应。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Kyrie chiese ciò con il tipo di sorriso che ogni zia farebbe a sua nipote. {n}Tuttavia, Jessica non rispose.

Steam (ST): There was nothing particularly surprising about this.
Umineko Project (UP): There was nothing particularly surprising about this.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): There was nothing particularly surprising about this.
PC Japanese (JP): 無理もない、当然だ。
Russian (RU): Ничего удивительного.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Não havia nada de surpreendente nisso.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這也難免，當然的事。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这也难免，当然的事。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non c'era nulla di sorprendentemente particolare.

Steam (ST): ...After all, by now, ...her nose had been broken, her eyes had been smashed, ...her teeth had been knocked out, and not only her nose, but her entire face was now hardly recognizable as a face, ...just a lump of bloody flesh...
Umineko Project (UP): ......After all, by now, ......her nose was broken, her eyes had been smashed, ......her teeth had been knocked out, ......and not only her nose, but her entire face was now hardly recognizable as a face, ......just a lump of bloody flesh......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......After all, by now, ......her nose was broken, her eyes had been smashed, ......her teeth had been knocked out, and not only her nose, but her entire face was now hardly recognizable as a face, ......just a lump of bloody flesh......
PC Japanese (JP): ……だって朱志香の顔面はもう、……鼻は折れ、眼は潰れ、……歯も飛び、……可愛らしかった鼻筋は愚か、顔面であったと認めることさえ難しいくらいの、……血塗れの肉塊に、変わり果てていた……。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ……だって朱志香の顔面はもう、……鼻は折れ、眼は潰れ、……歯も飛び、……可愛らしかった鼻筋はおろか、顔面であったと認めることさえ難しいくらいの、……血塗れの肉塊に、変わり果てていた……。
Russian (RU): ......Как‐никак...... к настоящему моменту у неё был сломан нос, раздавлены глаза...... выбиты зубы, и не только нос, но и всё её лицо было едва узнаваемо, ...лишь кусок окровавленной плоти......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Afinal, agora, ......seu nariz estava quebrado, seus olhos esmagados, ......seus dentes arrancados, ......e não apenas seu nariz, todo seu rosto já era praticamente irreconhecível como rosto, ......um simples nódulo de carne e sangue......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……畢竟，朱志香的臉已經，……鼻子都折了，眼睛都碎了，……牙都被揍飛了，……豈止是可愛的鼻梁，就連這是一張臉都叫人難以辨認出來地，……化為了，一坨到處是血的肉塊……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……毕竟，朱志香的脸已经，……鼻子都折了，眼睛都碎了，……牙都被揍飞了，……岂止是可爱的鼻梁，就连这是一张脸都叫人难以辨认出来地，……化为了，一坨到处是血的肉块……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Del resto, ormai... il suo naso era spaccato, i suoi occhi erano stati fracassati,{n}i suoi denti erano stati rotti, e non solo il suo naso, ma il suo intero volto era difficilmente riconoscibile come tale... solo un pezzo di carne sanguinante...

Steam (ST): Kyrie finally stopped her task of repeatedly smashing Jessica's face with the stock of her gun.
Umineko Project (UP): Kyrie finally stopped her task of repeatedly smashing Jessica's face with the stock of her gun.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Kyrie finally stopped her task of repeatedly smashing Jessica's face with the stock of her gun.
PC Japanese (JP): 霧江はようやく、銃床で朱志香の顔面を殴り続ける仕事を止める。
Russian (RU): Кирие наконец‐то прекратила свою задачу по неоднократному избиению лица Джессики прикладом ружья.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Kyrie finalmente cessou sua tarefa de esmagar repetitivamente o rosto de Jessica com a coronha de sua arma.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 霧江終於是停止了，用槍托砸朱志香的臉的工作。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 雾江终于是停止了，用枪托砸朱志香的脸的工作。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Kyrie finalmente smise il suo compito di spaccare ripetutamente la faccia di Jessica con il calcio del suo fucile.

Steam (ST): Still sitting on top of Jessica, she tossed her gun to the side, ...pulled a compact out of her pocket, and looked at her own face in the mirror.
Umineko Project (UP): Still sitting on top of Jessica, Kyrie tossed her gun to the side, ......pulled a compact out of her pocket, and looked at her own face in the mirror.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Still sitting on top of Jessica, Kyrie tossed her gun to the side, ......pulled a compact out of her pocket, and looked at her own face in the mirror.
PC Japanese (JP): そして朱志香に馬乗りになったまま、銃を傍らに投げ出し、……懐よりコンパクトを取り出して、自分の顔を見る。
Russian (RU): По‐прежнему сидя на ней, Кирие бросила ружьё в сторону...... вытащила из кармана зеркальце и посмотрела на своё лицо.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ainda montada sobre Jessica, Kyrie jogou sua arma longe, ......puxou um estojo de maquiagem redondo de seu bolso e olhou sua face refletida no espelho.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 接著，她繼續騎在朱志香身上，把槍扔向一邊，……從懷中掏出金塊，照了照自己的臉。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 接着，她继续骑在朱志香身上，把枪扔向一边，……从怀中掏出金块，照了照自己的脸。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ancora sedendosi sopra Jessica, Kyrie gettò via il suo fucile... prese un portacipria dalla sua tasca, e guardò il suo viso allo specchio.

Steam (ST): Then, finally, ...she realized that her face was covered by speckles of fresh blood.
Umineko Project (UP): Then, finally, ......she realized that her face was covered by speckles of fresh blood.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Then, finally, ......she realized that her face was covered by speckles of fresh blood.
PC Japanese (JP): そしてようやく、……自分の顔をまだら模様に染める鮮血の飛沫に気付く。
Russian (RU): Наконец...... она поняла, что всё оно в крапинках свежей крови.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Então, finalmente, ......ela percebeu que seu rosto estava coberto por salpicos de sangue.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 接著她總算是發現，……自己臉上斑斑點點的血跡了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 接着她总算是发现，……自己脸上斑斑点点的血迹了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Allora, finalmente... capì che il suo viso era coperto da macchie di sangue fresco.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Steam (ST): "How terrible. These clothes will have to go too. ...*cackle*cackle*, *cackle*cackle*cackle*cackle*!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "How terrible. These clothes will have to go too. ......*cackle*cackle*, *cackle*cackle*cackle*cackle*!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「酷い有様だわ。服も台無しじゃない。……くくくくくく、くっくっくくくくくくくく！！」
Russian (RU): "Ужасно. И с одеждой то же самое. ......*хи‐хи*хи‐хи*, *хи‐хи*хи‐хи*хи‐хи*хи‐хи*!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Que horror. Estas roupas também já eram. ......*gargalhada*gargalhada*, *gargalhada*gargalhada*gargalhada*gargalhada*!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「好難看呢。衣服也被糟蹋了。……呵呵呵呵呵呵，呵、呵、呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「好难看呢。衣服也被糟蹋了。……呵呵呵呵呵呵，呵、呵、呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Che cosa orribile. Anche questi vestiti dovranno sparire. ... *cackle*cackle*, *cackle*cackle*cackle*cackle*!!"

Steam (ST): With a muffled laugh, Kyrie shakily rose to her feet.
Umineko Project (UP): With a muffled laugh, Kyrie shakily rose to her feet.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): くぐもった笑いを堪えながら、霧江はゆらりと立ち上がる。
Russian (RU): Пошатываясь, Кирие с приглушённым смехом поднялась на ноги.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Com uma risada abafada, com um movimento relaxado, Kyrie se levantou.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 強忍住憋在嘴裡的笑聲，霧江輕輕站起身來。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 强忍住憋在嘴里的笑声，雾江轻轻站起身来。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Con una risata soffocata, Kyrie si alzò in piedi tremante.

Steam (ST): Jessica wasn't moving anymore. ...She had been convulsing a bit until a second ago, but now, she was as still as stone.
Umineko Project (UP): Jessica wasn't moving anymore. ......She had been convulsing a bit until a second ago, but now, she was as still as stone.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Jessica wasn't moving anymore. ......She had been convulsing a bit until a second ago, but now, she was as still as stone.
PC Japanese (JP): もう朱志香は動かない。……さっきまでは、多少は痙攣もしていたが、もう、ぴくりとも動かない。
Russian (RU): Джессика больше не двигалась. ......Она чуть билась в конвульсиях минуту назад, но теперь была неподвижна как камень.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Jessica não estava mais se movendo. ......Ela estava convulsionando até um segundo atrás, mas agora estava rígida como uma pedra.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 朱志香已經不會動了。……雖然直到剛才為止，還多多少少有點痙攣，但現在，已經一動不動了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 朱志香已经不会动了。……虽然直到刚才为止，还多多少少有点痉挛，但现在，已经一动不动了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Jessica non si stava più muovendo. ... Si stava contorcendo un po' fino a un secondo fa, ma in quel momento era immobile come una pietra.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Steam (ST): "...Smashing a woman's face is nothing new to your aunt, okay? Sorry about that. ...If you hadn't resisted, I could've given you a much cleaner death."
Umineko Project (UP): "......When it comes to punching women in the face, your aunt is an old pro. Sorry about that. .........If you hadn't resisted, I could've let you have a much cleaner death."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......Smashing a woman's face is something your aunt is used to. Sorry about that. ......If you hadn't resisted, I could've let you have a much cleaner death."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……女の顔を殴ることに関しちゃ。叔母さん、慣れてるのよ。ごめんね。………抵抗しないでくれたら、綺麗な死に顔にしてあげられたのにね。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……女の顔を殴ることに関しちゃ。叔母さん、慣れてるのよ。ごめんね。………抵抗しないでくれたら、綺麗な死に顔にしてあげられたのにね」
Russian (RU): "......Твоя тётя привыкла разбивать женщинам лица. Извини уж. ......Если бы ты не сопротивлялась, я могла бы устроить тебе более чистую смерть."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Quando se trata de socar outras mulheres, a sua tia é especialista. Eu sinto muito. .........Se não tivesse tentado resistir, eu poderia ter concedido uma morte muito mais limpa."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……在揍女人臉一事上。阿姨可是熟門熟路哦。不好意思呢。………你要是沒反抗，阿姨就會給你留張漂亮的遺容了。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……在揍女人脸一事上。阿姨可是熟门熟路哦。不好意思呢。………你要是没反抗，阿姨就会给你留张漂亮的遗容了。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Distruggere la faccia di una donna è qualcosa che tua zia è abituata a fare. {n}Mi dispiace. ... Se non avessi resistito, ti avrei potuto lasciar avere una morte più pulita."

Steam (ST): Kyrie pulled the tablecloth off and used it like a towel to wipe the blood from all over her body.
Umineko Project (UP): Kyrie pulled the tablecloth off and used it like a towel to wipe the blood from all over her body.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 霧江は、テーブルクロスを引っ張ってたわませると、それをタオル代わりに、全身の血を拭う。
Russian (RU): Кирие стянула скатерть и использовала её как полотенце, чтобы вытереть кровь по всему телу.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Kyrie puxou a toalha de mesa e a usou como toalha para secar o sangue pelo seu corpo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 霧江用手一把扯過桌布，抓起，取代毛巾，擦了下全身的血。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 雾江用手一把扯过桌布，抓起，取代毛巾，擦了下全身的血。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Kyrie tirò via la tovaglia e la usò come un asciugamano per togliere il sangue da tutto il suo corpo.

Steam (ST): However, instead of taking the blood off, it just smeared it around... and did nothing to remove the stench of blood and death that covered her.
Umineko Project (UP): However, instead of taking the blood off, it just smeared it around, ......and did nothing to remove the stench of blood and death that covered her.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, instead of taking the blood off, it just smeared it around, ......and did nothing to remove the stench of blood and death that covered her.
PC Japanese (JP): もっとも、血を拭き取るというよりは、塗り伸ばしているようなもので、……彼女を覆う、血生臭さと死の臭いは、まったく拭えずにいた。
Russian (RU): Но вместо того, чтобы стереть кровь, она только размазала её......и ничуть не избавилась от запаха крови и смерти, исходящего от неё.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Entretanto, ao invés de limpar o sangue, só espalhou ainda mais, ......e não serviu para remover o odor de sangue e morte que a cobria.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過說到底，這與其說是擦掉血跡，不如說是把血跡給抹得更長了，……完全沒有擦掉，籠罩她全身的血腥味與死的味道。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不过说到底，这与其说是擦掉血迹，不如说是把血迹给抹得更长了，……完全没有擦掉，笼罩她全身的血腥味与死的味道。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tuttavia, invece di togliere il sangue, lo sparse per tutto il vestito... e non fece nulla per rimuovere la puzza di sangue e di morte che la ricopriva.

Steam (ST): When she got tired of rubbing the tablecloth against the blood, Kyrie walked over to the extension line telephone in the corner of the room.
Umineko Project (UP): When she got tired of smearing blood over the tablecloth, Kyrie walked over to the extension telephone in the corner of the room.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When she got tired of rubbing the tablecloth against the blood, Kyrie walked over to the extension line telephone in the corner of the room.
PC Japanese (JP): テーブルクロスに血を擦り付けることに飽きると、霧江は部屋の隅にある内線電話に歩み寄る。
Russian (RU): Устав тереть кровь скатертью, Кирие подошла к добавочной телефонной линии, проведённой в углу комнаты.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando cansou de besuntar sangue pela toalha, Kyrie caminhou até a extensão do telefone que ficava no canto da sala.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在她膩了用桌布擦血跡後，霧江向擺在房間角落的內線電話走了過去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在她腻了用桌布擦血迹后，雾江向摆在房间角落的内线电话走了过去。

Steam (ST): Then, she dialed the number for the cousin room in the guesthouse...
Umineko Project (UP): Then, she dialed the number for the cousins' room in the guesthouse......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Then, she dialed the number for the cousins' room in the guesthouse......
PC Japanese (JP): そしてゲストハウスのいとこ部屋への内線をダイヤルする……。
Russian (RU): Она набрала номер комнаты кузенов в домике для гостей......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Então, ela discou o número do quarto dos primos, que ficava na casa de hóspedes......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 接著，她撥了賓館堂兄妹房間的內線號碼……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 接着，她拨了宾馆堂兄妹房间的内线号码……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Allora, digitò il numero per la stanza dei cugini nella casa degli ospiti...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Steam (ST): "......Hello. It's me. ...It's your turn now, Battler-kun. Go to the spot in front of the chapel, please. ......Yes, that's right. I haven't been given any instructions for Maria-chan. Have her wait there. ......*giggle* Yes, keep your wits about you. ...I'm rooting for you to be chosen as the Successor, Battler-kun."
Umineko Project (UP): ".........Hello. It's me. .........It's your turn now, Battler‐kun. ......You're next to go to the front of the chapel. ............Yes, that's right. I haven't been given any instructions about Maria‐chan. Have her wait there..........*giggle*. Yes, take it seriously. ......I'm rooting for you to be chosen as the successor."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ".........Hello. It's me. ......It's Battler-kun's turn now. He's supposed to go to the chapel. .........Yes, that's right. I haven't been given any instructions about Maria-chan. Have her wait there. .........*giggle*. Yes, keep your wits about you. I'm rooting for you to be chosen as the successor, Battler-kun."
PC Japanese (JP): 「………もしもし。私よ。………今度は戦人くんの番よ。……今度は戦人くんが礼拝堂前に行ってちょうだい。…………えぇ、そう。真里亞ちゃんの指示は受けてないわ。そこで待っててもらって。………くす。えぇ、しっかりね。……戦人くんが次期当主に選ばれるよう、応援してるわ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………もしもし。私よ。………今度は戦人くんの番よ。……今度は戦人くんが礼拝堂前に行ってちょうだい。…………えぇ、そう。真里亞ちゃんの指示は受けてないわ。そこで待っててもらって。………くす。えぇ、しっかりね。……戦人くんが次期当主に選ばれるよう、応援してるわ」
Russian (RU): ".........Алло. Это я. ......Теперь очередь Баттлера. Он должен пойти к часовне. .........Да, верно. Мне не дали никаких указаний по поводу Марии. Пусть ждёт. .........*хи‐хи*. Да, не растеряй своё остроумие. Буду болеть за то, чтобы преемником выбрали тебя, Баттлер."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Alô. Sou eu. .........É a sua vez, Battler‐kun. ......Você é o próximo a ir até a frente da capela. ............Sim, isso mesmo. Eu ainda não recebi nenhuma instrução sobre a Maria‐chan. Diga para ela esperar aí..........*risos*. Sim, leve a sério. ......Estou torcendo para que seja escolhido como sucessor."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………喂喂。是我喲。………輪到戰人君了。……戰人君請去禮拜堂前。…………嗯，對。還沒得到關於小真里亞的指示。讓她在那等著吧。………呵。嗯，好好幹。……願戰人君能被選為下任當主，我會替你加油的。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………喂喂。是我哟。………轮到战人君了。……战人君请去礼拜堂前。…………嗯，对。还没得到关于小真里亚的指示。让她在那等着吧。………呵。嗯，好好干。……愿战人君能被选为下任当主，我会替你加油的。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Pronto. Sono io. ... Ora è il turno di Battler-kun. Dovrebbe andare alla cappella. ... Sì, è così. Non mi è stata data alcuna indicazione riguardo Maria-chan. Lascia che aspetti lì. ... *giggle*. Sì, tieni gli occhi aperti. Faccio il tifo per te per essere scelto come il successore, Battler-kun."

Steam (ST): With the same smile as usual and the partly-wiped splashes of blood still covering her face, ...Kyrie finished her call to Battler.
Umineko Project (UP): With the same smile as usual and the partly‐wiped splashes of blood still covering her face, ......Kyrie finished her call to Battler.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): With the same smile as usual and the partly-wiped splashes of blood still covering her face, ......Kyrie finished her call to Battler.
PC Japanese (JP): 霧江は、拭き残した血飛沫が残ったままの顔を、いつものように微笑ませ、……戦人にそう電話する。
Russian (RU): С привычной улыбкой и частично стёртыми брызгами крови на лице...... Кирие закончила звонить Баттлеру.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Com o mesmo sorriso de sempre e parcialmente limpa dos respingos de sangue que cobriam seu rosto, ......Kyrie encerrou seu telefone com Battler.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 霧江以那張還留著擦剩下的血斑的臉，露出跟往常一樣的微笑，……跟戰人像這樣地通了電話。

Umineko Project (UP): When she set down the receiver, there was a small knock, and Rudolf came back into the room.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When she set down the receiver, there was a small knock, and Rudolf came back into the room.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Steam (ST): "Jessica-chan has better reflexes than I gave her credit for. I didn't think she'd be able to fight back from a situation like that."
Umineko Project (UP): "Jessica‐chan has better reflexes than I gave her credit for. I didn't expect her to knock the gun away when she did."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Jessica-chan has better reflexes than I gave her credit for. I didn't think she'd be able to fight back from a position like that."
PC Japanese (JP): 「朱志香ちゃん、思ったより反応のいい子でね。まさかあそこで、払い除けられるとは思わなかったわ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「朱志香ちゃん、思ったより反応のいい子でね。まさかあそこで、払い除けられるとは思わなかったわ」
Russian (RU): "Рефлексы Джессики оказались лучше, чем я ожидала. Не думала, что она сможет дать отпор с такой позиции."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "A Jessica‐chan tinha reflexos melhor do que imaginei. Eu não esperava que ela acertasse a arma da maneira como fez."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「朱志香是個比我想的要更加反應敏捷的孩子呢。真沒想到，居然會在那個節骨眼上被她推開。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「朱志香是个比我想的要更加反应敏捷的孩子呢。真没想到，居然会在那个节骨眼上被她推开。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Jessica-chan ha riflessi migliori di quanto pensassi. Non pensavo fosse in grado di contrattaccare da una posizione del genere."

Steam (ST): Yes, the man she loved was the sort who could do it if he tried, without letting cheap emotions get in the way...
Umineko Project (UP): Yes, the man she loved was the sort who could do whatever he put his mind to, without letting cheap emotions get in the way...

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Sim, o homem que ela amava era aquele que pudesse fazer qualquer coisa que colocasse na cabeça, sem deixar que emoções baratas ficassem em seu caminho...

Umineko Project (UP): "I love you, Rudolf‐san. I wouldn't have it any other way."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "I love you, Rudolf-san. I wouldn't have it any other way."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「愛してるわ、留弗夫さん。そうでなくっちゃ」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Steam (ST): "It's hard to imagine an easier job to net you a billion yen. ...It's like Dad always said. In the life of every man, there comes one day when he has to be willing to kill."
Umineko Project (UP): "It's hard to imagine an easier job to net you a billion yen. ......It's like Dad always said. In the life of every man, there comes one day where he has to be willing to kill."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「これで日当が１０億出るなら、ちょろい仕事じゃねぇか。……親父がよく言ってたぜ。男は人生で一度、人を殺す覚悟を以って望む日が訪れるってな。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「これで日当が１０億出るなら、ちょろい仕事じゃねぇか。……親父がよく言ってたぜ。男は人生で一度、人を殺す覚悟を以って臨む日が訪れるってな」
Russian (RU): "Трудно представить более лёгкую работу, за которую получаешь миллиард иен. ......Как всегда говорил отец, в жизни каждого мужчины наступает день, когда он должен быть готов убить."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Não tem trabalho mais fácil que recompense com um bilhão de iene. ......É como o pai vivia dizendo. Na vida de todo homem, sempre chega o dia em que ele precisa estar disposto a matar."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「這樣就能日薪 10 億的話，這不就只是份輕鬆無比的工作嘛。……爸以前常說。男人人生中，總會迎來一次，想以敢殺人的決心來面對的一天的。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「这样就能日薪 10 亿的话，这不就只是份轻松无比的工作嘛。……爸以前常说。男人人生中，总会迎来一次，想以敢杀人的决心来面对的一天的。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "È difficile immaginare un lavoro più facile per guadagnarti un miliardo di yen. È come ha sempre detto Papà. Nella vita di ogni uomo, arriva un giorno dove deve voler uccidere."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Steam (ST): "In other words, always be determined to survive, even if you have to kill to do it. ...That's my favorite line of his."
Umineko Project (UP): "In other words, always be willing to kill if your own survival depends on it. ......That's my favorite of the things he used to say."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "In other words, always be willing to kill if your own survival depends on it. ......That's my favorite line of his."
PC Japanese (JP): 「常に、相手を殺してでも生き残る覚悟を持て、よね。……お父様の言葉の中で、一番好きな言葉よ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「常に、相手を殺してでも生き残る覚悟を持て、よね。……お父様の言葉の中で、一番好きな言葉よ」
Russian (RU): "Иначе говоря, всегда будь готов убить, если от этого зависит твоё выживание. ......Моя любимая его фраза."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Em outras palavras, sempre estar disposto a matar quando a sua sobrevivência depende disso. ......De tudo que ele dizia, essa era a minha frase favorita."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「這也就是說，每時每刻都要有，即便把對方殺了也要活下去的覺悟呢。……這是爸所說的話當中，我最喜歡的一句喲。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「这也就是说，每时每刻都要有，即便把对方杀了也要活下去的觉悟呢。……这是爸所说的话当中，我最喜欢的一句哟。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "In altre parole, voler sempre uccidere se la tua stessa sopravvivenza dipende da ciò. ... Questa è la mia frase preferita di lui."

Umineko Project (UP): "What's next? My rifle is hungry for blood."

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 叫自己去的地方，跟讓治一樣，是在禮拜堂前。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 叫自己去的地方，跟让治一样，是在礼拜堂前。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Era stato convocato all'area di fronte la cappella, proprio come George.

Steam (ST): Not even 30 minutes had passed since the time George and Jessica had been called out. ...Apparently, this test didn't last too long.
Umineko Project (UP): Not even half an hour had passed since the time George and Jessica had been called out. ......Apparently, this test didn't last too long.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Not even 30 minutes had passed since the time George and Jessica had been called out.......Apparently, this test didn't last too long.
PC Japanese (JP): 譲治たちが呼び出されてから、３０分と経っていない。……テストとやらは、短い時間で終わるようだった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 譲治たちが呼び出されてから、３０分と経っていない。{n}……テストとやらは、短い時間で終わるようだった。
Russian (RU): С тех пор, как вызвали Джорджа и Джессику, не прошло и 30 минут.{n}......Видимо, испытание продлилось недолго.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Nem meia hora havia se passado desde que George e Jessica haviam sido convocados. ......Pelo que parece, o teste deles não demorou muito.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 自讓治他們被叫走，還不到 30 分鐘。{n}……叫考試的玩意，似乎是能短時間內就完事的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 自让治他们被叫走，还不到 30 分钟。{n}……叫考试的玩意，似乎是能短时间内就完事的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Neanche 30 minuti erano passati dal momento in cui George e Jessica erano stati convocati. ... Apparentemente, questo test non durava troppo.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Steam (ST): "...Damn geezer. First you never come out, not even for lunch, and then you show up in the middle of the night with a test. ...I'll bet living as a shut-in's got his sense of day and night all backwards."
Umineko Project (UP): "......Damn geezer. You didn't even show up for lunch, and now you show up in the middle of a night with a test. ......I'll bet living as a shut‐in's got his sense of day and night all backwards."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......Damn geezer. First you never come out, not even for lunch, and then you show up in the middle of a night with a test. ......I'll bet living as a shut-in's got his sense of day and night all backwards."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……クソジジイめ。昼飯にさえ姿を出さなかったくせに、こんな時間にのこのこ現れてテストだとは畏れ入るぜ。……引き篭もり生活で、昼夜が逆転してやがるに違いねぇ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……クソジジイめ。昼飯にさえ姿を出さなかったくせに、こんな時間にのこのこ現れてテストだとは畏れ入るぜ。……引き篭もり生活で、昼夜が逆転してやがるに違いねぇ」
Russian (RU): "......Чёртов хрыч. Сначала ты даже на обед не выходишь, а теперь появляешься среди ночи с испытанием. ......У живущих взаперти явно нарушено восприятие дня и ночи."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Velho desgraçado. Sequer apareceu para o almoço e agora resolve dar as caras no meio da noite, ainda por cima querendo aplicar um teste. ......Aposto que viver trancado no quarto inverteu seus sentidos de dia e noite."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……混賬老頭。明明連吃個午飯都不肯露面，到了這種時間卻恬不知恥地冒出來要給人考試，您可真叫人佩服。……肯定是因足不出戶的生活，而晝夜顛倒了。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……混账老头。明明连吃个午饭都不肯露面，到了这种时间却恬不知耻地冒出来要给人考试，您可真叫人佩服。……肯定是因足不出户的生活，而昼夜颠倒了。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Dannato vecchio. Prima non esci mai, neanche per pranzo, e dopo ti fai vedere nel bel mezzo della notte con un test. ... Scommetto che vivere come un rinchiuso ha invertito totalmente il suo senso di giorno e notte."

Steam (ST): Complaining all the way, Battler strolled off into the rain.
Umineko Project (UP): Complaining all the way, Battler strolled off into the rain.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 戦人は悪態をつきながら、風雨の中をのんびりと歩いていく。
Russian (RU): Жалуясь как только можно, Баттлер ушёл под дождь.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Reclamando durante todo trajeto, Battler trotou debaixo da chuva.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 戰人罵罵咧咧，慢悠悠地走進了風雨之中。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 战人骂骂咧咧，慢悠悠地走进了风雨之中。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Lamentandosi tutto il tempo, Battler passeggiò in mezzo alla pioggia.

Steam (ST): Almost immediately, he was swallowed up by the darkness of the rose garden and passed out of sight...
Umineko Project (UP): Almost immediately, he was swallowed up by the darkness of the rose garden and passed out of sight......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Almost immediately, he was swallowed up by the darkness of the rose garden and passed out of sight......
PC Japanese (JP): すぐにその姿は、薔薇庭園の闇に飲み込まれて見えなくなった……。
Russian (RU): Тьма розария почти сразу же поглотила его и скрыла из виду......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quase que imediatamente, ele foi consumido pela escuridão do jardim de rosas e sumiu de vista......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 他的身影，馬上就被玫瑰庭園的黑暗所吞噬，變得看不見了……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 他的身影，马上就被玫瑰庭园的黑暗所吞噬，变得看不见了……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quasi immediatamente, venne inghiottito dall'oscurità del roseto e andò fuori dal campo visivo...

Steam (ST): ......And then...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ………そして。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... E allora...

Steam (ST): Kyrie could be seen coming out from the darkness of the rose garden.
Umineko Project (UP): Kyrie could be seen coming out from the darkness of the rose garden.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Kyrie could be seen coming out from the darkness of the rose garden.
PC Japanese (JP): 薔薇庭園の闇から、……今度は霧江が姿を現す。
Russian (RU): Из темноты розария показалась Кирие.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Kyrie pôde ser vista surgindo da escuridão do mesmo jardim.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 從玫瑰庭園的黑暗中，……出現了霧江的身影。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 从玫瑰庭园的黑暗中，……出现了雾江的身影。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Kyrie poteva essere vista mentre usciva fuori dall'oscurità del roseto.

Steam (ST): Her right hand held a gun. Her left an umbrella.
Umineko Project (UP): Her right hand held a gun. Her left an umbrella.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Her right hand held a gun. Her left an umbrella.
PC Japanese (JP): 右手には銃。左手には傘。
Russian (RU): В её правой руке было ружьё. В левой — зонтик.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Em sua mão direita estava uma arma. Na esquerda um guarda‐chuva.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 右手槍。左手傘。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 右手枪。左手伞。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La sua mano destra teneva un fucile. La sinistra un ombrello.

Steam (ST): Her inner pocket contained the master key ring she had stolen from Gohda.
Umineko Project (UP): Her inner pocket contained the master key ring she had stolen from Gohda.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Her inner pocket contained the master key ring she had stolen from Gohda.
PC Japanese (JP): 内ポケットには郷田より奪ったマスターキーの束。
Russian (RU): Во внутреннем кармане лежало кольцо с универсальным ключом, которое она забрала у Годы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): No seu bolso interno estava o molho com a chave mestra, que ela havia roubado de Gohda.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 內口袋裡是，從鄉田身上搶來的總鑰匙串。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 内口袋里是，从乡田身上抢来的总钥匙串。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La sua tasca interna conteneva il passepartout che aveva rubato a Gohda.

Steam (ST): Her right pocket had a handful of bullets. Her left held a knife she had taken from the kitchen.
Umineko Project (UP): Her right pocket had a handful of bullets. Her left held a knife she had taken from the kitchen.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Her right pocket had a handful of bullets. Her left held a knife she had taken from the kitchen.
PC Japanese (JP): 右のポケットには一握りの銃弾。左のポケットには、厨房で調達したナイフ。
Russian (RU): В правом кармане — несколько пуль. В левом — нож, который она взяла из кухни.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Seu bolso direito estava recheado com um punhado de munição. O esquerdo guardava uma faca que ela tinha pego na cozinha.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 右口袋裡是，一把子彈。左口袋裡是，從廚房拿來的匕首。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 右口袋里是，一把子弹。左口袋里是，从厨房拿来的匕首。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La sua tasca destra conteneva una manciata di proiettili. La sinistra un coltello che aveva preso dalla cucina.

Steam (ST): She was a carefully and perfectly outfitted murderer.
Umineko Project (UP): She was a carefully and perfectly outfitted murderer.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She was a carefully and perfectly outfitted murderer.
PC Japanese (JP): 殺人者の準備は、周到かつ完璧だった。
Russian (RU): Она была осторожной и прекрасно снабжённой убийцей.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela estava cuidadosamente e perfeitamente trajada para um assassinato.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 殺人者的準備，周到且完美。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 杀人者的准备，周到且完美。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Era un'assassina attentamente e perfettamente equipaggiata.

Steam (ST): Another bolt of lightning struck down from the swirling skies. It lit up only half of Kyrie's face.
Umineko Project (UP): Another bolt of lightning struck down from the swirling skies. It lit up only half of Kyrie's face.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Another bolt of lightning struck down from the swirling skies. It lit up only half of Kyrie's face.
PC Japanese (JP): 荒れ狂う空に再び落雷。雷光が霧江の顔を半分だけ照らし出す。
Russian (RU): С бушующих небес ударила ещё одна вспышка молнии. Она осветила лицо Кирие только наполовину.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Outro raio descendeu do turbilhão de nuvens no céu. Ele iluminou parcialmente o rosto de Kyrie.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 狂嘯翻騰的天空，再次劈下一道落雷。雷光照亮了霧江的半張臉。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 狂啸翻腾的天空，再次劈下一道落雷。雷光照亮了雾江的半张脸。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Un altro fulmine cadde dai cieli vorticosi. Illuminò solo metà del volto di Kyrie.

Steam (ST): Her cheek...was still covered with Jessica's blood...
Umineko Project (UP): Her cheek......was still covered with Jessica's blood......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Her cheek......was still covered with Jessica's blood......
PC Japanese (JP): その頬にはまだ、……朱志香の返り血が残っていた……。
Russian (RU): Её щека...... до сих пор была в крови Джессики......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Sua bochecha......ainda estava manchada pelo sangue de Jessica......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在她的臉頰上，……依然留著方才被濺到的朱志香的血……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在她的脸颊上，……依然留着方才被溅到的朱志香的血……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La sua guancia... era ancora coperta con il sangue di Jessica...

Steam (ST): Under the eaves, Kyrie folded up her umbrella, smiled, and spoke to no one.
Umineko Project (UP): Under the eaves, Kyrie folded up her umbrella, smiled, and spoke to no one.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Under the eaves, Kyrie folded up her umbrella, smiled, and spoke to no one.
PC Japanese (JP): 霧江はひさしの下で傘を畳ながら、誰にともなく、微笑みながら言った。
Russian (RU): Под карнизом Кирие сложила зонтик, улыбнулась и сказала в никуда.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Debaixo do beiral, Kyrie fechou seu guarda‐chuva, sorriu e falou para ninguém.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 霧江在房檐下邊收起傘，邊微笑著不是要講給誰聽地開口說道。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 雾江在房檐下边收起伞，边微笑着不是要讲给谁听地开口说道。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sotto il cornicione, Kyrie chiuse il suo ombrello, sorrise, e parlò al vuoto.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Steam (ST): "Hey everyone, I'm home."
Umineko Project (UP): "How's it going, everyone?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「ただいま、みんな。」
Russian (RU): "Вот я и вернулась."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Estou de volta, pessoal."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「我回來了哦，諸位。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「我回来了哦，诸位。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Come va, gente?"

Steam (ST): Rudolf could be seen under the eaves of the chapel. He had hidden his gun in the nearby shadows and was now smoking a cigarette...
Umineko Project (UP): Rudolf could be seen under the eaves of the chapel.{n}He had hidden his gun in the nearby shadows and was now smoking a cigarette...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Rudolf could be seen under the eaves of the chapel. He had hidden his gun in the nearby shadows and was now smoking a cigarette...
PC Japanese (JP): 留弗夫の姿は礼拝堂前のひさしの下にあった。銃をひさしの下の物陰に隠し、煙草の煙をくゆらせている…。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 留弗夫の姿は礼拝堂前のひさしの下にあった。{n}銃をひさしの下の物陰に隠し、煙草の煙をくゆらせている…。
Russian (RU): Рудольф был под карнизом часовни.{n}Он спрятал ружьё в ближайшей тени и курил сигарету...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Rudolf podia ser visto debaixo do beiral da capela.{n}Ele havia escondido sua arma próxima às sombras e agora estava fumando um cigarro...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 留弗夫的身影，是在禮拜堂前的屋檐之下。{n}他把槍藏到了屋檐下的暗處，抽著煙吞雲吐霧…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 留弗夫的身影，是在礼拜堂前的屋檐之下。{n}他把枪藏到了屋檐下的暗处，抽着烟吞云吐雾…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Si poteva vedere Rudolf sotto il cornicione della cappella. Aveva nascosto il suo fucile nelle ombre vicine e ora stava fumando una sigaretta...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Steam (ST): "...Should be easy to trick that dimwit. ...And if it doesn't work, that's just too bad."
Umineko Project (UP): ".........Should be easy to trick that dimwit. ......And if it doesn't work, that's just too bad."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......Should be easy to trick that dimwit. ......And if it doesn't work, that's just too bad."
PC Japanese (JP): 「………あの単細胞を騙すなんて、簡単なもんさ。……うまく行かなきゃ、それだけの話だぜ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………あの単細胞を騙すなんて、簡単なもんさ。……うまく行かなきゃ、それだけの話だぜ」
Russian (RU): "......Этого болвана должно быть легко обмануть. ......Жаль, если нет."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Deve ser fácil enganar aquele paspalho. ......E se não der certo, não tem conversa."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………要騙那個單細胞，只不過是小菜一碟。……哪怕不順利，也就只用這麼辦就行了。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………要骗那个单细胞，只不过是小菜一碟。……哪怕不顺利，也就只用这么办就行了。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Dovrebbe essere facile ingannare quella testa vuota. ... E se non funziona, è solo un peccato."

Steam (ST): He glanced over at the place he had stowed his gun. The cigarette smoke began to pleasantly cloud his mind.
Umineko Project (UP): He glanced over at the place he had stowed his gun.{n}The cigarette smoke began to pleasantly cloud his mind.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): He glanced over at the place he had stowed his gun. The cigarette smoke began to pleasantly cloud his mind.
PC Japanese (JP): ちらりと、隠した銃を見る。煙草の煙が、心地良く脳を曇らせていく。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ちらりと、隠した銃を見る。{n}煙草の煙が、心地良く脳を曇らせていく。
Russian (RU): Он взглянул туда, куда положил ружьё.{n}Сигаретный дым начал приятно обволакивать его разум.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ele olhou rapidamente para o local no qual havia colocado sua arma.{n}A fumaça do cigarro começou a brumar sua mente enquanto acalmava‐o.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 他瞟了眼藏好了的槍。{n}煙草的煙霧，舒舒服服地漸漸使他的大腦蒙上了一層陰影。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 他瞟了眼藏好了的枪。{n}烟草的烟雾，舒舒服服地渐渐使他的大脑蒙上了一层阴影。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Osservò il punto dove aveva riposto il suo fucile. Il fumo della sigaretta iniziò ad offuscare piacevolmente la sua mente.

Steam (ST): ...Battler isn't a kid anymore. He's an adult, who can choose his path through life as he pleases.
Umineko Project (UP): ......Battler isn't a kid anymore. He's an adult, who can choose his path through life as he pleases.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……戦人はもう、子供じゃない。自分の意思で人生を決められる、立派な大人だ。
Russian (RU): ......Баттлер уже не ребёнок. Он взрослый человек, который сам может выбрать свой жизненный путь.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......O Battler não é mais criança. Ele é um adulto capaz de escolher seus caminhos na estrada da vida.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……戰人已經，不是小孩子了。已是一個，能以自己的意志決定自己的人生的，合格的大人了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……战人已经，不是小孩子了。已是一个，能以自己的意志决定自己的人生的，合格的大人了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Battler non è più un bambino. È un adulto, che può scegliere il suo cammino attraverso la vita come vuole.

Steam (ST): When animals grow up, it's normal for them to form a group and go on a journey. Humans are the only ones that keep treating their young like kids even after they get big...
Umineko Project (UP): When animals grow up, it's normal for them to leave their group and go on a journey. Humans are the only ones that keep treating them like kids even after they get big......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When animals grow up, it's normal for them to form a group and go on a journey. Humans are the only ones that keep treating them like kids even after they get big......
PC Japanese (JP): 動物なら、大人になったら群を出て、旅に出るのが当り前。図体がデカくなっても、いつまでも養ってやるのは人間くらいのもんだ……。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 動物なら、大人になったら群を出て、旅に出るのが当り前。{n}図体がデカくなっても、いつまでも養ってやるのは人間くらいのもんだ……。
Russian (RU): Когда животные вырастают, для них нормально создать стаю и отправиться в путь. Люди единственные продолжают относиться к детям как к маленьким даже когда те становятся большими......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando animais crescem, é normal que eles deixem seus bandos e partam em jornadas. Humanos são os únicos que continuam tratando‐os como crianças mesmo depois que crescem......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 換成動物，在成為大人後離群出行，是理所當然的事。{n}也就只有人類會，即便孩子身體長大了，還永永遠遠地養下去吧……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 换成动物，在成为大人后离群出行，是理所当然的事。{n}也就只有人类会，即便孩子身体长大了，还永永远远地养下去吧……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quando gli animali crescono, è normale per loro formare un gruppo e partire per un viaggio. Gli umani sono gli unici che continuano a trattarli come bambini anche dopo che sono grandi...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Steam (ST): "...If I'd known it'd come to this, I never would've begged for you to come back. ...I regret...dragging you back into the family..."
Umineko Project (UP): ".........If it was gonna come to this, I should never have begged for you to come back. .........I regret......dragging you back into the family......"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......If I'd known it'd come to this, I should never have begged for you to come back. ......I regret......dragging you back into the family......"
PC Japanese (JP): 「………こんなことなら。お前に土下座なんかするんじゃなかったな。………お前を連れ戻して、……後悔してるぜ……。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………こんなことなら。お前に土下座なんかするんじゃなかったな。………お前を連れ戻して、……後悔してるぜ……」
Russian (RU): "......Если бы я знал, что так будет, ни за что бы не попросил тебя вернуться. ......Мне жаль, что...... я притащил тебя обратно в семью......"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Se fosse para acabar assim, eu nunca deveria ter implorado para você voltar. .........Eu me arrependo......de ter arrastado você de volta à família......"

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………早知如此。就不去向你下跪了。………真后悔，……把你带回来……」
